Title: Hello my World! Lily.
ShortDescription: "Hello my World! Lily." is a visual novel about a programmer who finds an unusual way to cope with loneliness and routine. But after a while, his imagination and actions go too far, and the line between reality and fantasy begins to melt rapidly.

Title: Cats & Cups
ShortDescription: Play as a barista in a cat-inspired coffee shop, where your customers are cats! Brew coffee and various drinks. Wholesome and cozy hand-drawn art, various mini-games and a lot of cats & coffee! Learn to craft complex orders, keep your catstomers happy. 🐱☕

Title: Carefully Stamped
ShortDescription: Craft and sell charming postcards to your customers in a relaxing sandbox full of color and creativity. Carefully Stamped is a cozy job simulator where you are a postcard designer. Take on new orders, craft the cutest mail, write a wholesome note and collect stamps to send your postcards 🎟️✉️

Title: Christmas Smash
ShortDescription: Santa Claus embarks on a mission: defeat Krampus and his army of renegade elves. An explosive, action-packed adventure in a top-down shooter game.

Title: Medieval StartUp
ShortDescription: Medieval StartUp is a unique mix of tavern management, crafting, and exploration set in a rich medieval world. Manage your tavern, craft unique items, recruit staff, and explore a mysterious marsh full of hidden secrets and rare resources.

Title: Mercator
ShortDescription: Items are more than their sell value in this shopkeeping game. Run shops, hire workers, haggle for profit, and dominate ancient global trade from Muziris to Rome.

Title: Math Frenzy
ShortDescription: Fast-paced math arcade game! Solve equations in your head, pick the right answer, and race against the clock. Play Arcade for endless high scores, Levels for star-based challenges, or Zen for relaxed practice. Build streaks, rack up points, and test your brainpower in Math Frenzy!

Title: For the Glory of Gods TCG
ShortDescription: Alternative online turn-based trading card game, that allows you unlimited deck-building options. Three different game modes, including Solo, Gauntlet, and Multiplayer to choose from! Earn cards, packs, and coins, and try to stay on top of the leaderboards For the Glory of Gods.

Title: Bio Goddess : Doomsday Begins
ShortDescription: Bio Goddess: Doomsday Begins is a third-person shooter survival game where players assume the role of a female high school student surviving in a school struck by a biochemical crisis. They investigate the events, uncover their connection to their father, and explore their own identity.

Title: Get Clucked
ShortDescription: Run through chaotic roads! Dodge cars with up to 5 friends. Explore 12 levels, collect eggs, gems, and unlock over 20 hats to show off your style.

Title: Spooky Night
ShortDescription: Spooky Night is an online social deduction game of teamwork and betrayal! Uncover the werewolves among you before they wipe out the village. During the day, chat, deceive, and vote to eliminate a suspect. At night, use your role’s abilities to gather insights or strike. Can you survive?

Title: The Golden Tile
ShortDescription: Build a thriving city on a hexagonal grid in this unique deck-building game! Buy cards, collect resources, balance upgrades, and unlock relics to enhance your strategy.

Title: 氷点下30度の絶望
ShortDescription: 可愛い後輩と2人っきり……冷凍庫の中で。 低体温症、脱衣矛盾、幻覚などの苦痛を乗り越えた先にあるのは、「真相」と「死」のみ。

Title: emerald
ShortDescription: what do you fear?

Title: No Human Shall Pass
ShortDescription: No Human Shall Pass is a run and gun rogue-like game. Shoot your way through a devastated city and extract as much score and loot as possible. Unlock new weapons and loadout items, become stronger through level-up chests and beat countless hostile robots throughout randomly generated levels.

Title: Corner Cards
ShortDescription: Corner Cards is a relaxing corner-window idle card-collecting game where you open booster packs, complete card sets, and upgrade your booth to attract more customers and fans alike!

Title: Slaves of Magic
ShortDescription: Humanity has been invaded by otherworldly forces wielding magic. Lead the resistance against the oppressors in this fantasy turn-based strategy game to save humanity from becoming the Slaves of Magic!

Title: Qohelet
ShortDescription: Qohelet is a brief adventure game that will kickstart you to the spiritual world: meet up with Qohelet, discover His backstory, meditate His scrolls and follow His teachings to increase your discernment and morale levels.

Title: Cube Parkour
ShortDescription: 3 lives, dozens of traps, and increasing difficulty with every step! Test your reflexes in Cube Parkour and become the master of the course!

Title: Transport Legion
ShortDescription: A unique roguelike card-based tower defense game. Strategically place cards, manage resource transport, balance production with combat, and craft distinctive decks to claim victory.

Title: Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels
ShortDescription: Become a coach for the tennis club in a prestigious sports academy with all members being hot chicks, but they all hate you. What to do now? Conquer them all, of course!!! Prepare yourself for heated tennis matches with dynamic gameplay and powerful abilities. Prove your skills and win their hearts.

Title: Color Splash: Mushrooms
ShortDescription: Color Splash: Mushroomsis a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable mushrooms and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful mushrooms paintings.

Title: Realms of Madness
ShortDescription: Build a medieval fantasy castle, expand it to recruit mythical creatures, and lead them into battle to demolish the enemy stronghold.

Title: Vyun, Kosmeya, And The Witch’s Curse
ShortDescription: A linear visual novel that tells us about the adventures of a budding writer, Kosmeya, who needs to take his manuscript to a competition in the capital, the path to which passes through a creepy forest.

Title: Catfighter, In the Lands of Sinners
ShortDescription: A fantasy Souls-like and CUTE~ top-down action game. Step into the despised Lands of Sinners as Mickesh, where lovely cats enjoy fast-paced battles, family friendly interactions, and the most adorable ?sUfF3r1nG? imaginable!

Title: Waste Sorting
ShortDescription: Waste Sorting is a single-player puzzle game, inspired by the classic pipe games from the 80s and 90s. Click the pipes to turn or switch them and create a way from start to finish.

Title: Catsploration
ShortDescription: In order to save your family, you must venture from home to find and return a dragon’s egg. Catsploration is a high fantasy adventure with narrative and 3D platforming elements.

Title: Car Factory Empire
ShortDescription: Create a car company from scratch! Go from the first mechanical carriages to luxurious racing cars! Design cars, sell them, participate in races, expand your company and lead it to market dominance!

Title: Mall Simulator
ShortDescription: Turn your building from a small shopping center into a huge city mall! To avoid going bankrupt, you'll need to build new stores, set good prices and keep up with trends. Upper floors, cleaning, shoplifters and security are upcoming.

Title: Open or Die
ShortDescription: In front of you are boxes. Some contain diamonds, while others contain death. How many times are you willing to take a risk to win in this deadly gambling show? Manipulate the odds and use items to emerge victorious. What will prove stronger, your greed or your instinct for self-preservation?

Title: Deckaroo
ShortDescription: Build your deck of monsters and heroes, each with unique skills, and battle to destroy enemy towers! Collect mana, unleash powerful strategies, and join the fight directly as your hero to claim victory.

Title: Devil Jam
ShortDescription: Battle hordes of demonic monsters, upgrade your abilities, and acquire new skills. Customize your build with hundreds of item combinations and rise through the ranks to fulfill your ultimate metal destiny. Conquer Hell in this thrilling roguelite survivors game!

Title: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
ShortDescription: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons is a First Person Idle Dungeon Crawler with 6 unique races, robust combat, a grand saga spanning a continent full of unique dungeons, a classless skill system, and extensive guild management system to master as you uncover the secrets of the world of Dragaea!

Title: Turning The Tide
ShortDescription: Welcome to January 1941. Allied forces have just repelled an invasion force in the Battle of Britain but their forces are severely depleted. Plans have been made to halt the Nazi war machine and Turn The Tide towards an all out victory. YOU have been hand-picked to carry out those plans. God Speed.

Title: Bottomless Pit Supervisor
ShortDescription: Manage the pit in this wickedly funny incremental game. Upgrade your facilities, collect resources, and corral your visitors into your literal tourist trap. If you gaze into the abyss, it may just give you a promotion!

Title: The Remains and The Residue
ShortDescription: The Remains and The Residue is a story-based linear adventure game where you play the stories and the memories of the famous author Janus Brennhart.

Title: Goob
ShortDescription: Embark on an epic journey into the depths of a mysterious and treacherous underground world. This immersive adventure combines exploring vast and mysterious caves teaming with ferocious monsters, mining for precious minerals, and continuously upgrading your abilities to survive.

Title: Pyrotoad
ShortDescription: 🔥🐸🔥 Pyrotoad is an action platformer where you leap, shoot, and puzzle your way through 35 challenging stages. Harness flame powers, unlock new moves, and battle through diverse biomes in your quest to reclaim Pyrotoad’s stolen sunglasses!

Title: Captain Sharkbait: Voyage for Treasure
ShortDescription: Ahoy, matey! Join the famously unlucky Captain Sharkbait known far and wide for his name... and his two peg legs! Could his fortunes finally be changing when a mysterious bottle washes ashore?

Title: Paper Wars
ShortDescription: Paper Wars is a single-player flight action game where you pilot powerful paper airplanes. Face off against an army of red paper planes, along with land and sea threats. Unlock and upgrade your fleet to dominate the skies!

Title: Dream Garden
ShortDescription: An easygoing simulation game about creating tiny garden dioramas. Use a wide selection of plants, decorations and tools to build and nurture the garden retreat of your dreams.

Title: Intrigue At Oakhaven
ShortDescription: Oakhaven is a story-driven point-and-click adventure game. Cousins Daphne and Dominic are summoned by their Grandmère to the family's historic southern manor house. Play as both characters as you explore the house and grounds, solve puzzles, complete tasks, and uncover long-buried family secrets.

Title: VERDURE
ShortDescription: Shape nature your way in a surreal playground of infinite plants and trees. Tweak their recipes, prune or let them flourish, and save your best creations into an ever growing collection.

Title: Loop: Anomaly Lab
ShortDescription: You have arrived at a research facility to rescue your younger sister. You’ve received information that she is on the 10th floor of the facility, but will you be able to reach her?

Title: Super Serious Golf
ShortDescription: Test your friendships and become the biggest menace on the course in this chaotic golf brawler. Compete through a series of minigames with 2-8 players and see who is the worst at Golf, and the best at causing mayhem.

Title: Rubble Eats The World
ShortDescription: A high energy, physics driven shooter where everything can be destroyed and consumed. Fight angry bots to gain size and abilities. Grow from a tiny pebble to a mountain of a force and you just might EAT THE WORLD! Then build and share your own worlds with the sandbox level editor!

Title: Letter Hunter
ShortDescription: Letter Hunter is a fast-paced, addictive multiplayer observation game where every second counts ! It's up to you to spot and write down as many words as possible beginning with the letter chosen. Challenge your friends now !

Title: The Underpass
ShortDescription: Trapped in an endlessly-looping underpass, you must stay alert for changes - large or small - to escape.

Title: Yummimons
ShortDescription: A pet game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Feed, pet, capture new companions, and engage in explosive battles — all without stopping your work, study, or browsing. Welcome to your new invisible addiction.

Title: Tales of Old: Dominus
ShortDescription: The Battle of the Brides is lost, but your tale of rebellion and vengeance begins. From the ashes, forge your dominion. Claim settlements, command men, and rise in a kingdom torn by corruption and civil war.

Title: Cursemark
ShortDescription: Forge your own path in Cursemark, an Action-Exploration Roguelite, where you craft unique spells on your journey through the Unknown Lands. Each run you will discover new artifacts, runes, and secrets in this haunted kingdom beyond the edge of the world.

Title: A Resistência de Gaia
ShortDescription: An elemental spirit on a mission to cool a boiling planet. Plant green roofs, battle eco-fascist robots, and wield nature's powers in a 2.5D action-adventure with tower defense and environmental management. Earth's last hope against the climate crisis.

Title: Cyber Sprinters
ShortDescription: Ready to get a new highscore? This endless runner is all about avoiding obstacles by jumping, sliding, and dodging for as long as you can while the running speed steadily increases.

Title: Everslide
ShortDescription: Everslide turns classic sliding puzzles into an endless, evolving experience. Test your speed, tackle daily puzzles, or unwind with infinite grids in a clean, minimalist design.

Title: Ghostly Acres
ShortDescription: Ghostly Acres is an idle hotel management game that lets you play at your own pace. Build, collect, upgrade, and grow an old house into a thriving inn for ghostly travelers.

Title: Tavern Keeper 🍻
ShortDescription: From the creators of Game Dev Tycoon comes Tavern Keeper 🍻, a cosy-chaotic management sim, featuring a powerful decoration sandbox and a magical storybook RPG!

Title: Bigfoot Life
ShortDescription: A simulator game where you live life as Bigfoot. Catch fish, forage for mushrooms and berries, build shelters, and more. Be the legend and live your best Bigfoot Life.

Title: Neither Cross Nor Crown
ShortDescription: A colorful souls-like late medieval power fantasy. Duel knights and strange creatures in a world loosely based on the Peasants' War of 1525. Collect unique weapons and armor and visit striking, atmospheric places!

Title: Critter Drifters
ShortDescription: A retro kart-racing adventure with a cast of cute, colorful animal characters! Set in a theme park, win tickets to unlock courses and new worlds to explore. Drive with precise, arcade-style movement (with drift and boost mechanics), and use items strategically against your opponents!

Title: The 7th Night
ShortDescription: An immersive bedtime experience where you lay in bed and fight to make it through the night. As time goes on and bad omens occur, you must emerge from the safety of your blanket to right them - but beware, you aren't always alone.

Title: Babbling Brook
ShortDescription: Sculpt sand to create winding streams through lush forests and rolling meadows. Babbling Brook is a cozy & relaxing indie game about messing around with water and sand. Also, there's a flock of rubber ducks trying to escape to the open sea...

Title: NoSlack Pets: Lo-Fi Paws
ShortDescription: In NoSlack Pets: Lo-Fi Paws, Miino is your cozy desktop companion: focus with Pomodoro, lofi, and white noise; every 30 minutes brings a Gift Box; mix 600+ decorations with 300+ Headgear; join the online study room, unwind with mini-games, and use the Cat Bus to tidy your screen.

Title: POUMOSA
ShortDescription: POUMOSA is an indie Point And Click adventure game. Discover the people of an unknown island. Study their language, their history, their culture or make your trip profitable... It's up to you!

Title: Crap Game, Don’t Play
ShortDescription: This is a true piece of junk. Every second you spend opening this game is a waste of your precious time. Your time is valuable—open your eyes and stay away from trash games.

Title: Guild Encounters
ShortDescription: Guild Encounters is a minimalist arcade JRPG. Recruit heroes, battle through dangerous zones, and conquer challenging turn-based encounters. Earn Guild Points to unlock new allies, powerful gear, and game-changing items. Face a gauntlet of battles as you journey to the final boss!

Title: Money Theft 3 Last Mission
ShortDescription: Gangster Terlander is back again. His mission is again to find money bags in different areas in this third person shooter game

Title: After School Grounds (방과후운동장)
ShortDescription: You're the last student left. The schoolyard is now filled with strange, terrifying creatures. Grab your pencil, ruler, eraser, or scissors—anything you can use as a weapon. Fight to survive in an abandoned school where peace depends on you. The battle begins now!

Title: SPARTA 2035 Prologue
ShortDescription: Turn-based tactics & strategy about an elite mercenary squad with an old-school action-movie vibe. Command Sparta: recruit distinctive fighters, upgrade your base, run missions, and decide Africa’s future—no point-blank misses, with real ballistics.

Title: Real Puzzles - Paris
ShortDescription: A logical puzzle game in the form of real puzzles - Paris. It is necessary to assemble a whole picture from its individual pieces. The game is suitable for those who are looking for a calm and relaxing pastime with family or alone.

Title: Real Puzzles - Kittens
ShortDescription: A logical puzzle game in the form of real puzzles - cute kittens. It is necessary to assemble a whole picture from its individual pieces. The game is suitable for those who are looking for a calm and relaxing pastime with family or alone.

Title: Real Puzzles - Canyons
ShortDescription: A logical puzzle game in the form of real puzzles - Canyons. It is necessary to assemble a whole picture from its individual pieces. The game is suitable for those who are looking for a calm and relaxing pastime with family or alone.

Title: XOL: Space Mech Wars
ShortDescription: Mech FPS game in Space Fight in all directions of space, follow the story and contribute to the space wars of your homeland! Survive as an up-and-coming soldier with the toughest warriors around!

Title: Laundering Simulator - Clean Cash and Laundry
ShortDescription: Laundering Simulator puts you in charge of a two-faced enterprise – a hidden counterfeiting workshop with a laundromat as its front! Help Eddie Wiser run this crazy show and deal with small-business management, a criminal underground, nosy authorities, and a rage-inducing grandmother!

Title: Outside the Blocks
ShortDescription: Unleash your creativity and design your own diorama in Outside the Blocks ‒ a full-featured model builder. Shape the terrain, assemble modular houses, add decorations and put your creation on display!

Title: Guess The Password
ShortDescription: Solve challenging text-based password puzzles across 40 levels, using logic, reasoning, and optional external tools. Add new rules after completing all levels to expand the game indefinitely for every player. Your rules, your game: be the first to shape it for others!

Title: Wordcaster
ShortDescription: Wordcaster is a voice-driven RPG adventure where you become a wizard, casting spells by speaking words aloud. Real-time speech recognition turns your voice into magical attacks against enemies. Unlock spellbooks, battle bosses, collect coins, and level up in a unique voice-powered RPG experience.

Title: PUNCH FOREVER
ShortDescription: Smash opponents with punches! Dive into a world of chaotic brawls, climb the PvE League, master wild physics, and survive the roguelite mayhem. Face your friend in the hot-seat 2-player arena and see who wobbles last!

Title: Toy Escape
ShortDescription: Toy Escape is a co-op game for up to 4 players where you play as a small toy trying to climb your way through a giant house to reach the rooftop and escape. Jump, climb, and find your way out in this fun, toy-sized adventure!

Title: GLOBAL CONTROL COUNTRIES
ShortDescription: GLOBAL CONTROL COUNTRIES – a strategic card simulator and a mini-encyclopedia of international statecraft. Available in 37 languages. A blend of thrilling gameplay and real educational impact with a unique game mechanic.

Title: STOCKWAVE ONLINE
ShortDescription: STOCKWAVE ONLINE is a high-octane, player-vs-player fighting game about beating the stocks out of your colleagues. You'll find that trading isn't safe in the modern day, as the employees of big-stonk would rip anyone apart over any liquidated penny they can find.

Title: The Time Game
ShortDescription: The Time Game is a complex strategy card-game where you can bend the rules of time to outsmart your opponents! Play solo or online with friends!

Title: Purrrifiers: Cleaning Chaos
ShortDescription: Purrrifiers is a hilarious 4-player co-op game about cleaning while causing chaos. Solve puzzles, drive quirky vehicles, use an array of cleaning tools and team up with adorable cats. Experience absurd humor, diverse locations, and non-stop fun as you collaborate or troll your way to cleaning glory!

Title: Deep Loop
ShortDescription: Find your way to master the seven deadly sins in a constantly looping world that will force you to experience different realities.

Title: CAR ROBOT Market Simulator Modavuj Multiplayer
ShortDescription: “CAR ROBOT Market Simulator Modavuj Multiplayer” is a business simulation where you manage your own market. Stock the shelves, set prices, satisfy your customers and grow your store!

Title: Tower Lords
ShortDescription: Become a Tower Lord! Build and upgrade your tower in this incremental idle game. Fight off the forces of the Dark Lord, conquer new lands, and challenge his dominion with the power of your dragon.

Title: Pegasis Odyssey
ShortDescription: In the far reaches of space, an odyssey begins. Explore hostile biomes, face powerful enemies, and gather vital resources in a retro shoot ’em up. Reset to evolve and grow stronger. The odyssey of Pegasis is endless, how far will you go?

Title: Royal's Gambit
ShortDescription: Royal’s Gambit is a retro-style, turn-based card strategy game. Battle through 80+ stages of face card patterns by playing cards equal to their health, build your deck, boost your score with smart plays, and survive multiple modes—or start over from the beginning.

Title: Midnight Files
ShortDescription: The camera doesn’t lie, but the truth isn’t always obvious. Photograph traces, gather evidence, link clues on the board, search police databases for key info, and identify the culprit and the next attack site. Each case is a standalone mystery waiting to be solved.

Title: Master Lemon: The Quest for Iceland
ShortDescription: Harness the power of language, memory, and friendship in this unforgettable narrative adventure! Join Lemon on his quest to become a master of language and save a mysterious world from a memory-erasing plague.

Title: Cook for Me Grandpa!
ShortDescription: Cook for your AI grandchildren in this heartwarming novel + cooking simulation. Combine over 100 ingredients and skills to create unique recipes. Your grandkids will react with feedback—sometimes strict, sometimes kind. Can your cooking become a memory they cherish?

Title: Upgrade It
ShortDescription: An idle game with 99 generators and a deep prestige system. Unlock 1000+ upgrades, automate progress, and complete all challenges. A full release, ready to play!

Title: Co OPERATION: MultiTurn
ShortDescription: The people in charge have defunded hospitals so you decide to help. With your squad of volunteer medics, plan your tactics, schedule actions and optimize the team strategy to heal as many patients as possible. 1-8 players, only the host needs to have the game installed. Modding support integrated.

Title: Sisyphus Endures
ShortDescription: Inspired by the ancient myth of Sisyphus, you are tasked with pushing a gigantic boulder up a hill. Reach each checkpoint before the rising water swallows you whole.

Title: VIVARIUMS
ShortDescription: Immerse yourself in the first-ever blend of classic Sudoku and first-person horror as you descend deeper into the unknown.

Title: DexSweeper
ShortDescription: In DexSweeper, the cursor never stops moving. Use the joystick or mouse to guide your movement, then time your tile reveals carefully--one wrong move could be your last!

Title: Cendovia Uprising
ShortDescription: Lead your faction to conquer a divided island. Each battlefield presents new challenges as you play cards to deploy your troops. Test your skills solo or online in this turn-based strategy game.

Title: Europa Universalis V
ShortDescription: Use war, trade or diplomacy to satisfy your grandest ambitions and dominate five centuries of history in the newest version of Europa Universalis, Paradox Interactive's flagship historical grand strategy game.

Title: Click to Civ
ShortDescription: Smash ancient rocks, collect civilization badges, and grow your hometown into a thriving hub of progress. This simple yet addictive incremental game with active clicking guides humanity from caves to the stars.

Title: Wonder of Blue
ShortDescription: Delve into Wonderland with Liddell in this Dungeon Crawler Roguelike. Defeat great adversaries in graceful melee combat.

Title: Little Lures
ShortDescription: A casual idle fishing sim that sits quietly at the bottom of your screen while you do other tasks.

Title: ARIA-404: Labyrinth Protocol
ShortDescription: A cyber‑mythic interactive narrative game blending quick‑time events with rich narrative-driven gameplay, & AI‑generated worlds. Shape the evolving Labyrinth & uncover its secrets in this solo‑developed revolution in interactive storytelling.

Title: Desktop Defender
ShortDescription: An idle auto-battler that sits in the corner of your screen while you do other things.

Title: The Time Machine
ShortDescription: This 'time machine' takes you where others won't.

Title: 7 Days Blood Moons
ShortDescription: 7 Days Blood Moons is a 4v1 fight to the death. Survivors fortify bases and scavenge for materials while the Zombie Master commands and possesses the horde to crush them. Play solo or with friends – up to 4 survivors can team up against a human or AI Zombie Master. Who will prevail?

Title: Starlit Stories
ShortDescription: Welcome to Starlit Stories. Relax to calming music as you build and customize your dream campsite. Watch as travelers come and go, adding life to your tranquil retreat. There's no management or deadlines for you to meet. Just wind down and let your creativity flow in this cozy campsite builder.

Title: King's Subsidy
ShortDescription: King's Subsidy is a turn-based economic strategy game with rogue-lite mechanics. Use the unique skills of the most influential merchants in the world and develop their potential. Plan. Develop. Yield. Trade. Protect. Each run has different challenges and opportunities.

Title: Magical Greenhouse
ShortDescription: Magical Greenhouse is a cozy simulation game where you manage your own potion shop. Your clients, creatures and adventurers of all kinds have strange requests. You will have to be inventive to create the perfect potion for every situation !

Title: Beyond the Grove
ShortDescription: Summon nature’s army in this charming RTS-inspired autobattler. With your troop of mushroom warriors and over 50 unique elemental Golems by your side, command your fun-guy forces to push back the corruption beyond your grove. Strategize, adapt, and overcome!

Title: Retail Simulator
ShortDescription: Retail Simulator is a 1-4 Co-op game where you build your dream store from scratch in this immersive retail experience. Design the layout with our custom build mode, stock shelves, order inventory. Customize your store's look to attract customers. Choose your scale, from local shop to mega-store.

Title: Void Drift
ShortDescription: Void Drift is a survival roguelike space shooter where you explore unque battlefields, evolve powerful weapons face relentless enemy swarms and take on bosses, adapt your strategy, and survive the chaos of the void!

Title: Oblivio: Lost In The World
ShortDescription: After a brief wander, at the end of a corridor, you encounter a girl curled up by a door, you can tell that her style is far from ordinary. Perhaps she knows more than you do… Or maybe she’s the reason you’re here. Will she help you? Or maybe you will help her?

Title: Retail Therapy
ShortDescription: Clock in. Freak out. Fight back. You’re stuck in the world’s worst shift - facing down entitled customers, absurd demands, and a mountain of workplace rage. Survive escalating chaos across restaurants, shops, and festivals, using whatever tools you can grab to keep the madness at bay.

Title: Black Fog
ShortDescription: Black Fog is a survival horror with narrative elements. Survive against randomly generated hallucinations to maintain stable anxiety and control what is real and what is not.

Title: Phoenix's Faye
ShortDescription: A girl who has practiced martial arts since childhood finds herself, for some unknown reason, trapped in a fantastical world. She must continuously fight to find her way back home! This is a high-difficulty action game featuring intense combat, immersive scene atmospheres, highly oppressive NPCs.

Title: In Our Parlor
ShortDescription: In Our Parlor is a short, horror walking simulator. The player must make their way through a mysterious manor to unfold the story, find the parlor, and escape this nightmare. Navigate a series of dark set pieces and follow the music to discover the path forward.

Title: Thirty Seconds: Slain At Home
ShortDescription: Thirty Seconds: Slain At Home is a first-person simulator where you only have two things to do: interact with things and hide. You can interact with the furniture, the train set, and the door to help conclude your story. Hide once you make your decision or leave the simulator anytime.

Title: Spirit Magician
ShortDescription: Embark on a challenging adventure to obtain the magic book. Overcome challenging trials with the various choices provided during your adventure. It may be a difficult adventure, but you will feel the joy of taking on the challenge!

Title: Sauce Factory Tycoon
ShortDescription: Manage production, keep customers happy, and build a sauce empire.

Title: The Necronomicon
ShortDescription: In this first-person camera horror game, set in a dark cemetery, as the main scenario, collecting items by opening doors and facing enemies using magic, to advance in the gameplay move around the game using keyboard and mouse, the game lasts from 30 minutes to 50 minutes

Title: Vivid World
ShortDescription: A follow-up to the hit game Vivid Knight, Vivid World is a completely new party-building, roguelike strategy game! Our story takes place in the Underworld, a land ruled by demons. Utilize and master our protagonist, Lemuria's new Jewel Magic to conquer strange dungeons.

Title: Sex Game - BDSM - Episode 2
ShortDescription: Immerse yourself in an erotic visual novel that explores the bond between a submissive and her Master, paired with an interactive sex simulator. Veronica and her master continue to explore deeper BDSM fantasies.

Title: Pepper Odyssey
ShortDescription: Pepper Odyssey is an RPG about surviving a shipwreck in an unruly outlandish island. Survive the lawless island: fight, trade and explore. Gather scrap to trade, improve your shelter and build yourself the means to escape; or meddle in the affairs of the island and realize a vision for its future.

Title: Fantasy Forest
ShortDescription: Welcome to the wonderful realm of “Fantasy Forest”. Here, you’ll encounter a world as clear and dreamlike as a Hayao Miyazaki anime! This is a healing game that combines creature collection, relaxed idle gameplay, and scene decoration.

Title: Foolish Mortals
ShortDescription: Louisiana, 1933. Thirty years ago an entire wedding suddenly & mysteriously vanished on the island of Devil's Rock, and with it went the location of the lost treasure of Bellemore Manor. To find it, you might need to die too. A cozy, story-driven, point & click adventure game of the merry & macabre.

Title: Second Sun
ShortDescription: Second Sun is a Hi-octane FPS with RPG elements, set in an open world, filled with intriguing landmarks, procedurally generated dungeons and tons of loot! Explore a vast, picturesque map and use your abilities to save the Empire from devastation and prevent the world from falling into darkness.

Title: Minerva Labyrinth
ShortDescription: A turn-based dark magical girl dungeon crawler. Create a squad of magical warriors, explore twisted labyrinths, and exterminate the demonic Hate that threaten the city.

Title: Epics of Noche, Brain Busted
ShortDescription: Noche tests out Shaylin's brain scanner in this short, 2-hour platforming spin-off of the EON book series.

Title: Biida-Bash
ShortDescription: Experience the thrill of a marbles tabletop game with physics-bending powers! Dive into this turn-based multiplayer action, challenging friends, family, or strangers across different mini-games with unique challenges. It's all about calculated moves and chaotic fun!

Title: ASV Soccer
ShortDescription: ASV Soccer is an up to 22 player arcade multiplayer soccer game for true 11 vs 11 matches with seamless drop-in and drop-out. Switch to first-person, third-person , and television camera modes at any time, and enjoy modern visuals with realistic physics based ball behaviour.

Title: DVK
ShortDescription: DVK is a hand-drawn, pixel-art style, clicker game with lite strategy elements, heavy RNG and a twist. 20 upgrade cards will aid you in your quest to defeat the wicked dragon clans and save the kingdom of Jappa.

Title: Biped 2
ShortDescription: Biped 2 is a coop action adventure game with a strong focus on moment-to-moment collaboration alone or between 2 or 4 players.

Title: Multiverse Designer
ShortDescription: Multiverse Designer is a 3D virtual tabletop and map creator, a unique toolbox for storytellers. Create any kind of scene, environment, character or cutscenes you can imagine, for any setting from fantasy to sci-fi, horror, cyberpunk..., in the most immersive RPG experience you've ever played!

Title: Dice Dice Baby
ShortDescription: The House always wins! Except here... Dice Dice Baby is a roguelike dice game about cheating and rolling the craziest numbers to beat the House. Twist a classic game thanks to illegal special dice and create epic combos with lucky charms, all in the world most permissive casino.

Title: WorkParadise
ShortDescription: Sometimes you just want to work mindlessly—picking up products flowing down a conveyor belt. A work simulation game for overthinkers who crave simple focus. Tired from work? Unwind with more work. For the beautifully insane.

Title: The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike
ShortDescription: The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike combines manga, tactical puzzles, and roguelike gameplay into one thrilling experience. Enjoy stylish pixel-art action while testing your flexible thinking and precise strategy!

Title: Deadcam
ShortDescription: Sealed shut inside a rural, abandoned house for a paranormal hunting TV show.. Something is VERY wrong with Margo. Her live headcam is still rolling.. and you can see the whole thing. Run, hide, and escape the house in this first-person survival horror. And remember: the raccoon knows everything.

Title: Gemwielders
ShortDescription: In this competitive deckbuilding game you are a Gemwielder, controlling an ancient artifact weapon. Socket mystical gems to acquire powerful abilities and prevail in a duel against another Gemwielder.

Title: Nature
ShortDescription: Adapt your species to survive where food is scarce and predators lurk at every turn. Easy to learn, but offering lots of strategic depth, every ecosystem evolves in its own unique way. Nature is a modular game system from the designer of the award-winning Evolution series.

Title: Fish Stick Protocol
ShortDescription: Gather up to 8 players and dive into chaotic procedural dimensions to collect artifacts for the Owner’s peculiar galleries. Expect weird gravity, killer plants and nonsensical anomalies. If anything happens to you, somebody will take the next shift.

Title: Strange Seed
ShortDescription: You’re a lowly blob, but with the ability to evolve any DNA you eat, you don’t have to stay that way. Upgrade parts to fight, run, fly and overcome your environment. Mammals, birds, insects, dinosaurs... everything is on your menu!

Title: Fish Stick Protocol
ShortDescription: Gather up to 8 players and dive into chaotic procedural dimensions to collect artifacts for the Owner’s peculiar galleries. Expect weird gravity, killer plants and nonsensical anomalies. If anything happens to you, somebody will take the next shift.

Title: Sultan Of Egypt
ShortDescription: Features of this game is an atmospheric story game with choices. There are very nice interactive story in the game. True beauty is always beyond imagination; and a story, or anything for that matter, is important, only to the extent it reflects a ray of it.

Title: PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On
ShortDescription: A plague-mutated doctor fights through wave after wave of infected husks in this fast-paced roguelike pixel shooter. Equip cursed masks, wield biomechanical weapons, and mutate your build as you survive a kingdom undone by immortality.

Title: Ages of Cataria
ShortDescription: Set in a new fantastical world, Ages of Cataria is a cozy-friendly town sim. Watch as your village evolves from humble beginnings, with just one family, to a community of multiple families living together across generations of time.

Title: Pawoki: Desktop Pets
ShortDescription: Virtual pet on your desktop! Drag it with the mouse, grow crops, mine resources, craft and trade. Take care of your pet’s needs and use the built-in timer. A living world of adventures on top of all applications!

Title: Catfish Idle Pond
ShortDescription: A charming and stylized idle desktop fishing game where your feline friend takes the spotlight. Unlock upgrades, maintain a detailed fish log, and personalize your island with delightful cosmetics to make it truly your own.

Title: Astar Solis
ShortDescription: A minimalistic 2D shoot-em-up, based on dodging bullets.

Title: Dark Quest 4
ShortDescription: A turn based dungeon crawler where you create a party of heroes to go on epic quests.

Title: Bloodgrounds
ShortDescription: Bloodgrounds merges tactical turn-based combat with strategic management, RPG and roguelite elements. Forged in the pits of the arena, you fought your way out and now as a wealthy patron you recruit, train, and command your team of hardened Gladiators to glory - or death.

Title: DOG WITCH
ShortDescription: Dog Witch is a roguelike deckbuilder where your spells are fueled by enchanted dice. Combine over 150 unique items to forge ever-evolving strategies, perfect synergy combos, summon minions, and tackle an endless range of foes so bizarre, they’ll leave your tail wagging in disbelief!

Title: Q-UP
ShortDescription: Sick of long queues, unfair matchups, and arbitrary reflex tests? Try Q-UP, the coin flipping eSport. It's one part clicker, one part multiplayer strategy game, one part demented capitalism simulator, and 100% completely random.

Title: Pig Tower
ShortDescription: Pig tower is a simple 2D platformer with a speed running angle. You climb towers to find the princess in as short time as possible and are rewarded medals for good times.

Title: The Bar Souls
ShortDescription: The Bar Souls is a retro pixel souls-like set in a mysterious digital world. Face ruthless bosses, solve puzzles that test mind and heart, and let perseverance unveil hidden secrets on your path to the end.

Title: Eventide Matter
ShortDescription: A 2D space mining adventure. Pursued by relentless enemies, you must mine exotic resources, use them to upgrade your equipment and build a massive inter-dimensional portal to get back home.

Title: Twilight Parade: Moonlit Mononoke
ShortDescription: Beautiful oni-girls battle hordes of yokai in this side-view bullethell SHMUP. Every year yokai take to the streets to celebrate at Hyakki Yagyō, the night parade of the hundred yokai. But this year they didn't invite the oni twins, so they're going to ruin the party!

Title: Pokertown: Cheater's Paradise
ShortDescription: Step into Pokertown, a seedy underworld run by gangsters and loan sharks. Learn to crush your opponents at poker using realistic cheating methods. Just don't get caught...

Title: Restaurant Scramble
ShortDescription: Run your own diner, patisserie, seafood store, and more in this fast-paced incremental game! Keep your customers happy by updating your menu and upgrading a variety of skills.

Title: Card Chase
ShortDescription: "Card Chase" is a fast-paced deck-building game that combines strategy and resource management. You play as a "hero", gathering various resource cards to confront an uncertain fate, defeat outlaws, and fulfill your duty to protect the city—ultimately becoming its legend.

Title: Freelancers: Rogue Skies
ShortDescription: FREELANCERS: ROGUE SKIES An open-world single-player space combat roguelite where you pilot customizable starfighters, engage in tactical dogfights, and explore dynamic star systems across a galaxy shaped by war and opportunity.

Title: SRUSH
ShortDescription: 2D Roguelike Pull-Action Game. Simply pull and fire slimes with your mouse! Attack by slamming slimes into enemies! Grow your slimes, build your strategy, and defeat invading enemies to protect your nest!

Title: Work Life Balance
ShortDescription: “Are you truly happy?” — A near-future dystopian RPG of corporate satire. In a world where work is everything, 【Work Life Balance】 may be the key to happiness—or a crafted illusion. Join the mysterious “Work Life Balance Fellowship” and uncover the truth.

Title: CGA Trek
ShortDescription: Cyan Alert! Set your eyeballs on stunned because it's time for CGA Trek! Your continuing mission is to seek out and destroy an invading fleet of warships in this modern homage to the classic turn-based strategy "Trek" game that originated on mainframe computers in the 1970s.

Title: Plant Plots
ShortDescription: Plant Plots is a relaxing puzzle board game where you'll need to be a clever gardener to make it through a variety of tricky levels. But watch out, these plants don't behave quite like the ones you're used to. Dive in and unwind as you solve beautifully crafted puzzles.

Title: London: Echoes of the Past
ShortDescription: A mysterious woman comes back from the dead, and the dusty past surfaces. Between a gloomy student girl and a glamorous ex-girlfriend, the clues are intertwined, who is the mastermind behind the scene? Play as a detective heroine in 1935 London, embark on a journey of love and growth.

Title: There Are No Orcs
ShortDescription: An RTS-Roguelike hybrid with auto-battling troops. Master building placement, swarm your enemies, and smash their defenses with unit-commander combos!

Title: Sled Together
ShortDescription: Compete on crazy tracks, race on turbo sleds, collect boosters and... launch your penguin into flight! The winner is the one who best combines speed, precision and aerodynamics

Title: Ravenous Horde
ShortDescription: Team up with 64 players to fight off the horde of zombies in this post-apocalyptic FPS or join the horde against the living! Turn on your teammates and tear them apart. Level up and unlock new weapons, perks, clothing options and more! Equip your favourite loadout and join the fight!

Title: 出将入相
ShortDescription: Strategy Game | Roguelike | Peking Opera Welcome to "Chu Jiang Ru Xiang" —— a strategic roguelike game inspired by Peking Opera! - The game's gameplay is being gradually improved. You are welcome to try the demo version and leave your valuable suggestions.

Title: Syberia - Remastered
ShortDescription: Rediscover the clockpunk universe of Benoît Sokal in this fully remastered version of the first Syberia game. Join Kate Walker and Oscar, a strange and charming automaton, in pursuit of the brilliant inventor Hans Voralberg, and embark on an adventure more immersive and poetic than ever.

Title: Sad Virus Deathland
ShortDescription: Sad virus is back in this third person platformer and now he needs find beer bottles and avoid traps

Title: Banner Tactics
ShortDescription: Deploy your soldiers to the battlefield, outwit enemy pursuit, and train powerful troops to carry out missions for survival.

Title: Tiny Lands 2
ShortDescription: Take your perception into a new dimension with the relaxing sense of photorealistic miniature scenes in Tiny Lands 2. Find the differences and stories by exploring handcrafted 3D dioramas. Can you find them all?

Title: Nice To Yeet You
ShortDescription: Welcome to the BOUNCE! Grab your controller, buckle up, and prepare for a face-off like no other in Nice to Yeet You!

Title: The Ashen Baron
ShortDescription: In a kingdom scarred by civil war, a wandering hero seeks to restore hope to its devastated lands. In a journey of redemption, can he rekindle the Baron's lost courage, rise against darkness and defend what remains?

Title: Rebel Engine
ShortDescription: Rebel Engine mixes the stylish combat of a Hack n' Slash with the speed and gunplay of a '90s FPS in a unique, fast-paced action game. Combine gunshots with melee attacks to create devastating combos! Lead the rebellion against the Concrete megacorporation and liberate all of robot-kind!

Title: Brew
ShortDescription: Face the challenges of The Tower as you enroll into the Alchemy Academy in this action-packed, third-person, roguelite. Brew potions to boost yourself in the heat of battle and use multiple weapons to defeat dangerous foes and pass your exams!

Title: HONORLESS!
ShortDescription: HONORLESS! is a 2D fighting game 1vs1 where trashtalking plays a key role. Insult your friends with custom phrases and then slice them to pieces.

Title: Outsider
ShortDescription: Shape humanity's future in a sci-fi narrative game where choices matter. Experience an extraterrestrial contact while deciphering an overarching mystery of far-reaching consequences. Who is the Outsider?

Title: The Last Caretaker
ShortDescription: Save humanity. Sail across a vast ocean world in this first-person survival-crafting adventure. Craft, explore, and battle rogue machines. An atmospheric, open-world adventure where every discovery and upgrade brings you closer to humanity’s rebirth.

Title: Anime Dream Match: Reptiles
ShortDescription: A charming and relaxing memory game where you match pairs of cool anime reptiles.

Title: A Tale In The Garden
ShortDescription: A short, slow-paced, narrative-driven point-and-click game where you follow Filomena as she prepares her garden for a competition and awaits the arrival of her grandchild, Frida.

Title: My Cozy Aquarium
ShortDescription: Dive into a cozy underwater world where caring for fish and decorating aquariums becomes your most relaxing adventure.

Title: I Am Machine
ShortDescription: Fight through a machine-ruled world in this isometric rogue-lite adventure. As Erik, a man-turned-robot, outsmart waves of enemies and adapt to ever-changing levels. Change the world before it changes you in this relentless quest for vengeance.

Title: Whiskerwood
ShortDescription: Establish a home for your industrious mice under the oppressive paw of your cat overlords in this city builder featuring complex simulations, intricate production chains, and the age-old rivalry between cat and mouse.

Title: Rise Again
ShortDescription: Rise Again is an Action Roguelike inspired by Hack n Slash and Dungeon Crawler. Witness the adventures of a cursed wizard in ever-changing dungeons. Kill, Die, and Rise Again to lift the curse. Every death is a step closer to freedom. Will you break the curse?

Title: Choice of Life: Samosbor
ShortDescription: You're just a simple inhabitant of the endless Gigastructure. The best you'll get is seven shifts at a machine and a bowl of feed concentrate, and that for good service to the party.... Is that it? Or do you have a choice?

Title: No Players Online
ShortDescription: you find an abandoned fps game on an old computer. you decide to play it.

Title: Ramen-ten ‘Heart Abyss’
ShortDescription: Immerse yourself in the cozy atmosphere of an Asian noodle shop right on your desktop. Discover new recipes, decorate your stall, and serve peasants, samurai, and yokai delicious hot meals while you work or relax.

Title: Service with a Shotgun
ShortDescription: Service With a Shotgun [SWAS] is a mash up of visual novel storytelling and chaotic wave game shooting. You're the last poor soul manning a beat-up roadside shop in the middle of the zombie apocalypse. Shoot straight. Talk fast. Surely nothing can go wrong. Right?

Title: Bubble Hook Mania
ShortDescription: A retro arcade bubble-shooter where shots split bouncing bubbles until they vanish. Clear 40 handcrafted levels before the timer runs out or push your limits in Survival.

Title: Gold Miner: Return to Glory
ShortDescription: Gold Miner: Return to Glory brings back the classic digging fun with modern twists. Play through challenging levels, chase high scores in endless mode, or face off in nostalgic local multiplayer for competitive excitement.

Title: Dinocop
ShortDescription: When dinosaurs were brought back to life, none wanted to be a cop, so humans made you: Dinocop. Investigate the guests of the Cretaceous hotel to crack a meaty case that will confront you with your most profound existential dilemma. Who brought human meat to the dinosaur rights convention ?

Title: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
ShortDescription: Explore and survive the harsh American wilderness in the Long Drive North. Drive and repair your trusty old RV, scavenge for parts, hunt and cook to survive; all alone or with up to 4 players in co-op. No zombies or monsters await – just an immersive driving-exploration-survival experience.

Title: GG-Party
ShortDescription: Dive into the wild open-world party game for up to 8 players! Explore the island, crush quests for big cash, grab properties and shops, and pull sneaky pranks on your friends. The first to become a millionaire wins the game!

Title: Idle Looter
ShortDescription: Slay endless monsters for legendary loot. Master deep crafting and prestige systems to grow infinitely. Collect an army of companions and conquer the unknown. Do you have what it takes to become a hero?

Title: Forefront
ShortDescription: Forefront is an intense VR shooter featuring 32-player large-scale battles, land, sea, and air vehicles, and immersive, tactical combat. You are the tip of the spear in the war between a global energy giant and resistance forces. Which side will you take?

Title: Rhythm of Annihilation
ShortDescription: Rhythm of Annihilation is a rhythm-based third-person shooter. Follow the beat, conquer unique levels, and experience the perfect fusion of shooting and music in surreal, dazzling environments!

Title: It Takes a War
ShortDescription: Graphics! Guns! Glory! Get ready to drop into a devastatingly real depiction of the battlefield as you and your team take on a relentless foe. It Takes a War presents a new vision for the team-based tactical shooter genre.

Title: Rogue Descent
ShortDescription: A challenging auto-battling, Roguelite, dungeon crawl. Plan your path. Make tough choices. Survive the descent. If you do survive your first Descent then three further, more brutal Ascension difficulty levels await.

Title: Toon Siege
ShortDescription: Call the banners. Prepare your army. The siege has begun. Toon Siege is a minimalist action strategy game about building an army and attacking castles. Guide your battering ram and soldiers through the maze of obstacles and fortifications to reach the enemy castle and become its new King

Title: Rhombus
ShortDescription: Rhombus is a first-person puzzle game where you build your path through panels controlling platforms. Explore and find your way through a compact environment in this small metroidbrainia.

Title: Frogmageddon
ShortDescription: Become the horde in this survival game! Expand your army from a lone frog warrior to a 100+ army against the slithery snake onslaught!

Title: Sanatorium - A Mental Asylum Simulator
ShortDescription: The year is 1923. The lines between modern psychiatric treatments and pseudoscience are still vague. Enter the Sanatorium to diagnose and treat your patients. Struggle with moral decisions and society’s expectations – but tread carefully, as your supervisors may discover… that you are an impostor.

Title: High School Dirty Secrets
ShortDescription: High School Dirty Secrets is a horror/puzzle adventure where Kasuga wakes up locked inside her high school with no memory of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, strange and unsettling events unfold, leading her to uncover dark secrets hidden within the school's walls.

Title: Kentum
ShortDescription: Stranded in the year 10,000, Kent—an average Joe turned clone—must survive, explore, and rebuild civilization with the help of a quirky robot companion. Craft, farm, and automate in this 2D craftervania adventure as you uncover Earth’s secrets and kickstart humanity, one machine at a time.

Title: Slime Changer
ShortDescription: A slime with no memory of who—or what—it is. Absorb others, wield their powers, and embark on a journey to save the world and discover your true identity. Experience fast-paced, stylish action in a brutal yet beautiful dystopia where magic and machines collide.

Title: Puzzle Depot
ShortDescription: A box-pushing, bug-squishing, post-apocalyptic adventure awaits you in Puzzle Depot! Challenge hundreds of meticulously designed rooms that expand on classic sokoban gameplay with new and creative mechanics. Build your own devious creations with the included level editor!

Title: Connected Fates
ShortDescription: Connected Fates is a surreal top down Puzzle Adventure game where you guide a child through a dying world and help him return home. The game knows you exist, and you are able to influence it through unconventional means.

Title: Dragon Front: Adventures
ShortDescription: A single player card battler without limits: every hand playable, every battle unique. Where champions grow their armies through promotion and the spoils of battle. With no mana system to hold you back, success depends on how you place your forces and outthink your enemies.

Title: Turbo Carnage
ShortDescription: Turbo Carnage is a fast‑paced arena survival game. Smash through clowns with deadly vehicles, fire high‑powered weapons, and call airstrikes. Play solo or join friends in online co‑op against endless, escalating waves.

Title: Astro Nova
ShortDescription: Astro Nova is a short incremental roguelike about surviving swarms in space, combining modules into powerful builds, and ascending beyond the stars.

Title: Cosmic Coop
ShortDescription: Attract adorable Critterlings, grow a thriving garden, craft charming items, and enjoy cozy companionship in a world full of surprises.

Title: UNBEATABLE
ShortDescription: UNBEATABLE is a rhythm adventure where music is illegal and you do crimes. Follow the story of Beat and her band on the run, in a narrative experience full of big emotions powered by arcade-flawless rhythm gameplay.

Title: Next Run
ShortDescription: Fantasy strategy RPG with roguelike elements. A game about choice: every mechanic is an alternative to another. Fight or bribe, craft or trade, build or cast. Find your own path and reach victory.

Title: Star Ores Inc.
ShortDescription: Take over an abandoned space station and manage your own ore mine. Cut through the asteroid with your laser, sell ore, and create an automated network of robot helpers to maximize your profit.

Title: Amanda the Adventurer 3
ShortDescription: In the thrilling conclusion of the Amanda the Adventurer trilogy, follow Riley as they uncover the ultimate secrets behind Amanda, Hameln, and mysteries that have plagued Kensdale for decades.

Title: SAVE THE KINGDOM SIMPLE RPG
ShortDescription: Embark on a heartfelt journey with a young orphan determined to follow in his heroic parent's footsteps. From a secluded life in the woods to the front lines of a kingdom in peril, uncover a hidden legacy and face down classic monsters. Will you rise to become the hero you were always meant to be?

Title: SpinGrid: Core Block Puzzle
ShortDescription: SpinGrid: Core Block Puzzle is a fast-paced twist on classic block puzzles, where the arena spins, a core stone blocks your path, and victory comes from building 3x3 formations across three unique game modes.

Title: Dollhouse of Dead
ShortDescription: In this co-op horror game, your team visits abandoned toy factories. Collect various junk, extract materials from it, create and improve your equipment. And try to survive, because while you are exploring the dark dungeons of factories, bloodthirsty toys are hunting you

Title: Deep Space Exploitation
ShortDescription: Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining game featuring 2D physics, fully destructible asteroids, and a story of survival under an exploitative corporation. Use your equipment wisely, upgrade your ship, and make difficult decisions to secure your future!

Title: The Awakened Avenger
ShortDescription: The Awakened Avenger is a top-down shooter light rogue-lite game. Players take on the role of a zombie who has been harmed by biochemical experiments but retains self-awareness. Survive by choosing different equipment and props, and defeat the ultimate villain.

Title: ChaseToTheGalaxy
ShortDescription: Even if you don't have wings, you can still climb.

Title: Printfarm Simulator
ShortDescription: Build and manage your own 3D printing farm! Expand production, fulfill custom orders, and automate your workflow in a realistic economic simulation.

Title: My Little Puppy
ShortDescription: "There is a saying that when you depart from this world, the dog who went ahead will warmly welcome you." While spending time in dog heaven, Bong-gu the Welsh Corgi suddenly catches his dad's scent. Now, he embarks on a journey to meet his dad. Will Bong-gu be able to see his dad again?

Title: Luzhanqi
ShortDescription: A modern, digital take on the classic Chinese abstract-strategy game Luzhanqi. Deploy your army, outmaneuver your opponent, and capture their flag in this turn-based war game. The battlefield waits for no one!

Title: Tank Fight Ready
ShortDescription: Tank Fight Ready is a tank shooting game, players can fight each other in team deathmatch or free for all mode. AI can be added to support single player games and multiplayer games based on the Internet or LAN.

Title: The Apothecary of Trubiz
ShortDescription: A short puzzle game where you decipher a fictional language, mix potions, and treat patients. Enjoy the thrill of understanding and the small stories that unfold from each cure.

Title: HyperChineseChess即时象棋：旧棋新弈
ShortDescription: Turn-based play is central to Chinese Chess. HyperChineseChess removes this rule—battle AI or players in real-time, using quick thinking to win. Experience classic chess reimagined!

Title: Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed
ShortDescription: Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed​​ is a top-down 2D roguelite tactics game. Command three heroes in chess-like battles, forging legends through terrain strategy, skill combos, and ever-evolving rogue builds on a dynamic battlefield.

Title: moon bride
ShortDescription: This is a classic platformer with hand-drawn graphics and animations.

Title: Curtains The Clown
ShortDescription: Meet Curtains. An exiled alien clown in search of a home. While passing through a distant galaxy, he was forced to land when his ship's fuel cells ran dry. Now stranded in a far away world, Curtains must find fuel for his ship and return to space... or perhaps another way to continue his journey?

Title: Loafing Town
ShortDescription: A relaxing and humorous idle god simulator that stays at the bottom of your screen or on a second monitor while you do other things. With physics-based dragging interactions, it feels just like playing with desk toys.

Title: Figure It Out: The Tantrum Simulator
ShortDescription: Her wrath shakes the earth - windows shatter, lava flows, everyone panics! Save the day by solving lightning-fast puzzles. Jump into the comic world, arrange illustrations and reveal the chain of events behind her explosive tantrums.

Title: Upstairs
ShortDescription: Inspired by the difficult controls of QWOP, Upstairs puts you in control of each calf and thigh as you attempt the seemingly simple task of walking.

Title: Packs of Panties
ShortDescription: Unbox the fun in this puzzle game! Align and match as many underwears as you can with the correct boxes to win!

Title: End Them, Soldier!
ShortDescription: Fast, brutal old‑school FPS with deep replayability through skill builds. Tailor specific builds with speed‑boost jumps, a burst‑fire explosive revolver, AXE SHOOTING as a shotgun and beyond in a handcrafted campaign, then climb the leaderboards in endless roguelike mode.

Title: BUY SELL
ShortDescription: BUY SELL은 물건을 사고파는 덱빌딩 로그라이크 게임입니다. 최대한 좋은 상품을 조합하고, 손님과의 거래를 통해 수익을 올려 악덕 상회로부터 가게를 지켜내세요!

Title: A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition
ShortDescription: A Planet of Mine Mastermine Edition is a cozy 4X game with mass strategy! Choose your winning gang, mastermine resources, and build your base and tools to boost your technology and conquer space! Unless your neighbors don’t see it that way… Trade, peace or clash: your planet, your choice!

Title: King Static
ShortDescription: King Static is a third-person stylish action rogue-like where you fight in the King's endlessly repeating tournament in-order to have a single wish granted.

Title: Rewoven Self
ShortDescription: Rewoven Self is a narrative puzzle game where fantasy and reality intertwine. Through folding, cutting, and stitching, you rebuild yourself in a cycle of brokenness and renewal— a gentle yet profound journey of emotional healing.

Title: Rewoven Self
ShortDescription: Rewoven Self is a narrative puzzle game where fantasy and reality intertwine. Through folding, cutting, and stitching, you rebuild yourself in a cycle of brokenness and renewal— a gentle yet profound journey of emotional healing.

Title: Ms Vampire Love to Date with Me
ShortDescription: 《Ms Vampire Love to Date with Me》 is a multi-ending ADV that depicts the player and Irene (a vampire) living together during summer vacation.

Title: ピザとお酒と萃香ちゃんと！
ShortDescription: 酔いすぎと酒切れに気を付けながら、酒を飲みつつ客の注文に応じてピザを完成させていこう！

Title: Kickback Clicker
ShortDescription: Mutants are flooding the planets! Destroy them all! Improve your technology, upgrade weapons and turn dangerous worlds into safe havens. Every click is a step towards the future of mankind!

Title: A Pizza Delivery
ShortDescription: A Pizza Delivery is a narrative exploration game with puzzle elements focused on connecting with people. Share pizza with charming characters to uncover their stories—and your own. Drive and explore a strange, meditative world filled with secrets.

Title: Towers Heritage
ShortDescription: Defend yourself to victory, design your own towers and play offline or online in this tribute to the Tower defense genre

Title: Tiny Auto Knights
ShortDescription: A chill PvP auto battler where you build your team on a 3x3 grid. Recruit and upgrade unique heroes, strategically place them on the battlefield and find the best synergies.

Title: Anima Gate of Memories: I&II Remaster
ShortDescription: A third-person action RPG that brings to life the world of Gaia from the Anima: Beyond Fantasy RPG table-top books. Explore a deep and multifaceted story where your choices and actions directly impact the journey and decide the fate of the characters.

Title: CoThrust
ShortDescription: In the darkness of space, you are not alone. The thrusters are yours. Alone or with a friend, hold your course, resist the chaos, and reach the rescue ship. One controls the left thruster, the other the right. But be careful—when the thrusters overheat, they lose all power.

Title: Total Reload
ShortDescription: Help Artificial Intelligence named HAWKING activate an incredible mechanism that can reload the Universe!

Title: INTO EVIL
ShortDescription: Hotline Miami x Dark Souls. Greatswords, demons, miniguns; up to 4 players. You are not prepared.

Title: Unhinged Pet Store Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own crazy pet store! Buy wares, stock shelves, raise crabs, defend the store from the local thieving animals, hire workers and try to keep your store tidy while taking payment from impatient customers.

Title: Sibling Souls
ShortDescription: Year 2147: In a city where androids and vampires rule, you're caught in the crossfire. Searching for your lost twin, who will you trust - and what are you willing to sacrifice? Every choice decides your fate - for better or worse - within this dark visual novel with multiple endings.

Title: Quizverse
ShortDescription: A relaxing quiz game with Free Play and 100-second modes. Test your knowledge of geography, history, sports, science and more – improve your high score and have fun doing it!

Title: Jump To Stratos
ShortDescription: Jump, tumble, and suffer your way up to the stratosphere in this high-stakes physics platformer where one wrong move can send you plummeting back down to the streets below!

Title: AnimaCircus
ShortDescription: Become a performing cat that does EVERYTHING in its own circus! Pick your visuals and show your talent as a feline artist.

Title: Zombie Chef
ShortDescription: Grind zombie limbs for ingredients and get missing supplies from the store. Every recipe demands precision; even a small mistake can be costly. Reinforce your doors and set traps. As the Blood Moon approaches, be ready to survive the night.

Title: Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores
ShortDescription: Embark on a heartfelt Mushroomvania adventure through a vast and dense interconnected world! It's like a mix of retro and modern classics!

Title: Free For Fall
ShortDescription: A 3D party platformer where you grab obstacles from a shared box, place them on the course, then race through the deadly gauntlet you all created. Outsmart your friends while surviving your own traps!

Title: Skopje '83
ShortDescription: Explore a city thrust into disarray by an unknown event and survive the hordes of mutated abominations that lurk at every corner. You’ll have to fight through enemies & bosses, scavenge loot and survive the hostile city.

Title: Astro Flame: Starfighter
ShortDescription: You are the last pilot standing against an enemy fleet. Upgrade your starfighter, face epic bosses, and survive the chaos of space battles. Astro Flame: Starfighter is a fast-paced arcade shoot ‘em up in the spirit of the classics.

Title: The Last Zone
ShortDescription: Blend third-person action with strategic base defense. Swap weapons, upgrade traps, and manage resources; push your limits against dynamic waves and unique enemies. Can you survive the apocalypse?

Title: Restaurats
ShortDescription: Lead a medieval restaurant with a team of rats like you! Cook the food, throw it at the guests, wipe the drinks under the skeletons! Become a legendary rat chef, proving to orcs and vampires that the most delicious bloody meat is served in your restaurant!

Title: ChessBoxing Championship
ShortDescription: Train your mind and body in ChessBoxing Championship. Rise through 50 opponents in Career Mode, unlock new skills, gear and arenas, master mini-games, and shape a true champion through strategy and skill.

Title: JumpMap
ShortDescription: JumpMap is an exciting first-person 3D platformer that features a special mechanic: every time you fall, you get put back to where you were before. Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!

Title: Super Market Brawl
ShortDescription: Quick question, do you like SAVING MONEY! That is the name of the game. From completing a shopping list to checking out with all items on sale, you can save tons of money! Which can then be used for more upgrades to your cart, making you a better shopper!

Title: TRACE Definitive Edition
ShortDescription: A point-and-click escape game set on a strange, desolate planet. Collect items and solve puzzles to unravel the mystery of this cryptic world.

Title: Romcab Puzzle
ShortDescription: Romcab is a cube-based puzzle game featuring beautiful levels and a wide variety of artistic styles. A challenge that appeals to players of all ages. Put on your favorite music, relax, and enjoy Romcab—where logic meets good vibes.

Title: Little Droid 2: Escape
ShortDescription: "Little Droid 2: Escape" is a classic 2D (Metroidvania) side-scrolling pixel art adventure where you need to find a way to escape a mysterious planet.

Title: Payout - Shop Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own store in this shop simulation game. Manage your warehouse, drive around the city, stock shelves, set prices, hire workers and keep customers happy as you grow your business from a small store to a busy supermarket.

Title: 99Managers Futsal Edition
ShortDescription: An open-source Futsal team-management game. Build a world-class Futsal team, find new talents and a tactic that fits your play style. Become the best Futsal Manager and win all competitions on national and international levels.

Title: My Little Spider
ShortDescription: Adopt a cute pet spider that lives anywhere on your desktop! Team up to discover unique bugs, decorate their web, and unlock adorable spider hats as you work or relax.

Title: Ancible Online
ShortDescription: Ancible Online is a free-to-play 2D MMORPG set in the world of Veridia that features classic MMO mechanics - Explore, Craft, and Battle with your friends to discover the secret of the Ancible.

Title: THRASHER
ShortDescription: THRASHER is an award-winning arcade odyssey and audiovisual experience. Guide a magnificent space eel, elegantly swooping and thrashing it through mesmerizing alien worlds in the ultimate race for survival. Dive into the circle-based combo system, and play any way you like on PC, VR and Steam Deck.

Title: The Visitor Effect: Not an experiment
ShortDescription: What if your whole world was a lie? Solve clever puzzles and face incredible challenges to escape the faulty simulation that keeps you captive. Question reality and unravel a dark conspiracy while dodging security systems in this innovative puzzle-strategy adventure.

Title: BattleGroupVR2
ShortDescription: BattleGroupVR2 is a virtual reality real-time space strategy where you explore the galaxy and lead a fleet of powerful warships from the bridge of your flagship. Explore, mine, trade, hunt. Grow your fleet, upgrade your ships, train your captains, and battle the enemy from the captain's chair.

Title: Weeks Till Winter
ShortDescription: In a dark study with a Book of Worlds and a handful of wooden buildings, you are cursed to build until you've unlocked the secrets of your mysterious past. This is an enigmatic score-based strategy game blending puzzle and city-builder mechanics.

Title: OPEN YOUR EYES
ShortDescription: Fix your gaze on this grid-based puzzle game as you progress through levels by opening every eye. Discover eyes of different styles and properties and earn top ranks by focusing your vision and clearing stages with the least possible moves.

Title: Cosmonade
ShortDescription: Cosmonade is a real-time competitive PvP game — pilot a ship and destroy everything! Designed for players who enjoy gameplay that’s both simple and demanding... Face off against other players in matches where skill, team coordination, and reflexes make all the difference.

Title: Conquer Lands
ShortDescription: The king has died without an heir. Lords are battling for the throne. Build your own unique deck of cards and units, battle against challenging lords and and be the king!

Title: HoloSeeker
ShortDescription: A deckbuilding roguelite RPG featuring hololive members.

Title: Find My MOM
ShortDescription: Find Your MOM

Title: Hypogea
ShortDescription: Escape from a mysterious underground megastructure in this short atmospheric 3d-platformer.

Title: Paradyce
ShortDescription: Experience the never-ending story of YOU trying to fulfil a promise YOU forgot. Collect resources, find allies, and turn your tiny grid into a shield for Cynthia.

Title: ฺBobToTheTop
ShortDescription: Bob to the top is a climbing game that you need to control. The Main character, Bob, goes to the top of the map to win the game. You can jump and stick to the wall to help Bob reach His goal.

Title: wozitdev's 3D Chess
ShortDescription: wozitdev's take on the classic game of chess. Fully 3D, supporting standard chess rules and custom variants as well as having a planned campaign mode to be included with the release out of early access.

Title: Voicemail of God
ShortDescription: God is on vacation, and you’re the one answering the prayers. Shape destinies with absurd choices in this satirical narrative adventure full of comedy, melancholy, and multiple endings.

Title: Into The Grid
ShortDescription: Become a master hacker in this Cyberpunk Roguelike Deckbuilder. Explore the dangers of cyberspace and fight evil corporations. Build and upgrade a deck of powerful programs. Unlock perks and skills, and unleash digital hell on your enemies. Dive Into The Grid!

Title: Skyformer
ShortDescription: Create an automated system that terraforms a planet with an army of drones. Build bases, set up a weather monitoring system, prepare to survive different types of storms, and take control of the climate and biomes!

Title: Business Simulator 2026
ShortDescription: In Business Simulator 2026, you start with a small capital and aim to build a business empire in the city by deciding which business to start in which shop and deciding the prices. Business Simulator 2026 is a business simulation that will test your business acumen and strategic planning skills.

Title: Verho - Curse of Faces
ShortDescription: Verho, a Dark RPG following the tradition of the King’s Field series, takes place after the catastrophic Era of Solitude, where masks have become the only protection against the Curse of Faces. Travel to the land of Yariv, find the source of this scourge and face its dangers.

Title: Trap Golf
ShortDescription: Minigolf game with 2 levels. Avoid different obstacles and traps

Title: School of Magic: Deck & Slash
ShortDescription: Every run in School of Magic is about building a new hack and slash character from scratch, but the level system is a deckbuilding card game. With each level, your spell pool grows and mutates into a unique skill tree, leading to outrageous broken builds.

Title: Moose Diver
ShortDescription: You’re a moose on a diving adventure. Swim into the ocean and vacuum coins from the seabed. Sell the coins and earn money to upgrade and buy new gear. Swim deeper and find treasure chests to collect power boosting artefacts, but don’t forget to keep an eye on your oxygen level.

Title: Another Where
ShortDescription: A card-based roguelike adventure with mystery and investigation. Explore strange worlds, gather powerful cards, and build your deck to overcome unexpected challenges. Every run is a new story. Game accessible even to younger audiences.

Title: Desktop Town
ShortDescription: Desktop Town is a relaxing idle city builder that runs directly on your desktop. Build and decorate your own tiny town, or watch your little citizens go about their day, while doing your usual tasks on the PC.

Title: Avatars
ShortDescription: Create, share, and play with AI-powered avatars. Design intelligent characters, publish them, and explore what other players make.

Title: Shard Squad
ShortDescription: Form a squad of elemental creatures and face hordes of challenging enemies! Choose your Shards according to their synergies to gain new abilities, and equip relics that will make the winds blow in your favor! Survive through different environments and save your lands!

Title: Die For The Lich
ShortDescription: Gather magical dice, adapt your gear and venture through a land haunted by folklore creatures.

Title: Creating New World
ShortDescription: This is a building game. We have redesigned the building structure and logic. Breaking down a building into basic forms and units, these basic units can be directly used, or create more forms. Players can freely build objects by selecting building forms, choosing the quantity, specifying the color.

Title: Go Kart Island
ShortDescription: An open world kart racer! Use items, driftslide and boost your way to championship glory as you help Lachlan the highland cow complete his lifelong dream of winning the BIG RACE and becoming Go Kart Champion.

Title: Detective Modo
ShortDescription: A mystery adventure game where you play as a shapeshifting lizard, transforming into any NPC to unlock unique dialogue, solve intricate puzzles, and complete diverse quests to unravel a town's secrets.

Title: Ambrosia Sky
ShortDescription: You left. Now they’re dead. Ambrosia Sky: Act One is an immersive sim about exploring an asteroid colony devastated by a mysterious contamination. Survive and harvest strains of aggressive alien fungi, explore treacherous environments, and find meaning and beauty in so much death.

Title: Sushi Cat Legacy Collection
ShortDescription: He’s round. He’s hungry. He’s back! Help your feline friend eat all the sushi (and find love) in this bundle of squishy puzzle classics! This collection includes the original Sushi Cat, Sushi Cat The Honeymoon, Sushi Cat 2, The Great Purrade, Sushi Cat-a-Pult, and more...

Title: Where the Roads Die
ShortDescription: This is a visual novel with quest elements and the atmosphere of a journey through an Eastern European post-apocalypse. You are a Vagrant heading west, leaving your home behind.

Title: Mini Heroes: Squad Online
ShortDescription: Fast-paced 2D online arena shooter for up to four players. Choose from over 20 weapons, customize your heroes, and dominate intense PvP battles.

Title: Dragonhold
ShortDescription: Dragonhold is a Single Player / COOP Dragon riding RPG with crafting and base building! Soar through the skies of Aval, and dive into the deepest dungeons, challenging wondrous creatures and uncovering ancient mysteries. Gather resources and return to expand your castle town and rebuild Dragonhold.

Title: Parable Academy
ShortDescription: A one-button fighter that’ll have you hitting the books! Legends from classic fiction clash in 3 vs 3 tag battles. Unlock fighters in single-player skill challenges, then put your combos to the test in online play. Simple enough for newcomers to pick up, but plenty of strategic depth to be found!

Title: The Erased Student
ShortDescription: First-person horror game set in an abandoned Soviet-era school. You play as a Russian father whose son vanished years ago. Explore the decaying building, read forgotten letters, follow clues, and uncover a dark and disturbing truth.

Title: VORON: Raven’s Story
ShortDescription: 🕊️🌳🗻You are a raven with an important task: guiding lost souls to their new home.
