In this story-driven adventure, you will master the art of flight, solve puzzles, explore a Norse-inspired open world, uncover dozens of secrets, and try to save the world from the inevitable RAGNAROK!

Title: A Game About Feeding A Black Hole
ShortDescription: A short incremental game about feeding a Black Hole matter by destroying Asteroids, Planets, and Stars.

Title: Mineral Madness
ShortDescription: Dig, fight, and sabotage your way to victory in a fast-paced multiplayer party brawler! Battle other moles in wild, random caves, build your loadout, and deposit your minerals to win.

Title: Proper Bullet Hell
ShortDescription: Roguelike Shooter Where Your Bullets Hurt You!

Title: Garden Monsters
ShortDescription: A game about raising and battling monsters, inspired by Monster Rancher. Raise monsters, battle monsters, rise through the ranks. A simple Monster Raising Simulator with RPG battle mechanics.

Title: Cozy Littlequarium
ShortDescription: Cozy Littlequarium is a relaxing aquarium simulator that sits at the bottom of your screen! Take care, breed them, collect and decorate!

Title: Surviving Mars: Relaunched
ShortDescription: The award-winning sci-fi city builder is back - remastered, expanded and even more stunning. Colonize Mars and survive the process, from exploration and infrastructure to welcoming colonists and achieving long-term stability. Are you ready? Mars is waiting.

Title: Hidden Cats by Louisselle
ShortDescription: Flip through the sketchbook of pixel artist Louisselle and find all the hidden kittens among her beautiful pixel art!

Title: OVERLOOK
ShortDescription: Search for missing people, lost objects, or even help people solve their problems by handing them over their required items. OVERLOOK is hand-drawn, cozy, relaxing, and funny. btw, watch! there might be a cat hidden in bushes.

Title: Inspiral: Echoes of Gravity
ShortDescription: Start as an asteroid, grow by absorbing other celestial bodies to become a planet, a star, and ultimately a black hole. Experience realistic gravity and orbital physics in an ever-evolving sandbox universe.

Title: Neuter Master
ShortDescription: A lighthearted roguelite breeding game where you match animals on a customizable grid, earn gold with slot-machine-style combos, and balance breeding, sterilizing, and upgrades to keep your herd thriving year after year.

Title: Chiaroscuro Imago
ShortDescription: A short piece of horror fiction about honey and lies; entomology and etymology; murky secrets and stark realities. Find out what happened to the moths.

Title: The Fat Cat Fest
ShortDescription: Fat Cat Fest is a party game full of minigames and challenges, where funny cats will compete to see who is the fastest and most skillful eater.

Title: Below the Crown
ShortDescription: Explore the dungeons Below the Crown, in this love letter to Roguelikes, Dungeon Crawlers, and Chess. Prepare for strategy, game-changing spells, psychological tests, and challenges from your fellow players.

Title: The Girl In White
ShortDescription: What seems like a miracle at first quickly reveals itself to be more of a nightmare, as Long realizes that restless Ghosts have always Surrounded Us—unseen, until now...

Title: Breakout Season
ShortDescription: Breakout Season is a ball-bouncing arcade roguelike. Aim carefully and harness the chaos to your advantage. Build game-breaking synergies, and destroy everything you can before the season ends!

Title: Escape from Hadrian's Wall
ShortDescription: As a prisoner in the fortress of Hadrian’s Wall, liberation is in your grasp as you unravel mysteries buried in the depths. In this immersive VR puzzle adventure, explore the Roman keep, claim your mystical apprenticeship, and immerse yourself in a tale that forever changes the course of history.

Title: A Case of Fraud
ShortDescription: A short non-linear detective adventure where every clue is hidden in plain sight. Carefully read and cross-reference documents to unravel a CEO’s disappearance and expose a case of fraud.

Title: Squabble
ShortDescription: Squabble is a dynamic Tower Defense-RTS hybrid where strategic resource management is key to fending off relentless waves of enemies.

Title: El 39
ShortDescription: Constitución, CABA. 3 AM. You leave a party, feeling defeated because the girl you liked didn't even look at you. You go to wait for the last "39" bus of that night. You try to stop it, but it goes straight away. Tomorrow you have the exam that defines whether you graduate or not. Good luck.

Title: Ascension: The Immortal Alchemist
ShortDescription: Ascension follows the trials and tribulations of an Immortal Alchemist and his quest throughout time to transmute humans in to gods. Players descend into an ancient labyrinth where their souls are tested by cosmic forces to challenge the limitations of their mortality. Do you have what it takes?

Title: Find The Key 2
ShortDescription: A door with no lock and walls blocking your path, you desperately need to find the key. Tackle simple challenges and puzzles while witnessing bizarre symbolic and metaphorical scenes. Will you be able to open the door?

Title: Yes, My Queen
ShortDescription: The chess roguelite. Play game-changing cards, bend the rules, save your Queen, and escape from the dungeon.

Title: Z.A.T.O. // I Love the World and Everything In It
ShortDescription: USSR, 1986. A girl goes missing in the closed city of Vorkuta-5, yet not a soul seems to be concerned. Uncover the mystery behind her disappearance and transmit your signal to the universe.

Title: FIREBALL
ShortDescription: "FIREBALL" is a physics-based platformer where you can experience the satisfaction of mastering strategies and improving your skills.

Title: Your Big, Cute Monster Farm
ShortDescription: Create a farm at the bottom of the screen and enjoy planting and harvesting with your monster companions! They handle all the work—just plan the layout, decorate, and wait for fun crop mutations. Take a break from busy life and enjoy the calm joy of farming.

Title: Touhou Iyuushou ~ What the Bullet Hell?!
ShortDescription: A Touhou Project fan-made bullet hell game inspired by Impossible Spell Card! Conquer creative, self-contained danmaku challenges using clever item strategies and sharp dodging skills. Collect stamps and prove your mastery! Prefer longer play sessions? Check out the Scene EX and PH challenges!

Title: Real Man Hotel
ShortDescription: Real Man Hotel is a psychological horror game where you are being pursued by the hotel receptionist. Your goal is to avoid being caught by her, otherwise... your body may not be able to withstand it. The game does not contain any scary scenes, so even the timid can play.

Title: Legacy
ShortDescription: On a journey filled with STEALTH and PUZZLE-SOLVING, you'll encounter threats and obstacles guarding the truth. Every clue brings you closer to uncovering your family's hidden legacy—and the horrors the Mighty Ones fought to silence.

Title: PLATFORM 0
ShortDescription: You’re trapped in a forgotten metro system, haunted by a ghost train that reacts to your every move. Explore dark tunnels, avoid deadly traps, and stay quiet — your survival depends on it. A first-person horror experience where silence is your only weapon.

Title: Pixel Combat: Zombie Shooter
ShortDescription: Pixel Combat Shooter is a pixel shooter where you have to fight for survival in a world plagued by zombie apocalypse. Defend your home from waves of zombies, build a time machine and fight unique bosses. Crafting, upgrades and a nostalgic atmosphere.

Title: Paplion
ShortDescription: Fight along with your Papling through the chapters of a mysterious book called Paplion! Explore unique places, befriend new Papling and evolve them to defeat your opponents in this classic style monster-catcher RPG and 2D platforming adventure.

Title: Mosh Pit Mayhem
ShortDescription: Every stage features three songs from real artists. Survive the first two, and when the final song drops, the band dives into the pit themselves. Power up your way, collect brass knuckles for boosted damage! No rules. No rails. Just you, the music, and the pit.

Title: Pix Eliz Great Trilogy
ShortDescription: Three quality games in one package! A short but sweet metroidvania with Pix Eliz 1, a unique mix of card game and platforming in Pix Eliz 2, and an adventurous platformer which constantly renew itself in Pix Eliz 3! Playable in english and in french!

Title: Possessor(s)
ShortDescription: Possessor(s) is a fast-paced action side scroller with combat inspired by platform fighters, a story told through dangerous characters, set in a deep interconnected world ready for exploration.

Title: Bittersweet Birthday
ShortDescription: Bittersweet Birthday is a story-driven action adventure where every combat encounter is a challenging and unique boss fight. Learn your enemy's patterns, plan your movements and tear down your opponent in fierce battles that combine Souls-like dodge roll mechanics with bullet hell mayhem.

Title: Lumines Arise
ShortDescription: A mind-blowing, fiendishly addictive reinvention of the puzzle classic Lumines from the creators of Tetris® Effect: Connected, where sound pulses through your body, mind, and every block you place, triggering dazzling visuals synched to the driving beat of an infectious, eclectic soundtrack.

Title: Sacred 2 Remaster
ShortDescription: Step into the world of Ancaria as one of six heroes. Explore a massive open world and master combat arts and spells for epic loot. This remaster brings a fan-favorite back to life — with hi-res textures, better combat and bugfixes, for longtime fans and newcomers alike.

Title: a.sector
ShortDescription: a.sector is a multiplayer, top-down space shooter. Collect loot, earn coins, play with friends! See if you can summon the boss or conquer some dark elite enemies!

Title: Unpetrified: Echoes of Nature
ShortDescription: Be a stone Golem and try to save Nature with the help of an adorable Fox! Reconnect ancient sources of energy in environmental puzzles. Discover secrets from a lost civilization and save animals on an emotional quest in a cozy, colorful world.

Title: Let Them Come: Onslaught
ShortDescription: Survive the relentless offensive of the alien horde in Let Them Come: Onslaught, a sci-fi survival roguelite. The pursuit of the perfect build and an ever-expanding arsenal of abilities are the keys to your success.

Title: Fatal Grounds
ShortDescription: Fatal Grounds is a tough adventure platformer about traversing a hostile world to get back to your home world.

Title: Anyone in the house？
ShortDescription: You are trapped in a strange resort, and every night you need to turn on the lights and check the entire room to ensure there is no danger before going to sleep. Once something goes wrong, the long night will loop endlessly.

Title: Windswept
ShortDescription: 🦆 Marbles and 🐢 Checkers need your help finding their way home after being swept away in a storm. In this 90s buddy-platformer there's a ton of stuff to do and even more to collect!

Title: Highway 11
ShortDescription: Inspired by liminal horror, Highway 11 is a psychological horror anomaly detection game, an evolution of hidden-object titles. You awaken at an intersection. All roads lead back to the start. Observe your surroundings carefully to escape the endless loop and uncover the mystery of why you’re here…

Title: Wall World 2
ShortDescription: The adventure in the mysterious world of the Wall continues! Pilot your robospider into its depths, uncover lost artifacts and technologies, upgrade your exosuit and spider, and battle the horrors lurking in the dark. Unravel the mysteries buried in the depths of the Wall!

Title: Goodnight Universe
ShortDescription: You are Isaac, a 6-month-old baby, developing mysterious psychic powers. What you want most is to be loved and accepted by your family, but a secretive tech corporation wants you for their own.

Title: NASCAR 25
ShortDescription: iRacing is proud to present NASCAR 25, the official game of NASCAR featuring ALL FOUR National Series, the ARCA Menards Series, NASCAR Xfinity Series, NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, and NASCAR Cup Series.

Title: Schematic Void
ShortDescription: Point-and-click, an anti-horror adventure with a mashed fourth wall, stylish minimalistic graphics, a relaxing plot and other advantages.

Title: Rue Valley
ShortDescription: Rue Valley is a narrative RPG about a man trapped in a time loop, surrounded by a colorful cast with complex emotional stories, each hiding unexpected secrets. Dealing with mental challenges, the main character must rise from the depths, delving into the anomaly to uncover its enigmatic origins.

Title: NEODITRONIX
ShortDescription: THE DREAMCORE RHYTHM EXPERIENCE

Title: Koshchei The Immortal
ShortDescription: Help Koshchei the Immortal reclaim his power in an old-school action RPG. No fluff. Kill – Level Up – Grow Stronger – Repeat.

Title: Spires of Morosith: Gossamer Sundered
ShortDescription: Spires of Morosith is a tactical tower defense game with a blend of real-time-strategy elements.

Title: Nitronic Rush
ShortDescription: Nitronic Rush is an experimental survival driving game. Using the car’s many abilities (including boost, wings, and jump), avoid obstacles that the city throws at you. In many ways the game is a tribute to racing games of the 1990s but with fresh graphics, audio, and gameplay.

Title: Twisted Toys
ShortDescription: Pack toys. Ship orders. Finish the shift. And repeat. Twisted Toy is a psychological horror game where your nightly routine reveals you’re not alone.

Title: Swords and Sandals 3 Redux
ShortDescription: A legend returns! The beloved classic Swords and Sandals 3 is back, re-forged in glory! Step back into the Gladiae Ultratus once more and prepare to take on the greatest gladiators in all Brandor. It's the hardest, most metal gladiator game ever made.

Title: Pet Oddities: Desktop Shelter
ShortDescription: Here’s a chill casual collection sim game! In another dimensional world, you’ll use an old book to keep collecting all sorts of cute, weird, funny creatures in different styles. Your aim? Track down the oldest one and become the ultimate collection master! And yeah, this game will keep updating！

Title: Faith in Despair
ShortDescription: Forge your own cards with triggers, actions and modifiers. Shape your deck and gamble against Death itself. Make one mistake and you will descend into despair.

Title: Million Depth
ShortDescription: Craft original weapons and engage in strategic time-freezing battles as you dive into the million-floor deep underground world of this deep-diving action strategy game.

Title: Neon Highways
ShortDescription: Welcome to a retro-futuristic '80s world of supercars, neon-lit cities, and synthwave beats. Neon Highways is a minimalist casual arcade racer where you cruise through vibrant cityscapes and endless highways, all set to an iconic synthwave soundtrack.

Title: Egypt Frontiers
ShortDescription: Dive into the sands of ancient Egypt in 'Egypt Frontiers.' As a master builder, construct majestic monuments, manage resources, and shape history in this captivating simulation game. Are you ready to leave your mark on the Frontiers of Egypt?

Title: Heavy Burden VR
ShortDescription: An atmospheric first-person VR platformer about precision and challenge: carry a heavy stone through ruins, collapsing platforms, and flying obstacles. Single-player.

Title: Pursuit
ShortDescription: You are an illegal courier in a city where speed is survival and the law never sleeps. Deliver forbidden cargo, outsmart police, and master the streets. Every ride is a challenge— one mistake could cost everything.

Title: GVD
ShortDescription: The bouncing logo screensaver game you always daydreamed of. An auto battler for disc format enthusiasts.

Title: Hero of the Hive
ShortDescription: Take flight in this casual adventure game as a bee on a mission to save your crumbling hive. With the Queen mysteriously missing, it's up to you to gather resources to rebuild, explore the vast basin, and embark on quests to help the animals of nature as you become the hero your hive needs!

Title: CYCLIA JOURNEY
ShortDescription: This title, CYCLIA JOURNEY, is a 2D puzzle action game set in a geometric world where everything is governed by the “The Law of Replication & Re-creation”

Title: Bunker Constructor Simulator
ShortDescription: A simulator in which you have to build bunkers. Complete contracts from the city government and citizens to earn money to buy your own house and build your own protected underground bunker.

Title: Tabletop Game Shop Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own tabletop game shop! Stock shelves, glue & paint minis, battle customers on game night, and grow your store into the ultimate nerd paradise.

Title: Tamamoji
ShortDescription: A little clicker game where you take care of a Tamamoji, an emoji with a changing mood. Click to accumulate points and keep your emoji alive as long as possible!

Title: Merp in Merpworld
ShortDescription: be merp. be in merpworld. 🍃

Title: Winter Burrow
ShortDescription: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals.

Title: SilentWard
ShortDescription: Play as a journalist drawn into a forgotten asylum. Solve puzzles, hide from threats, and piece together the truth.

Title: Divine's Howl
ShortDescription: In Divine's Howl, you will embody a divine avatar, leading your followers to expand your power across a shattered world.

Title: The Third
ShortDescription: Two have been reborn. One remains in the shadows. Explore a cursed temple, uncover ancient secrets, and survive a gripping and terrifying journey through forgotten gods and darkness.

Title: Love at The Milky Way Diner
ShortDescription: An inclusive, cozy, sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.

Title: Hymer 2000
ShortDescription: Hymer 2000 is an interactive text puzzle game, where players freely converse with the "Hymer" and use an open "Search" function to retrieve past conversations. By discovering keywords, gathering clues, and collecting "Faces", players uncover Hymer's secrets and ultimately shut it down.

Title: WeedEx: Drug Express Delivery
ShortDescription: Start as a street dealer and rise to criminal power — produce and distribute various illegal substances across the dark streets of Hyland Point. Expand your empire by purchasing property, growing your business, acquiring new cars, and building a powerful underground network.

Title: Detective Malinowski The Truth Will Be Revealed
ShortDescription: A body discovered. Two people missing. You – a detective who hears more than others want to see.  Narrative noir game – sound guides you, sketches tell the story.

Title: Casa De Diamantes
ShortDescription: Accompany agent Steph, right hand of the revered forbidden flower, on the hunt for their final rival residing in the beautiful and glamorous casino, the Casa De Diamantes.

Title: Fracturefront
ShortDescription: Fracturefront is a fantasy third-person 3D action roguelike. Centered on random equipment, it delivers a variable and strategically deep combat experience. Players take on the role of a warrior who travels through rifts to stop enemies from seizing the energy core.

Title: The Earthen Reign
ShortDescription: Long ago, a dying world forced mankind to flee beneath the surface, forging a new civilization in the depths — the Earthen Reign. Now, generations later, the time has come to reclaim the surface.

Title: Heat 'n Hit: The Blacksmith Simulator
ShortDescription: You are a blacksmith in a medieval fantasy world. Take over your missing grandfather's workshop, forge legendary weapons, and rise from apprentice to legend. Explore distant cities, gather rare materials, and uncover the mystery behind your grandfather's disappearance.

Title: Hunter: The Reckoning — A Time of Monsters
ShortDescription: Topple the vampires from the streets below! Will you unite the homeless, the gangs, and the secret hunter societies to defy vampiric rule? An interactive novel set in the World of Darkness extended universe.

Title: Little Corners
ShortDescription: Peel, place, and arrange stickers across tiny windows into different worlds. Relax and unwind to lofi beats, collect unique stickers and share your cozy creations with the world.

Title: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road
ShortDescription: The latest entry in the character collection and football simulation RPG series, "Inazuma Eleven!" With an original story featuring new main characters, over 5,400 players from across the series' history to collect and train, as well as exciting online tournaments, you can play the game your way!

Title: Assetto Corsa Rally
ShortDescription: Assetto Corsa Rally is a high-fidelity rally sim built for precision and challenge. With 3D laser-scanned stages and cars, professional co-driver support, and dynamic conditions, it delivers a demanding, immersive experience where every second behind the wheel counts.

Title: After Death
ShortDescription: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...

Title: Okinawa Journal
ShortDescription: A point-and-click mystery game set during the summer of 2000 in the mysterious landscapes of Okinawa. You play as Kami, a guardian angel tasked with guiding Haruki, a struggling journalist, as he delves into the baffling disappearance of a beloved actress.

Title: AirShooShoo
ShortDescription: AirShooShoo is a precision platformer but you fly. Avoid obstacles and collect stars across levels of increasing difficulty. Features real-time multiplayer with time trials and a Worms-like free-for-all mode. A mix of Lunar Lander and Head-On.

Title: Max Manos 2
ShortDescription: Max Manos is back with a destructive incremental adventure. Climb a 201-floor tower swarming with monsters. Destroy enemies, unlock powerful abilities, and upgrade into an unstoppable hand of destruction. Reach the top and face the ultimate challenge.

Title: GIGASWORD
ShortDescription: Balance the weight of the GIGASWORD, battling between brain and brawn. Solve intricate puzzles, discover covert chambers, and slash through foes as Ezra fights to reach the top of the Nestrium and recover the God Crystal within. Can he restore the world's coherency before it's too late?

Title: Soba's Gunpaw
ShortDescription: Soba’s Gunpaw is a Short Incremental - Bullet Heaven game. Destroy everything, collect resources, then choose upgrades from a massive skill tree! Designed to be completed in around 4 hours.

Title: Ratman
ShortDescription: Ratman is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. A creature called “Ratman” is terrorizing local dwarfs. You and your fellow brave dwarf knights decide to sneak into his lair in order to burn his supplies. Find matches and burn his cheese stock, but don't get caught by the murderous Ratman!

Title: Trail of Stars
ShortDescription: A short and (bitter)sweet fairy-tale visual novel about first love and longing.

Title: Dynasthir
ShortDescription: In its dying breath, Dynasthir beckons. Bestowed upon you is a vast obscure world inviting methodical exploration, skillful combat & profound moments of awe. Push into the unknown & maybe you'll live to tell your tale. The world is dying, will you persist?

Title: Stickman: Waves Of Doom
ShortDescription: Stickman: Waves of Doom is a horde survivor game with minimalistic graphics where endless enemies crash down upon you in waves of pure chaos and destruction while maintaining steady FPS.

Title: Protean Fox
ShortDescription: "Protean Fox" is a bullet shooting game that combines elements of creature capture and light roguelike gameplay. Players will take on the role of a girl who gains the power of the Protean Fox. In her quest to reclaim the Foxfire, she wields weapons and magical artifacts from different worlds.

Title: RocketShip Go Up
ShortDescription: Navigate treacherous caverns in RocketShip Go Up, a physics-based 3D game. Master your thrusters to deliver packages, dodge beams, turrets, and falling debris—or speedrun for the fastest flight. Precision is your lifeline.

Title: ClickWave
ShortDescription: Atmospheric clicker for relaxation and sound exploration. Take a break from the routine and create your own unique melody.

Title: BioKept
ShortDescription: This is a auto battler with Diablo-like Item Looting. There are 72+ creatures in this version and several dungeons to grind. If you like item looting/character collection and also like grinding, this might be your type.

Title: Mage of Tempest Castle
ShortDescription: The game mechanics include card combinations, resource management, and tactical deployment. Whether building a powerful army or using extreme tactics, experience becoming a magic master, commanding the battlefield, and defeating the enemy forces in each level.

Title: Caemdale
ShortDescription: Build your city and expand your deck in CAEMDALE, a single-player deckbuilding roguelike. Plan your turns carefully, assemble a powerful deck, defend against enemy raids and encounter new strategical policies and disruptive revolutions in every run!

Title: Frogshot
ShortDescription: A skill-based platformer where you control a frog with nothing but its tongue. Swing like a grappling hook, launch like a slingshot, and overcome deadly obstacles across a variety of handcrafted worlds — each with its own unique twist.

Title: Desktop Fishes
ShortDescription: A cozy idle aquarium overlay that brings your desktop to life with pixel-art fish you can hatch, breed, and collect in thousands of genetic combinations. Dress them up with accessories, watch them grow from eggs to adults, and unlock playful upgrades through a quirky skill tree.

Title: Floor 13
ShortDescription: In Floor13, reality doesn’t change all at once — it shifts quietly, waiting for you to notice.You walk the same office corridor over and over, but something always feels… slightly off.Your task is simple: observe, detect, report. If you fail to see the difference, the corridor will keep you forever.

Title: Sisyphus Is a Bug
ShortDescription: As punishment for dirtying Olympus's marble halls, Sisyphus, the dung beetle, must push his ball of dung up and down Mount Olympus every day, for the rest of his life. That is, unless he can complete the seemingly impossible task of reaching Olympus before the sun sets

Title: Hot and Lovely : Purple
ShortDescription: "Hot and Lovely: Purple" uses the mouse to drag the pattern, and every three identical patterns can be eliminated when they are in a straight line. When you eliminate specific targets and reach the required number, you can pass the level and unlock the sweet moments of the girls

Title: Trial of Ariah
ShortDescription: A tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Strategically use runes on a mystical grid to cast spells and battle enemies. Escape through three distinct realms - fiery, terrestrial, and celestial - as you navigate branching paths that change with every playthrough in your quest to reach Ariah.

Title: Fraud Camp: Survival Escape
ShortDescription: “Fraud Park: Survival Escape” is a stealth-survival adventure. Trapped in a guarded compound of patrols and cameras, you must search for tools, keycards, and intel to escape. Every noise risks exposure—distract, evade, or fight back. Choices lead to escape, rescue, or exposing the park.

Title: Fit My Dog
ShortDescription: Help your doggy friends relax after playing and find a perfect nap spot!

Title: Snail Mail
ShortDescription: Race to deliver THE letter first in this strategic, card-based, online board game for 2 or 4 players 🐌 Use powerful ability cards to speed ahead or sabotage rivals. Place blocks, lay traps & think two steps ahead each turn. Bring in varied card packs for a fresh, chaotic challenge every game! ⚔️

Title: PolyCrime
ShortDescription: Build your mafia empire from scratch in a living, breathing city where every decision has consequences and every deal could be a trap.

Title: Disco Samurai
ShortDescription: Disco Samurai is a unique cyberpunk rhythm combat game. Master the art of perfectly timed parries and dodges to throw your enemies off balance and finish them off with devastating counter attacks. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!

Title: Гвалт
ShortDescription: Collect words, find powerful combinations of boosters, and achieve the highest score! In this dynamic word game, you will find dozens of artifacts, unusual upgrades, and colorful characters who are ready to raise a ruckus!

Title: Casino Los Pixels
ShortDescription: A casino gambling game with no microtransactions or in-game purchases.

Title: Space Tournament
ShortDescription: Drift like a legend in this zero-gravity racing game! Master tight controls, dodge deadly traps, build custom missions, and rise on the global leaderboards. No drag, no brakes, just two engines. It’s all about momentum and timing. Feel the perfection!

Title: Where Winds Meet
ShortDescription: Where Winds Meet is an epic Wuxia open-world action-adventure RPG set in ancient China at the tenth century. Players will assume the role of a young sword master as they embark on a journey to uncover the mysteries of their own identity. Let the wind carry your legend on an epic journey to the East!

Title: CLAWPUNK
ShortDescription: Play as fierce feline heroes and battle villainous gangs to reclaim Feral City in this chaotic arcade adventure. Scratch, claw, and unleash your fury as adrenaline propels you through destructible environments.

Title: Blacksmith Simulator
ShortDescription: Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a medieval simulation that combines survival, building, and trade. Gather wood and ore to develop your base and character, forge powerful weapons, and survive across three regions themed around Snow, Castles, and Egypt. Fight monsters and grow through trade!

Title: Kesselgrad
ShortDescription: KESSELGRAD is a bullet hell shooter in which you play as a fighter pilot trying to uncover the mystery of the cursed city.

Title: Starbrew Station
ShortDescription: Manage a bustling space station café in this sci-fi idle game! Hire quirky alien baristas, automate your coffee empire across 5 unique decks, and survive chaotic Rush Hour events for massive rewards. Prestige to unlock powerful, permanent upgrades.

Title: Linkies
ShortDescription: Linkies — Stay connected with your friends! The stronger your link, the faster you run and the higher you jump. Team up in chaotic space courses — drift apart, and you’ll slow down!

Title: Gun in a Well
ShortDescription: Gun in a Well is an action roguelike where the only way to dodge is to shoot. Jump around using recoil, kill enemies with bullets, destroy them with electricity or burn them to crisp. Manage health and ammo, choose your upgrades, break the game and reach the bottom of the well!

Title: TOJIBO
ShortDescription: Team up with a friend in this two-player co-op adventure! Help the robots T0J1 and J1B0 climb to the top by solving puzzles and coordinating with your partner!

Title: Beyond R: Rule Ripper
ShortDescription: An evolving death game set in a bar, where getting to know its players is the only way out. Each person hides one of the game's rules. Discover them through their pasts, tastes, and finding hidden clues, then face them in an all-out discussion. Only three can survive, unless you fight back.

Title: SCHROTT
ShortDescription: SCHROTT - the roguelite driving game: Pull off insane stunts, collect valuable loot, and customize your absurd vehicle.

Title: Dark Atlas: Infernum
ShortDescription: If hell is a state of the soul, these are the steps that will lead you to its gates. Dark Atlas: Infernum is a disturbing first-person story where an esoteric end of the world meets psychological survival horror with a strong narrative component.

Title: Astro Busters
ShortDescription: Have You Been Waiting for a Modern Take on Classic Asteroid Shooters? 🚀 Your wait might just be over! Astro Busters brings you a fun space shooter with realistic physics, responsive controls and thrilling arcade action. Take on missions, upgrade your weapons, ships and fight solo or in multiplayer.

Title: Rice & Rest
ShortDescription: Rice & Rest is a cozy narrative game where running a food truck leads to unexpected friendships. Cook meals and chat with quirky, heartfelt, and weird characters in a modern-fantasy city. Stuck far from home, you’ll soon find that food has a way of bringing people together.

Title: Project DINOZ
ShortDescription: The single-player survival horror game where you're hunted by intelligent dinosaurs across a vast island and underground facilities. Use stealth, strategy, and limited resources to outsmart the apex predators of a lost world.

Title: Dream Slayers
ShortDescription: Enter the realm of the Dream Slayers, a medieval-themed Extraction RPG where you battle nightmares, survive raids, and escape with powerful loot... or lose it all.

Title: Imortel
ShortDescription: Experience a bullet hell set in a cursed village. Survive waves of enemies using your guns, abilities, and reflexes. Purchase upgrades or take them from your enemies. Survive if you can. Explore if you dare!

Title: Simply Unstable
ShortDescription: Utilize your strange stability shifting abilities to delve deeper into the depths of Old Fairy and solve the mystery of what is causing the Planet's odd effects.

Title: Escape from Tarkov
ShortDescription: Escape from Tarkov is the original extraction FPS where every raid is a gamble with death. Prep your raid, bleed, endure and fight through ruthless PMC players and Scavs, gain tactical advantage and cling to your loot — only extraction decides if you live or lose it all.

Title: Magic Kingdom
ShortDescription: Self moving chess, RTS, Meat pigeon game. In the game, you will control the hero, lead a powerful army, release powerful magic, have a strong city defense, and coordinate resource collection to resist the enemy's strong attack

Title: Shelldiver
ShortDescription: Take a deep breath and dive right into this cozy incremental game about a senior turtle trying to start a business selling jellyfish. Upgrade your equipment, explore biomes, and help your turtly village!

Title: Blade Tempest
ShortDescription: Blade Tempestis a 3D action Roguelike — tear through the cycle in an eternal storm, and carve your endless saga of slaughter with raging blades!

Title: CRYPTOBIOSIS
ShortDescription: 2004年，一款由校企合作研发的校园压力测试数字系统“全景测验”启动内测，计划未来用于招生阶段的考核。你将作为一名大众测试员参与到系统的内测工作中，检查并记忆超级中学跑操场景下的个体叙事，最终完成你的测验并与全球玩家同台排名。

Title: Farm of the unseen
ShortDescription: Something is wrong on this farm. Shadows and horrors lurk in its corners, waiting as you uncover buried secrets and solve twisted puzzles. Explore lakes, stables, and fields. Wander through mazes and cursed chambers. The unseen are waiting. They have always known you were coming.

Title: Kero Kero Cowboy
ShortDescription: Kero Kero Cowboy is a cartoony western themed platformer developed for the Game Boy Color! Use your extendable tongue, trusty six-shooter, and wits to conquer the wildest outlaws of the west. Yeehaw!

Title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
ShortDescription: Blast. Collect. Upgrade. Repeat. Void Miner is a retro-inspired roguelite asteroid shooter where you pilot a space ship and manage an automated tower to destroy endless fields of chaos. Dodge, blast, and harvest your way through waves of asteroids in a fast-paced loop of destruction and progression.

Title: LockYourDoor
ShortDescription: LockYourDoor is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror game. You are looking for your missing friend Darvin. Find him and do whatever it takes to stay alive. Only the patient and the clever will survive.

Title: Interstellar Espionage Inc.
ShortDescription: Manage an interstellar spy business in this strategy game with lunchbreak length runs. Explore a random universe, expand your espionage network, exploit weaknesses in corporate information security, and exterminate companies by strategic sale of their information to the competition.

Title: The August Before
ShortDescription: The August Before is a meditative narrative 3D puzzle about cleaning up, sorting out and packing up your life before moving on. Clean up and don’t forget your old belongings on your way to the new life!

Title: Pieces of the Past
ShortDescription: 'Pieces of the Past' is a cute, sentimental adventure where you restore family keepsakes to uncover touching stories. Blend puzzle-solving with the joy of preserving memories in this delightful journey!

Title: Greenhouse
ShortDescription: Explore a mix of relaxing, eerie and liminal locations. Observe clues to uncover the story. Align perspective puzzles to progress. Control the weather to set the mood. Two modes: Entities with jump scares or pure exploration. Multiple ways to escape.

Title: Night of the Slayers
ShortDescription: Night of the Slayers is a 5v2 first-person survival co-op horror game in which hunters can collaborate as effectively as the survivors. Escape with your friends without becoming prey, or scour the town with your pickup and hunt the survivors.

Title: Cubetory
ShortDescription: Build a huge factory on a tiny island! Resources are scarce and unique - tweak and optimize everything for peak efficiency. Start with simple painted cubes, unlock tons of upgrades, and scale up to complex production chains. No enemies, just satisfying spaghetti.

Title: UMAMI
ShortDescription: UMAMI is a cozy 3D food puzzle game where every level is a handcrafted, sensory experience. Tinker, rotate, and fit wooden blocks together to build mouthwatering food towers and fantastical cakes, all in a comfy atmosphere, like tidying a bento box for the soul.

Title: Recyclic
ShortDescription: A deceptively demanding experience of a humble recycling plant worker. Shred, crush, and sort your way through a menial job while trying to keep track of the ever convoluted company policy. Clock in, recycle, get paid, repeat.

Title: Pro Basketball Manager 2026
ShortDescription: Lead your club to greatness in Pro Basketball Manager 2026! The Basketball Champions League arrives with 53 licensed teams, putting you in charge of every decision as you aim to dominate both domestic and continental basketball.

Title: Storebound
ShortDescription: A 1-3 co-op horror game. Play as ordinary shoppers trapped in an accursed megastore. Find the exit together at all costs before the employees catch you.

Title: The Berlin Apartment
ShortDescription: One apartment, many stories: Witness turning points in the lives of the inhabitants of an apartment in Berlin over the course of a whole century.

Title: Forestrike
ShortDescription: Forestrike is a martial arts roguelite where every death brings you closer to winning the fight before it begins. Use your ‘Foresight’ ability to experiment without consequences before fighting for real until earning the ultimate reward - victory without ‘Foresight’.

Title: Bony Odyssey
ShortDescription: A fast-paced skelly platformer packed with action and endless challenges! 💀 Are you ready for an adventure that never slows down?

Title: Dungeons & Kingdoms
ShortDescription: A medieval fantasy kingdom builder, management sim and dungeon delver RPG hybrid. Gather resources, hunt wild animals and build infrastructure. Then dive into the dungeons to face the monsters within. Reap the rewards, unlock new resources and advance your tech.

Title: Tales of Ancients: Hollow Apartments - Prologue
ShortDescription: Every floor hides a piece of the past. Every shadow whispers a warning. Welcome to the beginning of your descent.

Title: Raidbound
ShortDescription: Raidbound is a Viking-themed auto-battler with a worker placement style system. Recruit warriors, forge gear, sacrifice for power, and raid rival clans. Choose your path, build your warband, and earn glory across a mythic map of tactical choices.

Title: Doomriderz
ShortDescription: Drive through zombie hordes. Upgrade your vehicle to drive faster and longer. Drive everywhere to survive and reach the destination. Also, don't forget to drive safe!

Title: Eternal Siege
ShortDescription: Eternal Siege is an evolutionary tower defense based around min-max resource management, efficient use of spells, and (hopefully) building some towers. Start in the Ancient Greek era and defend your way through the human eras (Roman, medieval, modern, etc). Can you survive the human extinction era?

Title: Unmourned
ShortDescription: Unmourned is a first-person psychological horror game where Jason moves into a new house only to be haunted by escalating paranormal events. Driven by fear, he must uncover the truth behind the previous owners' disappearance. Can he solve the mystery before it's too late?

Title: ANIWARS: Call of the Void
ShortDescription: Build your squad, collect powerful items, conquer territory and encounter a unique cast of characters! ANIWARS is a strategic turn-based roguelike which takes place in a world ravaged by an unending conflict between the three dominant factions.

Title: Peace Island
ShortDescription: One fine day, in a remote Maine island community, nine cats wake up to discover their humans have disappeared. To survive, they must band together to uncover the mysteries of their storied island home - and ultimately, it is up to them to decide: Are the humans worth bringing back?

Title: Stay Alive For Me
ShortDescription: Survive a gripping psychological thriller in this visual novel. Make critical decisions, face a disturbed captor, and experience multiple chilling endings.

Title: Try 2 Sleep
ShortDescription: Try 2 Sleep is a casual Co-op horror game inspired by paranormal movies. An evil spirit has invaded your house, collaborate with your partner to survive in a chaotic night!

Title: Sektori
ShortDescription: Sektori is an intense, fast paced twin-stick shooter infused with hard hitting techno music. A game where the high-adrenaline gameplay, visuals, and music come together to transport you into another state of consciousness.

Title: A Better World
ShortDescription: A Better World Company is hiring! We’re looking for a skilled new recruit to alter the past and reshape the future! Use our Computer to travel back in time, and make game-changing choices to make the world a better place! You decide what to do… as long as you follow our internal policies.

Title: StarMoon Forest
ShortDescription: Build your dream forest farm and hotel community here! By planting all kinds of crops, making all kinds of delicious food and selling it in stores, building hotel to attract residents from various towns to live and establish friendship

Title: KEEP GAMBLING
ShortDescription: KEEP GAMBLING is a hostile friendslop gamble-em-up featuring LOTTO TICKET, SLOTS, CASE OPENING, and SUBSTANCE ABUSE simulations. Work with or against your friends to repay your debt.

Title: Light and Sneak（轻灯慢步）
ShortDescription: You will play as a player, holding a flashlight, exploring the dark and seemingly labyrinthine areas. As you observe and utilize the patterns of the maze's materials and inhabitants, you will become more adept at uncovering its secrets. Play hide-and-seek, wander around, don't get caught. That's it.

Title: Cube Mind
ShortDescription: Cube Mind is a challenging first-person puzzle game with a futuristic and minimalist aesthetic. Solve interconnected rooms using logic, precision, and creativity in a world where every action matters.

Title: Morsels
ShortDescription: Morsels is a fast-paced creature collecting roguelite with a rotating roster of characters to switch between at will. Overcome a clique of killer cats as you fight your way out of the sewers in this unique, action-packed journey.

Title: Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket
ShortDescription: In the Backrooms: Exit from Supermarket, you find yourself trapped in a labyrinth of endless, flickering aisles. Unearth dark secrets behind every shelf while evading lurking apparitions and supernatural terrors. Can you survive the haunted corridors and escape before the nightmare consumes?

Title: 古咒迷途 (lost curse)
ShortDescription: In a forgotten ancient world, this JRPG blends turn-based combat with novel-like storytelling, delivering thrilling adventures through mysteries and challenges. ﻿

Title: Cosmic Tails
ShortDescription: Become the Cat Bounty Hunter. Blast off through deep space as you decimate hordes of space creatures with bounties on their heads. Upgrade unique cat-themed abilities, unlock pulverizing weapons, and survive until your contract expires -- or join the ranks of fallen bounty hunters before you.

Title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide
ShortDescription: Prepare to be scared! A clash between the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune has unleashed ghostly mayhem all over Bikini Bottom. Switch seamlessly between SpongeBob and Patrick, combine their unique skills and save Bikini Bottom from total ghostification!

Title: BIRDCAGE
ShortDescription: Shoot, slash and weave through bullets and enemies in this story-driven arcade shooter. The RADON Daughters have launched their ultimate weapon. Take control of the experimental gunship HALCYON and break out of the CAGE.

Title: Sit-Back Attack
ShortDescription: Conquer your free time with this Strategic Idle-RPG that grinds for you! Gathering unique loot, upgrading materials, and XP. Allowing you to jump straight into the fray by crafting equipment, leveling 60+ unique characters, taking on epic boss battles, and challenge an endless tower of difficulty!

Title: Strashna 2
ShortDescription: Strashna 2 is a first-person psychological horror game where players control a painting restorer who has received an invitation from the artist to visit his mansion. Solve puzzles and escape the evil that lives in this ancient estate. Can you survive the descent into madness?

Title: Desert Race Adventures
ShortDescription: Start your engines for a rally adventure across Europe and Africa! Manage your team, vehicle, and supplies as you navigate treacherous terrains. Each challenge on the road forces tough decisions that impact your journey. Ride to glory in this retro-inspired strategy with a roguelike twist!

Title: Rune Ark
ShortDescription: A dark fantasy RPG where Match-3 combat meets dungeon exploration. As a young squire, uncover ancient secrets, forge alliances, and battle eldritch horrors beneath the castle. Your choices shape the fate of the kingdom—will you rise as a hero or succumb to the darkness?

Title: Kingdoms of the Dump
ShortDescription: A SNES styled JRPG set in a fantasy world of garbage, created by two janitors. Join Trash Can Knight, Dustin Binsley, as he fights his way through the Five and a Half Kingdoms of the Dump!

Title: Oreflux
ShortDescription: Oreflux is a fast mining roguelite where you have to battle with time to fullfill your daily mission. Upgrade your gear, create synergies with dozens of unique items and become a millionaire!

Title: A Pinball Game That Makes You Mad
ShortDescription: One button. One ball. Hours and hours of utter agony. A Pinball Game That Makes You Mad

Title: Virago World
ShortDescription: Virago World is a cozy life sim with a dark twist. Grow and sell flowers, work at a shop, and decorate your home. Have your best friend Ollie the loyal bear who always protects you. But at night, survive stalkers hiding in the shadows.

Title: Powwow Bound: A Menominee Homecoming
ShortDescription: Experience the story of a Menominee family reconnecting with their tribal culture and language through the lens of the Menominee Annual Contest Powwow.

Title: Myths are 100% True
ShortDescription: Myths are 100% True is a Fast-Paced Combat-Platformer that feels like X-Files if it was made by 12 year olds back in 2008.

Title: Magic Forge Tycoon
ShortDescription: Forge enchanted weapons and shape the fate of kingdoms in Magic Forge Tycoon! Manage your astral forge, fulfill contracts and influence wars or trade relations with your craftsmanship. Master the resource market, upgrade your workshop, and become the realm’s most legendary blacksmith!

Title: Imaginary Friend Institution
ShortDescription: Experience the not-so-ordinary life of a young institutionalized woman in the 1950’s. Amidst the daily struggles and overbearing loneliness, she often sees things that others do not. However, as the imaginary begins to seep into reality, she realizes she may not be as crazy as she once thought.

Title: UNKO TECHNICA
ShortDescription: Enjoy the retro neon style graphics and cool sounds of this stylish UNKO action game as you guide the automatically running UNKO to the goal of the toilet by making it jump.

Title: OLYEN
ShortDescription: Explore a forgotten valley filled with ancient mechanisms and mysteries. Solve intricate 3D puzzles and uncover the story of the four sages who once lived there.

Title: Find All Things: Christmas
ShortDescription: Christmas is coming! That means it’s time to dive into the holiday spirit with the new game Find All Things: Christmas. This time, you’ll explore a variety of themed locations filled with Christmas magic and an even wider selection of mini-games.

Title: Asbury Pines
ShortDescription: A grisly mystery in a small town unfolds across centuries through the stories of its residents. Orchestrate their work, grow resources, upgrade skills, and create automated production loops between past and future eras. All to uncover a sprawling secret embedded in the flow of time.

Title: The Wayfarer's Oath
ShortDescription: When a wandering bounty hunter saves a mysterious young woman from certain death, she unwittingly binds herself to a forgotten prophecy. And thus their journey begins — not for gold, but for redemption.

Title: Crownbound - Fantasy Kingdom Sim
ShortDescription: You’re the ruler, but your heroes have minds of their own. Recruit heroes, set rewards, build a thriving kingdom and hope your warriors don’t run off chasing squirrels instead of fighting monsters.

Title: Pitchforks and Daggers
ShortDescription: How far will you go to keep your crown? A branching court politics drama, where every choice matters.

Title: Brush Burial: Gutter World
ShortDescription: A murky first-person immersive sim with tightly-wound melee combat and tangled, vertical levels to explore. Use your forked tail to tie your enemies in knots and climb impossible heights. Kill your mark with quickness and cunning, using whatever tools you see fit.

Title: MX Bodycam Bikes Racing
ShortDescription: Race across treacherous off-road tracks filled with sharp turns, daring jumps, and harsh terrain. Feel every bump, slide, and burst of speed in this first-person motorcycle racing experience built for pure adrenaline.

Title: 勇者モナナナは最初の洞窟が抜けられない
ShortDescription: ゲーム作家「ローゼンクロイツ」の奇妙な世界観と、音楽家「antihony」さんの儚くも美しい楽曲が織りなすコマンドバトルRPGです。　“あの日、勇者の故郷で何があったのか。”　作中に散りばめられた断片的な情報を頼りに、物語に隠されたいくつかの真相を暴いて下さい。

Title: Demonschool
ShortDescription: Demonschool is a new-style tactics RPG where motion equals action. Defeat big weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island.

Title: Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault
ShortDescription: Live the double life of a fearless adventurer and a crafty merchant! Dive into vibrant dimensions brimming with shiny loot and pesky enemies. Grow your shop, tinker with weapons and gadgets, as well as make your mark among a ragtag community of castaways.

Title: Penelope Pendrick and the Art of Deceit
ShortDescription: Pick up your magnifying glass as writer-turned-detective Penelope Pendrick in this first-person point and click mystery adventure! Three people have suddenly vanished from the sleepy town of Carlisle. Follow the clues, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to end this case - before it ends you.

Title: Duskpunk
ShortDescription: A gritty dice-driven RPG, in a steampunk city. You escaped the War, but how to survive? Explore the city. Build up your skills. Decide who to trust. Choose carefully: you might just spark a revolution!

Title: Screaming In The Basement (2025)
ShortDescription: P.T. inspired, an investigative reporter called Mike investigates a tragic family murder. Strange things from 1991 hide beneath a chilling silence, something far more dangerous, an evil rooted in darkness, a realistic and immersive horror atmosphere.

Title: Chessemble
ShortDescription: Customize your board with a host of new pieces. Start with an aggressive forward assault, Or perhaps a defensive fortress designed to weather the storm. Will you outwit, outmanoeuvre, or out-explode your way to victory?

Title: Escape 9 to 5
ShortDescription: A hardcore climbing parkour game that challenges you to break free from the monotony of office life. Start in the office cubicles and ascend toward the limitless skies above. As you climb higher the final heights will test not just your skill, but your patience too.

Title: Not A Safe Place
ShortDescription: Trapped in an endless cave without light. Only the dripping of water, your footsteps – and Zac's yellowed notes. Solve puzzles, find secret paths, and survive as reality and madness dangerously draw near.

Title: 高中生模拟器The Existence Theory of the No.13 High School
ShortDescription: This is a text-based adventure game about a Chinese high school, where you will experience the joys or pains, the richness or meaninglessness of high school life by rolling dice and making choices.

Title: Wretch: Divine Ascent
ShortDescription: A 1v1 tactical auto battler game with elements of roguelike mechanics and backpack management in a dark medieval art style. It was inspired by Backpack Battles and developed with Unreal Engine. Create your own unique attack combos by arranging items in your backpack to connect moves.

Title: Capoeira Origins
ShortDescription: Capoeira Origins is an action-adventure experience set in colonial Brazil during the period of slavery. Experience history from the perspective of those who resisted, taking on the role of capoeiristas determined to fight for freedom, justice, and survival.

Title: Neon Inferno
ShortDescription: NYC 2055: a city beyond salvation. Blast your way through this dense cyberpunk jungle in NEON INFERNO, an explosive fusion of 2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter, and help the Family dominate its streets!

Title: Sun Halo
ShortDescription: Sun Halo is a real-time combat game blending roguelike progression with strategic deck-building. Recruit and develop a roster of distinctive characters, build your own unique deck, and adapt your tactics on the battlefield. Uncover the world’s unfolding story, all the way to its final chapter.

Title: Ren'ai 0 Kilometer
ShortDescription: "Love 0 Kilometers" is a novel game with choices. The ending will change depending on the choices you make. Through a limited-time family swap, the protagonist spends time with his childhood friend, deepening his relationship with a cute girl and enjoying special conversations.

Title: Veg Uprising
ShortDescription: A real-time tactical stealth strategy game where you control a team of rebellious vegetables. Sneak, crouch, set traps, backstab enemies, and rescue allies. Each mission is a puzzle of timing, terrain, and survival.

Title: R-Type Delta: HD Boosted
ShortDescription: Your nightmares, now in High Definition! R-Type Delta HD Boosted brings back the dark, iconic shooter with modern enhancements, new music, razor-sharp graphics, and all the intensity you remember.

Title: Carbox
ShortDescription: Carbox is an arcade racing sandbox game. Race across multiple campaign challenges, unlock a wide variety of cars with unique driving styles, and when you’re ready for a new challenge, build your own cities and circuits with an easy-to-use editor and share them with the world.

Title: Kingdomino
ShortDescription: Kingdomino is a cosy 1-4 player tile-laying strategy game of kingdom building. Place colorful dominoes, match terrains, and crown your lands to create the most prosperous realm. Simple to learn yet deeply strategic game perfect for quick sessions, solo challenges, or competitive multiplayer.

Title: Willian's Magical Pass Level 3D
ShortDescription: "Willian's Magical Pass Level 3D" is an action-casual 3D game. We provide players with two unique gameplay modes: "Brawl Mode" and "Dual Control Mode".

Title: The Exorcists
ShortDescription: "The Exorcists" is a 2D action game. Chinese zombies, Japanese and ancient Egyptian monsters, etc. will appear in the game. After defeating them, the character will gain experience and level up. Their abilities will then be enhanced. In addition, there are various mysteries and legendary enemies.

Title: The Last Case of John Morley
ShortDescription: Step into the mind of John Morley, a 1940s detective on his final case. Explore shadowed places long forgotten by time, and piece together crime scenes in a narrative adventure steeped in mystery, unexpected twists, and a truth buried for decades.

Title: Project Thea
ShortDescription: Wake to a brutal world bent on destroying your colony. Rebuild, Explore the Wastelands, and Gather scarce resources. Will you strike a deal with the ruthless Baba Yaga - or hack a rogue Cyber-Rat to turn it into an ally? A dark strategy-survival RPG with card-based tactical combat.

Title: CatFatherJump
ShortDescription: This is a frame-by-frame platformer. In an abstract, childlike world, command the CatFather and make frame-level adjustments to ensure he safely reaches the next paper tube and returns to his cat tree. Help the CatFather ascend to the peak of Huff-and-Puff Summit!

Title: Still Space
ShortDescription: Blast through waves of aliens and rogue machines in a 2.5D twin-stick shooter where chaos, color, and cosmic horror collide. Survive psychedelic arenas and face the ultimate Lovecraftian nightmare.

Title: Outlaws + Handful of Missions: Remaster
ShortDescription: When outlaws murdered your wife and took your daughter, everything you had was gone. Your gut aches for blood and sweet revenge. Dyin's too good for 'em now!

Title: IT Specialist Simulator
ShortDescription: Step into the world of IT! Diagnose network issues, manage servers, and repair devices while handling tasks under strict SLAs. Choose your career path, from HelpDesk to IT Project Manager. Develop real IT knowledge and climb the ranks in this realistic IT simulation!

Title: Flashpoint Campaigns: Cold War
ShortDescription: Master grand tactical combat as a Cold War force commander in this data-rich simulation. Plan and issue orders in asynchronous WEGO turns, leveraging real-world maps and complex features like Electronic Warfare and Air Assaults to outthink your enemy.

Title: S.E.M.I. – Side Effects May Include...
ShortDescription: A fun cooperative action game for 1-4 players about escaping from a special clinic. Become a patient, take experimental drugs, get superpowers… And unpredictable side effects!

Title: Samurai Academy: Paws of Fury
ShortDescription: The village of Kakamucho is under attack by the Shogun’s cat armies! Join Hank, a dog samurai in a world of cats, and his friends as they reveal a sinister plot and save the day, samurai-style. Slash, dash, and laugh through this wacky third-person action adventure.

Title: Terra Foliata
ShortDescription: Explore the Valley of Mists, where lucid dreams create reality. Study people's dreams and determine their fate. Leave the hectic world for a while and return to yourself.

Title: Karting4Fun
ShortDescription: Jump into a race full of adrenaline, sharp turns, and wild contact. Bumping and shoving opponents is not only allowed—it’s encouraged!

Title: Abra-Cooking-Dabra
ShortDescription: Abra-Cooking-Dabra is a cooking card game. Manage ingredients and make British dishes to keep toves, borogoves, and mome raths fed. Meet timers and fulfill puzzling orders despite the angry wacky Cat being your boss. You are Wonderland's new chef.

Title: Karting4Fun
ShortDescription: Jump into a race full of adrenaline, sharp turns, and wild contact. Bumping and shoving opponents is not only allowed—it’s encouraged!

Title: Tentacle Tango
ShortDescription: Team up with a friend and swiftly revolve the two inseparable octopuses, Ten & Tango, through treacherous terrains to defeat the evil Chef Murgo. Swing, jump, and coordinate in this challenging co-op platformer! Perfect teamwork, hand-in-tentacle, is key to saving their captured animal friends.

Title: Yours Truly
ShortDescription: Yours Truly is a platforming adventure about Liam, a discontented company man, astral projects into a dream world Along the way, players will encounter challenges such as climbing obstacles, solving puzzles, collecting shiny objects, and confronting negative emotions in the form of bosses.

Title: BEERCRUSH
ShortDescription: Enter the world of John Beer in this psychotic, fast-paced roguelike where you drink beer to stay alive! Dash as fast as you can through unique and crazy worlds to break the vicious cycle. So what are you waiting for!? LIVE LIFE. EVERY GOLDEN MINUTE OF IT!

Title: BeefArena
ShortDescription: A 2d platformer sh'mup in a roguelike package. Fight co-op through randomized runs constructed from hundreds of arenas full of secrets and explosive loot!

Title: Vampire Cat
ShortDescription: VampireCat is a 2D idle roguelike-survivor where you play as up to three vampire cats. Choose their unique attacks, face waves of enemies and bosses, collect diamonds and orbs, upgrade your cats and your wheel, and survive as long as possible.

Title: Kriophobia
ShortDescription: Trapped in the depths of a frozen Soviet bunker, geophysicist Anna must survive deadly cold, horrifying abominations, and the trauma of a buried past. A third-person survival horror blending psychological storytelling with hand-drawn static cameras.

Title: Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked
ShortDescription: A cooperative tactical RPG set in the D&D universe. Embark on a fantasy tabletop adventure. Your quest, on your schedule.

Title: Cult of the Child Eater
ShortDescription: Escape a Cold War orphanage in this 1-6 player survival horror. Solve shifting puzzles, evade cultists, and survive the Child Eater’s arrival.

Title: VADE RETRO SATANA
ShortDescription: VADE RETRO SATANA is a classicaly retro-inspired RPG with deliberate, turn-based combat. Play as the archangel Saint Michael as he faces Lucifer, Satan, and all of his minions. Will you fight and cast them into the lake of fire?

Title: Rune Legacy Idle
ShortDescription: Rune Legacy Idle is a multiplayer fantasy game featuring idle mechanics. Battle mythical monsters, train various skills, and team up or challenge your friends to duels. Enjoy a never ending idle RPG experience.

Title: I,bag
ShortDescription: A mystery visual novel in theme of reincarnation and science-fiction. Opposite to other game, you are not the hero takes item bag, you are the bag yourself! You forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items to change the fate of heros. Has 200 endings and 30+ hours main story.

Title: Minesweeper Big Bomb
ShortDescription: Minesweeper, Reimagined！Big Bomb Mode meets classic gameplay—master ​​two opposing logic strategies​​ in one game！Unlock ​​quirky power-ups​​, collect ​​flashy skins​​, and earn badges.​​Try now！

Title: Overlord’s Harvest
ShortDescription: Overlord’s Harvest is an incremental action game where you slay humans, elves, and dwarves to gather souls. Spend them on talents, weapon upgrades, and the Maw, your idle soul engine, and grow stronger with every harvest. Will you claim the throne of the demon lord?

Title: Berserk B.I.T.S
ShortDescription: Berserk B.I.T.S is an idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop. Let your B.I.T do battle and collect items. Collect rare chips and build your deck! Customize and Level up to take down intense Virus bosses as you unravel the mysterious behind the attacks on the Net.

Title: Home
ShortDescription: A game about the short journey of a boy who left home. Experience a dense story within 2 hours, along with rhythm gameplay and music puzzles. Enjoy live acoustic sounds and a story that feels like a musical film!

Title: The Midnight Walkers
ShortDescription: Fight, scavenge, and extract in The Midnight Walkers, a hardcore FPS game with deadly zombies, dangerous players, and valuable loot. Craft weapons, armor, and consumables; trade items; and maintain your hideout. Escape Liberty Grand Center mega complex, and thrive...or die and lose everything.

Title: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game
ShortDescription: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game, a bloody retro fighting beat em up with frenetic action and a lot of fun and references to the Terrifier franchise.

Title: Legends of Savvarah: Flowers and Scorpions
ShortDescription: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.

Title: Dictator Simulator: Gradnar
ShortDescription: Become the Dictator of Gradnar! Rule the nation, choose between democracy and tyranny, wage wars with a unique card-based mechanic, and expand your empire. A political dystopia packed with satire and humor!

Title: Wrath of Mynah
ShortDescription: Wrath of Mynah is a turn-based RPG adventure game that follows the gripping story of The Great Hanyem War. Hundreds of years after Mynah Smith arrived on Hanyem, you play as Pike Gilder, a young boy who wants to make a difference in the everlasting fight against the tyrannical Indigallo Federation.

Title: Backrooms Blackmarket
ShortDescription: A survival horror and management game where you scavenge forbidden artifacts from the Backrooms and sell them on the dark web—if you can escape the lurking horrors in time.

Title: GRANDFATHER
ShortDescription: GRANDFATHER is a first-person psychological horror game set in a two-room apartment. One evening, the mother brings home the long-lost father. With his return, the house is filled with oppressive anxiety and fear.

Title: Heartspell: Horizon Academy
ShortDescription: Match gems, level up, and date wizards in this match-3 visual novel with a lot of heart and a little spice. Form deep relationships with faeries, sirens and werewolves, each with their own endearing personalities and challenges. Make choices that affect your relationships, and their destinies.

Title: Your Move
ShortDescription: Your Move is a multiplayer game shaped by the Cozy Cabin community. Work together with other players to try to survive in an eerie forest, where every shadow hides a secret and every sound could mean danger.

Title: TetrX 360 - Eons of Time
ShortDescription: The re-imagining of an age old classic with thousands of never before thought of new features and game play.

Title: Chronigma
ShortDescription: Master time in this story-rich time-bending puzzle game. You travel back in time to be in two places at once, to solve puzzles impossible to complete alone. Your success hinges on your ability to collaborate with yourself. Can you learn to manipulate time to save humanity?

Title: Max’s Adventures: Christmas Edition
ShortDescription: Join Max on a mischievous Christmas Eve adventure! When his dad doesn’t return home, Max’s imagination takes over, leading to hilarious choices, festive chaos, and a magical quest to find missing Santa in Christmas Land. Your decisions shape this funny, heartwarming holiday story.

Title: Gran Theft Lure
ShortDescription: Gran Theft Lure is a top-down arena shooter roguelite in which you play as your lovely gran being attacked by hordes of burglars. They can only be killed by luring or pushing them into your garden’s traps. Choose one of the 4 weapon modes, and make them taste theft lure, or should we say failure!

Title: Paddle Together
ShortDescription: Physics-based chaotic co-op adventure game where communication and teamwork are your only hope and also your biggest threat. Paddle in sync, blame each other at every turn, crash into obstacles and try not to drown (yes, it's optional) while questioning your friendship, together.

Title: Ripperdoc Simulator
ShortDescription: In Ripperdoc Simulator, you are the surgeon of the shadows. In the front, you run a dingy electronics shop in a crime-ridden district. In the back, you perform illegal implantations on desperate clients seeking power, beauty, or survival — no matter the cost.

Title: Mosaic of the Strange
ShortDescription: Mosaic of the Strange is a picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring ENORMOUS interlocking puzzles. Help Special Agents Cullen and Brady investigate a bizarre murder, while discovering 125 real-world paranormal case files.

Title: Potter About
ShortDescription: This side scrolling platformer lets you explore a beautiful, cozy home as a well-worn flower pot. Navigate through the clustered rooms and wield peculiar, plant-inspired powers on this comfy, meditative adventure.

Title: Cats Vs Rats
ShortDescription: A chaotic roguelite bullet hell where you play as a cute turret-wielding cat blasting through waves of villainous rats. Choose your turret, grab powerful loot, level up, and build devastating combos to survive escalating swarms

Title: Lunar Ascendant
ShortDescription: The political drama set in a future that's too close for comfort. Become the first mayor of ARTEMIS: A Pioneering Lunar City. Navigate the future of lunar colonization, choose between independence and cooperation, shape policies for or against AI influence, and tackle interplanetary conspiracies.

Title: A Slice of Lunch
ShortDescription: Slice, rotate and pack your meal into your lunchbox in A Slice of Lunch! Find the best way to fit foods of different shapes, sizes, and cuisines into uniquely shaped lunchboxes. Be wary of how many slices you have so no food is left behind!

Title: Rogum A Cat Match Puzzle
ShortDescription: Rogum A Cat Match Puzzle is a puzzle adventure where you help a clever cat escape a mysterious dream world. Match blocks, race against the rising water, and face obstacles across mysterious islands. With 50 levels, it challenges your memory, focus, and quick reactions. Can you save the cat?

Title: Dream Spectra
ShortDescription: Dream Spectra is a visual novel about trying to hang out with your crush and escape your migraines, styled with surreal 90s 3D rendered environments.

Title: The Dinner
ShortDescription: A war veteran, haunted by the scars of combat, struggles with tormenting hallucinations that revive the guilt of his darkest memories while trying to prepare everything for family dinner.

Title: Legends of Gems
ShortDescription: Aetheria falls to darkness. Collect 400+ magic gems (fire/ice/lightning) to craft weapons in turn-based battles. Outsmart unique enemies with strategic combos. Purge the abyss!

Title: Wrack Remake
ShortDescription: Inspired by classics like DOOM and Quake, Wrack is an arcade-style FPS. Mow down enemies one after another, and become more powerful the more you kill. Amass a deadly arsenal, discover secret powers... and save your world!

Title: Curved World
ShortDescription: Relive the lives of a student, teen, and worker in this first-person Japanese horror. With gentle scares, one-hour playtime, and a striking monochrome style, it’s perfect for newcomers. Crafted solo by a 20-year-old, this exploration-driven tale blends beauty with quiet dread.

Title: Ludiger
ShortDescription: Revolutionary strategy board game fusing Chess × SRPG on 7×5 grid. Command unit chips with unique life, attack power & special abilities to destroy enemy stronghold "Ludiger" using death god "Fenria"! Deep strategic gameplay via CPU, offline & online battles!

Title: The Cooking Club
ShortDescription: You'd do anything to get out of class - but how will you handle multiple girls fighting for your love? Thing's are certainly going to heat up!

Title: Fantastic Findings Hidden Seasons
ShortDescription: Get into the coziest Christmas spirit in this highly detailed 3D hidden object game. Explore many varied levels packed with hidden items waiting to be found. Search drawers, unwrap gifts. You can clean off dirt, cobwebs, eat treats, and find hidden cookies in a festive hunt full of surprises.

Title: Identifile: Desktop Dungeon
ShortDescription: Something's deeply wrong with your PC and you’ve become the cursor. Navigate folders like dungeon rooms, delete viruses, and level up with EXEs in this action-packed roguelike.

Title: Of Ash and Steel
ShortDescription: Of Ash and Steel is an immersive third-person open-world RPG created by a passionate team that values the essence of classic old-school RPGs and modern designs. Explore the lands of a once-prosperous island, hone your combat skills, and survive in the unforgiving realm of the Kingdom of the Seven.

Title: Enfora Star
ShortDescription: Enfora Star station is being overrun! Pilot your spacecraft and deploy defenses to survive droid swarms - but every purchase costs precious score points. Will you risk everything for maximum points or play it safe? Master the ultimate arcade challenge!

Title: Constance
ShortDescription: Constance is a 2D hand-drawn action adventure featuring a paintbrush-wielding artist, striving to escape from a colorful but decaying inner-world, created by her declining mental health.

Title: Primal Fray
ShortDescription: Primal Fray is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built and synergistic team to learn the truth about the Rift.

Title: Eon of Life
ShortDescription: Eon of Life is a game in which you guide the evolution of a creature for as many million years as you can survive! Find food, avoid predators, watch for a mate, and evolve selecting new parts and mutations for your creature, gaining new skills and becoming stronger.

Title: The Art of Reflection
ShortDescription: Traverse mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space to solve puzzles and uncover secrets. Reshape your perspective to perform gravity-shifting acrobatics as you jungle-gym through a sprawling environment. You'll never look in a mirror the same way again.

Title: Dinopunk: the Cacops adventure
ShortDescription: Welcome to "Dinopunk: The Cacops Adventure"! You're an amphibious dinosaur with the power of water. Face challenges, recover your stolen egg from a ninja, and surf in championships. 2D Jurassic action awaits!

Title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE
ShortDescription: Solo Leveling, the webtoon with 14.3 billion views worldwide, is now an action RPG game! Help our hero grow from his humble E-Rank beginnings.

Title: Umigame
ShortDescription: Fight your way out of the Haunted Swamp in this coop roguelite. Control deadly turrets, learn new spells and leave your enemies in the mud!

Title: Randomice
ShortDescription: Randomice is a charming combat-free Metroidvania in which you follow your own way and meet quirky mice using randomly found items. No two escape attempts are ever the same in this hand-drawn house: you’ll need to adapt on the fly to find the way out!

Title: taat
ShortDescription: Sokoban style puzzle solving for everyone

Title: Alice's World
ShortDescription: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.

Title: Fantastyc Murder Mystery
ShortDescription: Play a murder mystery where you are the murderer or the detective. Other players worldwide will scrutinize your every move as they attempt to solve your murders. Sift through evidence, and uncover the killer in unique player-generated crime scenes.

Title: 8AM: The Office
ShortDescription: "8AM: The Office" is a suspense game set in a deserted office at night. Observe workers through security cameras and decide if their odd behaviors stem from fatigue or something sinister, aiming to survive until 8:00 a.m.

Title: TORMENTOR
ShortDescription: Take on the role of a merciless torturer. Earn money from video transmissions of your torments and then buy new victims and torture tools to expand your prison.

Title: Gray Planet
ShortDescription: Explore a open world set in a post-apocalyptic background, gather resources to craft various equipment and build your base. Defeat different types of monsters while investigating what happened on this planet.

Title: Project Motor Racing
ShortDescription: All the passion, beauty & intensity of pro motorsport merging the most iconic cars & circuits with a new benchmark in handling performance.

Title: A.I.L.A
ShortDescription: A.I.L.A is a first-person horror game set in a near-future filled with immersive technology. Play as the sole game tester for a revolutionary new fictional AI. Survive intense horror experiences that prey on your deepest fears as the lines between virtual and reality begin to blur…

Title: 遥豊のサレテ
ShortDescription: 『遥豊のサレテ』is a roguelite action game featuring item crafting elements. Use the crafted weapons and equipment to defeat the required number of enemies within the time limit.

Title: Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation
ShortDescription: Captain Wayne is an intense, fast-action Retro Shooter about a sailor with a SHOTGUN for an ARM!! With a cartoony, hand-drawn art style and gory gameplay, you'll have to mow down enemies through 8 action-packed locales to take back what's yours. ARE YOU READY TO RAISE ANCHOR?

Title: NULLPTR
ShortDescription: A real-time tactical hacking puzzle where every move reshapes the challenge. Infiltrate megacorp servers, reroute connections, gather valuable data, and outsmart evolving defenses, all while racing against the clock and the ever-present threat of adaptive sentinels.

Title: One More Experiment
ShortDescription: When her home twists into a surreal lab, Andrea discovers the Absorber—a device that manipulates fire and water. Experiment with vines, balloons, force fields, ice and other contraptions to alter the environment. Follow the adventure of the Randall sisters. One more experiment awaits.

Title: Move Together
ShortDescription: A cooperative game for 5 players! Pack items into car trunks across various locations, solving puzzles. All items must fit so the doors can close. Hunt for secrets, race against time with friends or solo, and become the best in the global leaderboard!

Title: FearPark
ShortDescription: Bienvenue à FearPark. Un parc d’attractions abandonné où le réel se mélange à vos peurs. Explorez des attractions maudites, échappez à ce qui rôde dans l’ombre… et surtout, ne vous perdez pas.

Title: Seven Seas: Adventures
ShortDescription: Welcome to the Seven Seas: Adventures! Set sail and chart your course to fame, fortune, and adventure in this unique age of sail sandbox game!

Title: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
ShortDescription: A woman vanishes without a trace on a cross-country train. The catch? Nobody on board remembers her ever existing in the first place - nobody, except for you. Uncover the story in this mystery adventure game!

Title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
