ShortDescription: Experience the thrill of Terminator 2: Judgment Day with arcade action & pixel-perfect graphics! In this unique story blending iconic scenes from the movie with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide.

Title: dirtbag MAHJONG
ShortDescription: Riichi mahjong with a twist! Play mahjong with party game elements, for both beginners and experienced players.

Title: Meeting Places
ShortDescription: A minimalist city builder all about creating places for neighbours of different tribes to meet.

Title: Heist Haven
ShortDescription: Heist Haven is a 1 to 4-player co-op online shooter set in the open-world criminal paradise of Haven. Assemble your crew, select your gear and customise your character: the next big score is waiting!

Title: An Imp and an Impostor
ShortDescription: You've spent years undercover, disguised as a human, infiltrating the city’s magical law-enforcement organization. They stole your magic from you. Can you steal it back? (A text-based interactive historical urban fantasy novel.)

Title: Falling Stars... and other celestial objects
ShortDescription: Design the perfect automated defense system for the city in this physics-based game. Destroy the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals, and more! Each level will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

Title: AFTERBLAST
ShortDescription: AFTERBLAST is a challenging FPS roguelite. Play SOLO or in CO-OP. Get stronger each run. Obtain powerful abilities, weapons and find a way to save your planet. Stand up against the Gods and defeat hordes of monsters!

Title: Boomerang Survivor Collection
ShortDescription: This title includes the endless score attack game "Boomerang Survivor" and the level-based action game "Boomerang Survivor 2." It also includes many bonuses, such as "Secret Information" that reveals hidden features in the included games, an "Art Book," and an "Audio Selection."

Title: Backrooms: Wit's End
ShortDescription: Backrooms: Wit's End is an immersive coop survival horror game, featuring procedurally generated, non-linear level progression and dynamic gameplay mechanics. Explore the different disturbing levels with your friends, while trying to escape from many puzzling entities.

Title: Last mile
ShortDescription: Last Mile - is an atmospheric first-person survival horror game set on a night-time road. In the confined space of your car, you face limited energy and frightening shadows outside the window. Can you make it to the end when the road itself turns into a nightmare?

Title: Relic Abyss
ShortDescription: Experience a unique hand-crafted Bullet Heaven Roguelite RPG set in a Fantasy x Sci-fi world filled with 💪might, 🪄magic, and 🎡lost technology! A mysterious tale centered around a world-devouring Abyss awaits...🦑🌎

Title: OFF BY
ShortDescription: Complete each formula to reach the target error and clear stages. Recruit supporters to speed up progress, but beware that some number blocks impose constraints adding unique twists to your play.

Title: Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons
ShortDescription: Adventure again and again! Get stronger! The first step-up Bubble Bobble in the series! Go on an adventure through strange dungeons that change every time you step inside!

Title: Guilt Trip
ShortDescription: A crime-solving mystery game from the perspective of the culprit. You know everything they don't, and the only way to make it back home is to Guilt Trip.

Title: Ctesiphon
ShortDescription: A retrowave/mecha-inspired sci-fi first-person shooter featuring fast-paced combat in old-school style open-plan levels packed with pickups, keys, and secrets.

Title: Scope Out
ShortDescription: Take the shot — or be taken out. A 1v1 Top Down online sniper duel where matches are fought in best-of-3 rounds. Win three rounds to claim victory. Every bullet, every breath, and every move matters.

Title: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games
ShortDescription: A tribute to the golden era of Retro gaming that brings together 7 iconic titles for the first time. This is more than a collection; it's a celebration of gaming history and the preservation of pioneering games from the '80's & '90's allowing you to relive the C64, Amiga and Spectrum versions.

Title: Abulia
ShortDescription: Abulia is an Type-write battle RPG and Visual Novel adventure based on the mind of a special girl that is trying to find herself in the world and struggling to understand our complex world.

Title: Wonderful Handhelds
ShortDescription: Wonderful Handhelds is a game that allows you to collect and play fictional retro LCD games, inspired by classic devices from the 80s and 90s.

Title: Afallon
ShortDescription: Afallon is a single-player RPG with the feel of an MMO. Choose your class and race to forge a unique character, explore a large open world with diverse zones and biomes, and experience a living world that changes based on your actions.

Title: NET.CRAWL
ShortDescription: NET.CRAWL is a grid-based deck-building roguelike about White Rabbit lost in unfriendly cyberspace. Dive deep into a bizarre digital world and defeat dozens of unique mini-bosses. Short runs, deep strategies, crazy combos and a ton of replayability.

Title: The Oaken Path
ShortDescription: A kingdom splintered by ambition. Two brothers stand at the heart of the storm—Thorn, the rightful heir and stalwart protector of the realm, and Thalorak, a ruthless sorcerer who seeks to claim the throne by force. Their journey will carve the future of the kingdom.

Title: Breathbound
ShortDescription: Breathbound– A sci-fi sandbox blending survival-building and epic battles. On oxygen-deprived alien wastelands, survivors rebuild civilization while fighting enraged "Star Dragons" spawned by ecological collapse.

Title: Slingbox
ShortDescription: Slingbox is a minimalist, physics-based 2D platformer where precision and momentum are everything. Master your dash and rope mechanics to swing, launch and race through clean abstract levels. Beat the clock, earn medals and chase perfection.

Title: A Spaceship Accident
ShortDescription: A choice-driven narrative game with RPG mechanics, filled with cosmic wonders and horror. Forge your own path across more than 50 unique endings. Barter, upgrade your character, fight, and explore alien worlds, overcoming every obstacle to find your way back to Earth… and to your daughter.

Title: Veterum
ShortDescription: Turn-based tactical strategy with a detailed combat system and interactive environment. Explore the open world, complete quests, search for rare artifacts. Lead the last army of the Order of the Gatekeepers and stop the coming chaos!

Title: I Will Never Fall For My Tsundere Classmate, So I Will Just Date A Background Character Instead!
ShortDescription: A short parody visual novel about romance with a tsundere girl... Or not?

Title: Oars of Silence
ShortDescription: Oars of Silence is a brutal, minimalist survival horror adventure set in the endless dark sea. Armed with only a rowboat, you must navigate through open ocean, unpredictable weather, and the strange creatures that seem to awaken in the deep as the world grows quieter.

Title: Nano Neighbors
ShortDescription: An online idle game that brings life to the bottom of your screen with friendly androids called NANOs. Customise your NANOs, choose their occupation, build and design their perfect home, and invite your friends' NANOs over to hang out, join mini-activities, and interact.

Title: Knight of the Lions
ShortDescription: Help a teenage girl named Vita collect pieces of the world that has shattered around her, get her feet back on the ground and realize that being a knight is not about wearing a suit of armor.

Title: Pinono and the magic fiddle
ShortDescription: Pinono, a girl who casts magic through music, sets off on a slightly free-spirited journey. In this turn-based RPG, you'll meet unique companions and explore a whimsical world. Your choices shape the story and ending, and melodies used in magic and events are procedurally generated each time.

Title: Woj's:Threads of Time
ShortDescription: Play as Woj to run a successful vintage clothing store in space. Travel in time to different decades & places on Earth to buy inventory and try to match your customer wants for the most profit. Build your deck of contacts, develop your store, manage staff & create sponsored clothing with celebrities

Title: True Vikings
ShortDescription: Choose your own path: become a powerful jarl or a legendary king, or perhaps switch sides and follow the path of a knight, reliving the story of the Duke of Normandy.

Title: Dancin Divas
ShortDescription: A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back!

Title: Three Kingdom - Zhang Jiao Revival
ShortDescription: Three Kingdom - Zhang Jue Revival is a real time RPG roguelite. Battle alone or recruit up to 10 comrade to fight along side in real time combat. Specialize in 1 class or learn all 6, wide range of equipment to create your own build. Powerful yet simple statistic system to spice up game play.

Title: Elf Clash
ShortDescription: Lead your team to delve into the Three Realms, rescue the abducted detective, retrieve the Energy Spirit Stone, and punish the nefarious forces hiding in the shadows. Each realm presents unique challenges and secrets, and your decisions will sway the course of the battle.

Title: Sacred Earth - Reverie
ShortDescription: An anime-inspired Point and Click JRPG. Embark on a journey with colorful allies, exploring deep dungeons, developing your skills, taking on quests, and engaging in thrilling turn-based combat to uncover a forgotten history.

Title: GLONK
ShortDescription: A short incremental game about feeding Glonk! Make Glonk bigger, get more money, and explore the skill tree to upgrade your abilities, and get more Glonks!

Title: 黑丝袜：鲁智深
ShortDescription: "Black Stockings: Lu Zhishen" is a roguelike survivor game that tells the bizarre story of Lu Zhishen and Lin Daiyu accidentally swapping bodies when they travel to the world of Journey to the West, and becoming "Dao Companions" in the monk's team.

Title: The Shimmering Horizon and Cursed Blacksmith
ShortDescription: "Try all you can, through hell and fire's end..."Forge yourself the best weapon you can, and jump into the ever-changing dungeon searching for your memory and the truth of this world!Roguelike X Smithing X Souls-like. Dungeon Crawling RPG

Title: Niraya of ■■
ShortDescription: Third-person Japanese-style horror adventure. Awakening in the aftermath of an arcane ritual, Yuni is stranded in a strange world. Haunting premonitions of danger are the child's only means to evade—and escape. Please... Help guide Yuni safely home.

Title: 轮回修仙传
ShortDescription: 想书写你的龙傲天修仙人生吗？《轮回修仙传》是一款以修仙为题材的多结局多周目轮回式Roguelike人生模拟类游戏。沉浸式体验「我命由我不由天」的逆袭剧本，经历一世又一世的劫难，轮回点化作登仙台阶，结识修仙路上的红颜道侣，合理规划你的修炼和行动，不断突破境界，直到你一拳轰碎这天道约束！

Title: Sunset Sprout
ShortDescription: inspired by the old classic farming games from the early days of Facebook; Sunset Sprout is a relaxing, cozy farming and management game where you rebuild your farm from ruins!

Title: 万界沙城：战魂燃天
ShortDescription: Wanjie Sand City: Burning Soul of Battle is a strategic combat game set in the world of Wanjie Sand City. Integrated with level design, the game delivers an intensely immersive combat experience for players.

Title: DICTOCRACY
ShortDescription: Take charge as the President of a newly independent country, Adelphia. Build infrastructure, approve policies, juggle between conflicting priorities of the public, your ministers and other countries' leaders - All with only one action per turn and a different political landscape in each playthrough

Title: The Woods
ShortDescription: Explore, build, craft and survive on a mysterious forest island.

Title: Yatzi 2
ShortDescription: Dice games bring people together! Play solo, with friends or online multiplayer.

Title: Ping Pan
ShortDescription: Place objects. Bounce balls. Land it in the cup. Ping Pan is a simple, addictive puzzle game with handcrafted levels, multiple solutions, and a level editor for endless creativity.

Title: Galaxy Defense War
ShortDescription: 'Galaxy Defense War' is a roguelike tower defense game where you need to select suitable galactic principles from randomly dropped heroes and equipment to form a combat-ready team to resist alien invaders.

Title: Chick Clicker
ShortDescription: Hatch chickens, collect eggs, and grow your farm in this addictive idle game. Level up your flock, improve skills, and watch your farm thrive while you relax. Regular updates keep the fun fresh — build your farm, grow your flock, and let the chickens take care of the rest!

Title: Seedrun
ShortDescription: Cultivate a secluded cave in this short & minimalist farming game. Gather resources, get upgrades through a big skill tree and grow living plants that help you fulfill tasks!

Title: Interstellar Holy Spirit
ShortDescription: A multiplayer cooperative horror adventure game with an interstellar theme that can be played by 1-6 players! Players need to complete the tasks displayed on the screen of each level individually or collaboratively within a limited time and pass the Interstellar gate.

Title: Parkour Simulator
ShortDescription: PARKOUR SIMULATOR! is a chaotic co-op parkour experience. 🎉 Explore mountains as egg-carrying mice, ride vehicles, battle through obstacle courses, and either lift your friends to the peak—or knock them all the way down!

Title: Egg Up!
ShortDescription: EGG UP! is a chaotic co-op parkour experience. 🎉 Explore mountains as egg-carrying mice, ride vehicles, battle through obstacle courses, and either lift your friends to the peak—or knock them all the way down!

Title: Escobar Simulator
ShortDescription: Build your own cartel in Colombia’s most dangerous city! Produce, trade, fight, and expand your empire. Play co-op with your friend — become partners or rivals. The road from the slums to the throne is paved with blood and money.

Title: Tears of Vanfell
ShortDescription: Your life begins anew in front of an imposing mountain... Climb and explore it with a wide cast of characters in this dungeon crawler RPG with up to four player Co-op.

Title: Silivri
ShortDescription: Silivri City — an open-world co-op game blending absurdity and dark humor! Complete missions, launder money, jump in your car, explore the city, or betray your friend. Every corner is nonsense, every NPC has a story. Your only goal: deliver the laundry... and don’t lose your mind!

Title: TapMazing
ShortDescription: Guide Po-G through Doctor Rulo’s lab — a colorful, skill-based platformer.

Title: Christmas Luge: The Journey
ShortDescription: Slide through the dangerous mountain passes to spread Christmas cheer to your fellow penguins — and solve a mystery along the way. Lighthearted with ambient winter environments, this is a game for all ages to enjoy during the Christmas season.

Title: Y2K Directive
ShortDescription: Will your leadership help your country survive a sci-fi disaster like a zombie plague or an alien invasion? Find out in this unique blend of real time strategy and a brutal (and often unfair) survival wargame!

Title: MY WIFE SERVES THE KING
ShortDescription: MY WIFE SERVES THE KING is a visual novel set in a world of intrigue and passion. Your wife serves the king, and only you can decide whether to accept this or fight for her love.

Title: Timeless Rain
ShortDescription: Explore this foreign world and manipulate time to navigate through the challenges that lie along your path! Meet the inhabitants of this strange realm as they push you towards finding the Timeless Rain...

Title: Boardfall
ShortDescription: Progressively harder waves of enemies fall from the sky. Capture them to earn gold, and then purchase your own reinforcements to drop onto the board. 10 brand new chess pieces to master. How many waves can you survive?

Title: Hang Tight
ShortDescription: Hang Tight is a darkly charming 2D hangman game that tests your word-guessing powers! Step into a grimly whimsical world where each wrong guess inches quirky characters closer to the gallows.

Title: Super Person Run Deluxe
ShortDescription: A 2D platformer game where precision, timing, and skill are key. Sprint and jump through increasingly-challenging levels that test even the most experienced platformer players. Can you help Person retrieve the Super Turnip from Master Alien and his minions?

Title: Death In Abyss
ShortDescription: Death In Abyss is an intense flight shooter that challenges you to utilize your maneuverability and explosive firepower to survive against the deep-sea hostilities. In your descent, the nightmares can only get worse.

Title: The Legend of Kairo
ShortDescription: You’re the last fire master, fighting an evil army who threaten to bring back an ancient being from hell.

Title: Junkyard Fury 3
ShortDescription: The anomaly vehicles are back and more aggressive than ever. Each area now features unique experiments and goals. Choose your approach—pick your starting items, vehicles, upgrades, and mods. One experiment won’t cut it anymore. Time to get to work.

Title: Sector Space
ShortDescription: Explore a procedurally generated galaxy, mine asteroids, refine minerals, colonize planets, build stations, deploy drones, salvage rare items, construct gear, level up, improve your ship, assemble a fleet, engage in combat, and take on the void.

Title: Bullet Blade
ShortDescription: Bullet Age is a 2D co-op action-platformer, where players can team up with another player in an intuitive mix of sword-and-gun gameplay. Bullet Age a mix of classic action platforming with a host of unique upgradable weapons and a charming cartoon art style.

Title: The Mad House Season One
ShortDescription: Step into The Mad House, a futuristic cyberpunk game show! Battle waves of enemies, conquer unique room challenges, and climb the Leaderboard. Upgrade your gear, master each fight, and earn your place in the legendary Hall of Legends.

Title: Brave Splat
ShortDescription: Minimalist real time strategy game in a medieval setting.  Mine copper, build structures, train units and defend your kingdom.  Fight off invaders. Simple game play.

Title: Warped
ShortDescription: Sci-fi space survival horror.

Title: Squiigee
ShortDescription: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!

Title: Concerto on White: Cajon Story
ShortDescription: Rhythm + Dating Sim. You play as a new student in Concordia Academy of Music, facing a crisis on your first day joining the Cajon Club. Music dueling, jamming with your partners, or even play with a real cajon!

Title: Bow Hunter
ShortDescription: A prehistoric pixel art top-down survival-hunting roguelike with a first person shooting mechanic, where you attempt to survive in a chain of islands, to gather resources for yourself and your family, and hunt for rare trophies.

Title: Aquanima
ShortDescription: Build your fantasy aquarium, discover rare fish, and manage your underwater world!

Title: 捣蛋蛙（Croak Squad）
ShortDescription: Croak Squad is a 2–6 player co-op game where colorful frogs use their tongues to swallow teammates and spit them in arcs to clear trap-filled stages. Sounds easy? Later levels demand perfect timing and launch angles—sometimes even yeeting friends straight to the goal!

Title: Strength In Numbers
ShortDescription: Take back control of the galaxy and defeat the evil AI in this fast-paced, node-based strategy game. The humanoid races need all the help they can get. We're counting on you, Commander!

Title: Techno: 2Kill
ShortDescription: A hardcore, fast-paced and unpredictable roguelike shooter set in a dystopian future where AI decided to save humanity... by exterminating it. Your body is the ultimate weapon. Liberate Earth and countless other planets from the grip of a deranged AI.

Title: Chokur
ShortDescription: The ultimate poker-infused chess derivative with deckbuilding, roguelike mechanics and minimal RNG! Go on a campaign run where strategic deckbuilding decisions matter or jump into an exhibition match against an AI/human opponent. Play a ranked match with a friend and climb the global leaderboards!

Title: Noon Stone
ShortDescription: Quick runs, endless challenges. Noon Stone is a tactical adventure with RPG elements blending procedural exploration, strategic upgrades, and dice-driven combat.

Title: Mara
ShortDescription: You have money problems and decide to take a very risky venture. Ancient burials have been found in an abandoned mine, but a group of archaeologists have disappeared there and it's about to be shut down! You decide to infiltrate and steal ancient artifacts to sell them on the black market!

Title: RollBot
ShortDescription: Rollbot is a parkour and time-trial racing game set in a futuristic universe. You play as a combat robot whose attack directive has been corrupted. Your goal: be the fastest and master increasingly challenging levels, designed to test your reflexes and precision.

Title: Bleu Bayou
ShortDescription: A lonesome crawdad mired in debt, you vie to topple the loan sharks and robber barons that run your neck of the bayou. In this 8-bit roguelite boss rush shoot 'em up, you'll leverage 100+ upgrades against a dozen unique bosses. Erase your debts once and for all!

Title: Tosbik Around The World
ShortDescription: Tosbik Around The World is a hand-drawn 2D game where you play as Tosbik, a sea turtle that heroically cleans seas all around the world with magical sea stars and with the help of their friends. Come and save the seas from pollution!

Title: Farming Life Simulator
ShortDescription: Plant seeds, grow crops, chop trees, go to fishing, and trade goods in a fully interactive farming simulator. Build relationships, expand your fields, manage resources, and experience daily life in a living village.

Title: The Amygdala Protocol
ShortDescription: The records say the children were all discharged. The crying from the empty rooms says they're lying. Blackwood Sanatorium: The Silent Cries is a first-person psychological horror game where you, a private detective, must unravel the dark secrets of a asylum and the experiments of missing doctor.

Title: Deepest Well
ShortDescription: Deepest Well is a roguelike where you fight off waves of enemies in a descending well with destructible terrain. Get upgrades after each wave and make insane builds to break the game!

Title: FTL Team
ShortDescription: ​​This is a turn-based strategy adventure game. Assemble a five-hero squad, each with unique strengths. Collect mysterious artifacts, build potent hero abilities, defeat powerful monsters, and eliminate galactic threats.​

Title: Pooping Cat
ShortDescription: Press a key, click your mouse — and POOP! Our adorable kitty leaves a little digital gift just for you. Who wouldn't fall in love with that?

Title: Bread Adventure
ShortDescription: Experience a adventure in a seamless world of food, where you play as a brave bread. Freely explore interconnected regions, uncover hidden secrets, collect items to enhance your abilities, tackle challenging stages, and defeat formidable foes.

Title: Chess 2048
ShortDescription: Chess 2048 – Classic chess moves meet fresh puzzle-strategy twists: watch the board reshape, adapt on the fly, and master piece combos. Then escape poison gas, jump between water tiles, use portals, and pull off clever tricks.

Title: The Echoes of Me
ShortDescription: The Echoes of Me pulls you into a nightmare where shadows blur with self. As fragmented memories surface, you must remain cautious and uncover the truth.

Title: Tile Tempest
ShortDescription: Precision meets chaos in this fast-paced, physics-driven tile matcher. Memorize colors and shapes, adapt to shifting modifiers, and stay sharp under pressure. In this storm, your memory is your greatest weapon.

Title: Take7
ShortDescription: Remove numbers by selecting squares of numbers where their sum equals seven. Avoid blocking yourself by carefully choosing what part of the grid to clear. Think carefully, compete against friends in the daily challenge, finish the harder gem levels or go as far as you can in endless mode.

Title: The Witch's fabulous Cracker Show
ShortDescription: Play as Cracker, the witch's errand boy. Collect ingredients for the ingenious cake plan and avoid the hungry children. Solve amusing puzzles, unlock new abilities, and explore the witty world of the Cracker Show.

Title: Phil in the Mirror
ShortDescription: The mirror calls to you. Down the endless corridor, aged walls and flickering lights cross paths. As your footsteps echo with every step, why do you find yourself frozen before the mirror? Then again, maybe it's not a mirror at all.

Title: Pencil Stories
ShortDescription: Explore Tsukinoma village after midnight and share the peace and solitude with Letty whilst everyone is asleep. Unravel secrets of lost letters in this unique, hand-drawn world – no rush, just calm discovery.

Title: Solitaire Battle Online
ShortDescription: "Solitaire" and "Spider" are created in intense competitions. Compete not with a deck, but with players from all over the world. Your goal is not just to collect solitaire, but to do it more faster and more efficiently than everyone else.

Title: YGGDRA REFRAIN
ShortDescription: *Genre girl collectible turn RPG *High-quality cel-animation with over 50 beautiful girls that will make you feel the charm of beautiful girls *A variety of mechanics and fun to capture content for turn-based RPGs *Sub-stories that allow you to feel the hidden charm of alliances and characters

Title: Bounce Up!
ShortDescription: A physics-based platformer where you guide a bouncing robot through challenging levels using precise jumps. Master 480 stages across 8 worlds, each beatable in just 4 jumps. Features mini-golf physics, 3 difficulty modes, online leaderboards, and level editor.

Title: Mass of Consumption
ShortDescription: The church is impatient. The church is hungry. The church is willing to do anything to get you back.

Title: Tales of Demagost: Exodus
ShortDescription: Your village got burned down, now resettle in a safe place, rebuild and train to take your revange. ToD is pretty casual story driven RPG that combines linear and open world parts.

Title: Spin Of Dosul
ShortDescription: Spin of Dosul is a new roguelike deck-building game that combines slot machine mechanics with inventory management. Test your luck alongside an adorable Dokkaebi! Collect symbols and sacred relics to build your own scroll and defeat monsters on your journey back to the real world.

Title: BAD SECTOR ³
ShortDescription: The Cube summons you. A sentient structure of many floors where every mistake drags you farther from the exit. Detect the bad sectors, climb through the levels… and try to break the cycle.

Title: InOut
ShortDescription: A minimalist puzzle platformer where each level is more than they seem. Change your perspective on levels to discover new areas. Explore the world to unearth its hidden secrets.

Title: Friendsmob
ShortDescription: Become the billionaire you always mocked! Collect humans like trading cards, exploit their productivity, and compete in The Excess Index - where morally bankrupt capitalism is the only way to win. Own everything. Question nothing.

Title: Grimslair
ShortDescription: You don’t level up—your cards do! A survival deckbuilder where you bargain with the Grim Reaper to bring your girlfriend back from the dead. Build & craft in harsh biomes, rescue lost pets that fight for you, inscribe Soulwords to customize cards, and recover notes to remember why you’re here…again.

Title: Burdock 2
ShortDescription: Burdock 2 is a single-player action-horror game. Explore a lost place in a post-apocalyptic future, and help the main character's friends, or leave everyone behind and embark on the path of darkness. Find all the clues and open the way to the passage. Solve puzzles and do not lose your composure.

Title: WLRight
ShortDescription: 高校性たちの「夢」や「欲」を主人公と共に叶えていく。 「夢を追うほど、欲に溺れる」ビジュアルノベルADV。

Title: Oblation
ShortDescription: Oblation is a top-down, pixelated open-world RPG where you explore a vast land, level up your stats, and recruit support characters to uncover a deep truth.

Title: The Adventure of Ravi 'n' Navi
ShortDescription: An action-adventure game where Ravi the rabbit and Navi the fairy travel through various worlds! Can you find the carrots stolen by the villain, Shivarra, and restore peace to the village?

Title: Raptor
ShortDescription: The protagonist, a reporter, receives information that a laboratory is conducting experiments that defy the law. He visits the laboratory to find out what the experiment is, but regrets his decision to come... A 3D escape horror in which he explores while being chased by a tracker using only lights!

Title: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare
ShortDescription: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare is a fast-paced, addictive shoot 'em up with a twist...You can't shoot! Easy to pick up, hard to put down, dodge, survive, and chase high scores in this addictive, old-school action game!

Title: Negotiations Have Failed!
ShortDescription: Fight off the Aetheryx invasion in brutal, turn-based card battles across civilization's ruins. Choose your targets wisely as dice rolls and the luck of the draw determine attack damage. Master three unique classes, endure waves of enemies, and prepare to invade and destroy the Aetheryx Lair!

Title: Rustic Defense
ShortDescription: Rustic Defense is a hexagonal fantasy tower defense game with roguelike elements, generated enviroment with option explore your own way. Research skills and heroes, choose path, build towers and uprade them.

Title: ODYSSEY: Starship Pinball
ShortDescription: A zany pinball platformer, inspired by classic arcade tables with a procedural twist. Bounce, fling, and bump through a roguelite pinball world in endless singleplayer or idle modes.

Title: Hotel Luximinal
ShortDescription: Love spotting anomalies and exploring the glamorous Art Deco of 1925 New York? Dive into Hotel Luximinal – a captivating journey through surreal rooms where the ordinary turns extraordinary. Find hidden anomalies, uncover mysteries, and immerse yourself in a world of elegance and intrigue!

Title: Shrooms! Tower Defence
ShortDescription: Cute, squishy, and armed to the gills — your mushy defenders are the forest’s last hope against lumberjack invasion! Grow, evolve, and command your Shrooms to protect your unique island home.

Title: the travelers
ShortDescription: the travelers is a 2d mmo and text-based adventure. explore a massive wasteland full of history and danger. discover items, build bases, engage in combat, or work together to solve the world's hidden mystery.

Title: Willow’s Descent: Into The Under
ShortDescription: Experience the beautiful, hand-drawn world of the Arretai in this atmospheric precision platformer. Dive deeper into the Under and overcome unique platforming challenges in search of your missing sister.

Title: Alice in the Manor
ShortDescription: Alice in the Manor is a point-and-click escape adventure game. You must explore every corner of a large manor filled with various puzzles and gimmicks and escape safely.

Title: Space Sim Tycoon
ShortDescription: Space Sim Tycoon – A sandbox transportation tycoon game where you can explore forbidden planets, gather resources, craft goods, and establish routes to manage your space empire.

Title: Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics
ShortDescription: Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics is a turn-based strategic tennis game. Zero in on your opponent’s pattern of play to gain the upper hand. Line up the perfect shot and simulate the outcome before committing to your next play. Sometimes the court is wide open, and sometimes you have to aim for the lines.

Title: KLIKFEST: Medieval
ShortDescription: KLIKFEST is a medieval clicker game where you develop villages as the king’s advisor. Build mines, craft unique items, and manage resources in a 3-day loop. Early Access focuses on mining, with multiplayer and 14 parts coming. Shape the game with feedback!

Title: Path of Spirits
ShortDescription: "Path of Spirits" is a hardcore boomer shooter in the setting of Tatar folklore. You are a shaman who failed an ancient ritual. Armed with magic staffs and mythical artifacts, set off on a journey through a world distorted by spirits to save your loved ones with otherworldly forces.

Title: Mistway
ShortDescription: Mistway is an innovative physics-based puzzle game where shifting your perspective is the key. In this enigmatic cube-based labyrinth, rotate your view to alter the very physics of the world. Unlock the secrets of 3D space, turn the impossible into possible, and guide your ball to the destination.

Title: Wand Wonder
ShortDescription: A short, relaxing first-person adventure. Explore a beautiful stylized world, harness the powers of air, earth, water, and fire, and confront the final tower to restore balance.

Title: Idlemon
ShortDescription: Become an Animal Trainer on the side of your screen. Train to gain xp, level up and upgrade your stats. Go and fight other animals and catch your new companions.

Title: Zombocity
ShortDescription: ZomboCity is a fast-paced, score-based FPS where you fight endless waves of zombies in a neon-lit city. Test your reflexes, stack up points, and see how long you can survive.

Title: Inkoid
ShortDescription: Rule the skies and paint the arena in your team's colors! Dive into the vibrant world of Inkoid, a 3v3 hyper aerial shooter where capturing airborne strongholds with your team is the key to victory.

Title: Golftacular!
ShortDescription: Mini-golf turned upside down! Abuse wild items on a variety of challenging golf tours. Shoot, fly, explode, and whatever else you can to get in the hole! It’s golf… barely.

Title: Dworf's Forbidden Gold
ShortDescription: Help the Dworfs obtain all the Forbidden Gold to Build a Rocket Ship to Outer Space! Click the Rock, Obtain Resources, Build a Village, Gain More Dworfs!

Title: The Valley Beyond
ShortDescription: Beyond The Valley is an exploration puzzle game with no quest markers or enemy, only curiosity guides your steps. Find your way through gorgeous landscapes and activate all the artworks. But something went wrong in the park, and to leave, you will have to uncover its secret.

Title: Dead World Tales
ShortDescription: A narrative roguelite puzzle game inspired by tic‑tac‑toe, where you explore self‑contained stories and make decisions that uncover the mystery of the world’s end.

Title: Mind Faux: The First Compliance
ShortDescription: Mind Faux: The First Compliance is a puzzle game that test your problem solving skills. What is the purpose of these mysterious tests? You try to figure out how to escape a maze of misinformation. Or you can comply with the voice that is guiding you along.

Title: Cousin Catcher
ShortDescription: A wacky upgrade-driven, physics-based arcade game where you launch a baby into the sky, collect coins, and catch them on the way down!

Title: Dreamscape Pursuit
ShortDescription: Trapped in a dream at his school, a young boy must evade a relentless teacher and find a way out before time runs out and the line between reality and nightmare disappears.

Title: Pogo Panic
ShortDescription: Pogo Panic is a difficult, Parkour Adventure. Bounce on a pogo stick, ignite a fleeting jetpack, and vault through space. One slip-jump takes you back to the start—no checkpoints. Fail, rebound, and master the sky one desperate hop at a time.

Title: The Mad House Season One
ShortDescription: Step into The Mad House, a futuristic cyberpunk game show! Battle waves of enemies, conquer unique room challenges, and climb the Leaderboard. Upgrade your gear, master each fight, and earn your place in the legendary Hall of Legends.

ShortDescription: Sci-fi space survival horror.

Title: Squiigee
ShortDescription: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!

Title: Times Trials
ShortDescription: Flex your 200 IQ with Times Trials - a block-dropping puzzle arcade game. Arrange falling numbers to solve equations and plan combos. Style on your friends in versus multiplayer, or wrinkle your brain in singleplayer.

Title: Dungeons and Tiles
ShortDescription: An Action Role-Playing dungeon crawler, with randomly generated dungeons and challenging bosses to defeat for loot and glory.

Title: Negotiations Have Failed!
ShortDescription: Fight off the Aetheryx invasion in brutal, turn-based card battles across civilization's ruins. Choose your targets wisely as dice rolls and the luck of the draw determine attack damage. Master three unique classes, endure waves of enemies, and prepare to invade and destroy the Aetheryx Lair!

Armed with magic staffs and mythical artifacts, set off on a journey through a world distorted by spirits to save your loved ones with otherworldly forces.

Title: Slingshot Pilot
ShortDescription: Master fast paced gravity manuevers in this arcade space game.

Title: Crisis Reign Orbis
ShortDescription: Crisis Reign: Orbis is a gripping RPG that blends high-stakes combat, strategic decision-making, and a richly detailed world where every action shapes the future of Orbis. Explore a land in turmoil, face impossible choices, and rise to become the hero—or villain—of a world on the edge of ruin.

Title: Polterparty
ShortDescription: Spooky McGee invites you to the Polterparty! Polterparty is a 4 player online co-op horror game with minigames. A haunted mansion filled with deadly entities awaits, and it’s up to you and your friends to survive the night by outsmarting supernatural.

Title: Quantum Loop
ShortDescription: Zoom and dodge your way about the quadrant, solving intertwining objectives however you can. Hit an asteroid and the mission resets - but whatever you learn you can exploit in the next loop! Use your wits and precise piloting together to prevent the asteroid crisis!

Title: Time Snatcher Handy
ShortDescription: The universe's greatest cat burglar? The ultimate phantom thief across dimensions? Nah... Time Snatcher Handy, that's me! A time-stop bullet-hell action roguelike starring "Handy" the stylish cat burglar! Stop the time to dodge bullets, gather items to get stronger, and escape the Time Museum!

Title: Bleu Bayou
ShortDescription: A lonesome crawdad mired in debt, you vie to topple the loan sharks and robber barons that run your neck of the bayou. In this 8-bit roguelite boss rush shoot 'em up, you'll leverage 100+ upgrades against a dozen unique bosses. Erase your debts once and for all!

Blackwood Sanatorium: The Silent Cries is a first-person psychological horror game where you, a private detective, must unravel the dark secrets of a asylum and the experiments of missing doctor.

Title: Deepest Well
ShortDescription: Deepest Well is a roguelike where you fight off waves of enemies in a descending well with destructible terrain. Get upgrades after each wave and make insane builds to break the game!

Title: FTL Team
ShortDescription: ​​This is a turn-based strategy adventure game. Assemble a five-hero squad, each with unique strengths. Collect mysterious artifacts, build potent hero abilities, defeat powerful monsters, and eliminate galactic threats.​

Title: Pooping Cat
ShortDescription: Press a key, click your mouse — and POOP! Our adorable kitty leaves a little digital gift just for you. Who wouldn't fall in love with that?

Title: Bread Adventure
ShortDescription: Experience a adventure in a seamless world of food, where you play as a brave bread. Freely explore interconnected regions, uncover hidden secrets, collect items to enhance your abilities, tackle challenging stages, and defeat formidable foes.

Title: Chess 2048
ShortDescription: Chess 2048 – Classic chess moves meet fresh puzzle-strategy twists: watch the board reshape, adapt on the fly, and master piece combos. Then escape poison gas, jump between water tiles, use portals, and pull off clever tricks.

Title: The Echoes of Me
ShortDescription: The Echoes of Me pulls you into a nightmare where shadows blur with self. As fragmented memories surface, you must remain cautious and uncover the truth.

Title: Sidequest Survivors
ShortDescription: Sidequest Survivors is a bullet-heaven roguelite where you control wacky characters, mow down waves of magical creatures, and tackle sidequests. Choose from a variety of weapons and create builds that match your playstyle.

Title: Arcabbit
ShortDescription: Latch on with two hooks and ride the momentum of a pendulum swing. Swap left and right in rhythm to blaze through neon stages in this 2D action game. Stage mechanics sync with the soundtrack for a snappy “one more try” loop.

Title: Galaxy for Dummies
ShortDescription: A chaotic roguelike auto-battler set in a ridiculous sci-fi universe. Assemble bizarre alien teams, exploit crazy synergies, and fight your way through the galaxy with humor and strategy.

Title: Teo
ShortDescription: Hunt and trade during the day, survive horrifying creatures at night. TEO is a pixel-art action roguelite featuring a dynamic day-night cycle that transforms enemies and the world around you.

Title: Echo Maze
ShortDescription: An innovative audio-based puzzle, Echo Maze. Sight is useless. Your only guide is the sound around you. In total darkness, pinpoint your location by the sounds of scattered gimmicks and evade deadly traps. Is every sound a hint, or an invitation to death? A 3D audio survival.

Title: Find your friends
ShortDescription: Master the art of deception to outwit friends & foes in this social deduction party game for 2-8 players that blends stealth, strategy, and deceit. Play online or locally through a variety of mini-games while using cunning and misdirection to locate your friends while staying hidden.

Title: Wavekin
ShortDescription: Wavekin is a narrative adventure and underwater exploration game where you dive into the depths to discover an ancient civilization. Observe, listen, and use your song to unravel the ocean’s mysteries and breathe new life into a world on the brink of silence.

Title: The Kintsugi Cat
ShortDescription: Piece together alternating coloured shards of broken pottery into new designs, then watch as they're fixed together with gold; in this Kintsugi-themed, Japanese minimalism inspired, 2.5D jigsaw puzzle game.

Title: Accelerator Operator
ShortDescription: Build a chain reaction and watch it break apart for Profit! Accelerator Operator is cash chasing roguelike where you harness the power of the atom. Play through 4 Gamemodes with difficulty built to provide challenge to those of any skill level.

Title: Loop My Crank
ShortDescription: A ridiculous clicker where cranking handles becomes a cult. Upgrade your cranks, recruit spinners, and embrace the infinite loop. Always spin. Never stop.

Title: Saving Princess Of Mars
ShortDescription: Saving Princess of Mars is an Old School Pixel Art Humoristic Story Driven Light Platformer. Main protagonist is lumberjack Jack from Earth who spawns on Mars where he finds locked up beautiful Princess of Mars and chooses to save her... But that is just the beginning of his journey!

Title: Arrowburst
ShortDescription: Arrowburst is a calm, relaxing, short incremental game about bursting squares and upgrading your arrow.

Title: Ironsphere
ShortDescription: Ironsphere is a fast-paced top-down mech shooter set on a hostile moon. Fight giant insects and deadly machines, pilot 20+ customizable mechs, and balance speed, armor, and energy. Equip weapons, shields, and modules to survive brutal battles and claim victory.

Title: Somewhere, A Cat Sleeps
ShortDescription: Between the veil of night and dawn, a cat once loved still wanders on. A meditative walking simulator about cats, patience, love, and loss.

Title: Your Cock
ShortDescription: An unremarkable little animal desktop pet, until you read its name.

Title: Kıraathane Tycoon
ShortDescription: Build and manage your own neighborhood coffeehouse. Serve tea, keep your customers happy, and turn a small kıraathane into a legendary chain!

Title: Rare Rabbits - Snuggle Haven
ShortDescription: Rare Rabbits is an adorable, turn-based simulation game where you can already breed more than 6,000,000 unique rabbits and manage your very own rabbit farm. Each rabbit’s appearance and traits are determined by scientifically accurate genetics and inheritance principles, down to the smallest allele!

Title: Creator's Fall
ShortDescription: Creator’s Fall is an action roguelike with various classes, where you can choose between different paths. The goal is to reach and defeat the final boss at the end of the path. Levels are dynamically generated and feature different biomes. You can choose an upgrade after each level up.

Title: Dreamlab
ShortDescription: Dreamlab is a game creation platform where you can discover and create fresh multiplayer games. Bring your friends or make new ones!

Title: Secret File
ShortDescription: Secret File is an Action Strategy Game. The military team will have to overcome huge distances and repel the attacks of hordes of infected every night. Build fortifications, use different tactics, combine weapons and fight off numerous enemies!

Title: Tile Tempest
ShortDescription: Precision meets chaos in this fast-paced, physics-driven tile matcher. Memorize colors and shapes, adapt to shifting modifiers, and stay sharp under pressure. In this storm, your memory is your greatest weapon.

Title: Take7
ShortDescription: Remove numbers by selecting squares of numbers where their sum equals seven. Avoid blocking yourself by carefully choosing what part of the grid to clear. Think carefully, compete against friends in the daily challenge, finish the harder gem levels or go as far as you can in endless mode.

Title: The Witch's fabulous Cracker Show
ShortDescription: Play as Cracker, the witch's errand boy. Collect ingredients for the ingenious cake plan and avoid the hungry children. Solve amusing puzzles, unlock new abilities, and explore the witty world of the Cracker Show.

Title: Phil in the Mirror
ShortDescription: The mirror calls to you. Down the endless corridor, aged walls and flickering lights cross paths. As your footsteps echo with every step, why do you find yourself frozen before the mirror? Then again, maybe it's not a mirror at all.

Title: Pencil Stories
ShortDescription: Explore Tsukinoma village after midnight and share the peace and solitude with Letty whilst everyone is asleep. Unravel secrets of lost letters in this unique, hand-drawn world – no rush, just calm discovery.

Title: Solitaire Battle Online
ShortDescription: "Solitaire" and "Spider" are created in intense competitions. Compete not with a deck, but with players from all over the world. Your goal is not just to collect solitaire, but to do it more faster and more efficiently than everyone else.

Title: Mass of Consumption
ShortDescription: The church is impatient. The church is hungry. The church is willing to do anything to get you back.

Title: Tales of Demagost: Exodus
ShortDescription: Your village got burned down, now resettle in a safe place, rebuild and train to take your revange. ToD is pretty casual story driven RPG that combines linear and open world parts.

Title: Spin Of Dosul
ShortDescription: Spin of Dosul is a new roguelike deck-building game that combines slot machine mechanics with inventory management. Test your luck alongside an adorable Dokkaebi! Collect symbols and sacred relics to build your own scroll and defeat monsters on your journey back to the real world.

Title: BAD SECTOR ³
ShortDescription: The Cube summons you. A sentient structure of many floors where every mistake drags you farther from the exit. Detect the bad sectors, climb through the levels… and try to break the cycle.

Title: InOut
ShortDescription: A minimalist puzzle platformer where each level is more than they seem. Change your perspective on levels to discover new areas. Explore the world to unearth its hidden secrets.

Title: Friendsmob
ShortDescription: Become the billionaire you always mocked! Collect humans like trading cards, exploit their productivity, and compete in The Excess Index - where morally bankrupt capitalism is the only way to win. Own everything. Question nothing.

Title: Grimslair
ShortDescription: You don’t level up—your cards do! A survival deckbuilder where you bargain with the Grim Reaper to bring your girlfriend back from the dead. Build & craft in harsh biomes, rescue lost pets that fight for you, inscribe Soulwords to customize cards, and recover notes to remember why you’re here…again.

Title: Burdock 2
ShortDescription: Burdock 2 is a single-player action-horror game. Explore a lost place in a post-apocalyptic future, and help the main character's friends, or leave everyone behind and embark on the path of darkness. Find all the clues and open the way to the passage. Solve puzzles and do not lose your composure.

Title: Alice in the Manor
ShortDescription: Alice in the Manor is a point-and-click escape adventure game. You must explore every corner of a large manor filled with various puzzles and gimmicks and escape safely.

Title: Space Sim Tycoon
ShortDescription: Space Sim Tycoon – A sandbox transportation tycoon game where you can explore forbidden planets, gather resources, craft goods, and establish routes to manage your space empire.

Title: Oblation
ShortDescription: Oblation is a top-down, pixelated open-world RPG where you explore a vast land, level up your stats, and recruit support characters to uncover a deep truth.

Title: The Adventure of Ravi 'n' Navi
ShortDescription: An action-adventure game where Ravi the rabbit and Navi the fairy travel through various worlds! Can you find the carrots stolen by the villain, Shivarra, and restore peace to the village?

Title: Raptor
ShortDescription: The protagonist, a reporter, receives information that a laboratory is conducting experiments that defy the law. He visits the laboratory to find out what the experiment is, but regrets his decision to come... A 3D escape horror in which he explores while being chased by a tracker using only lights!

Title: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare
ShortDescription: TryAngle: Shapes Warfare is a fast-paced, addictive shoot 'em up with a twist...You can't shoot! Easy to pick up, hard to put down, dodge, survive, and chase high scores in this addictive, old-school action game!

Title: DECRYPTO Project
ShortDescription: Our algorithm has chosen you for inclusion in the DECRYPTO project. Your job is simple: we send encrypted texts, you decipher them. Loyalty and diligence will be rewarded with upgrades and customization options for your system. Disobedience and sabotage will be punished.

Title: Tong
ShortDescription: Tong is a PvP arcade game where you have to lick more random objects than your opponent to win a golden crown!

Title: Barfbot
ShortDescription: Square off against evil rhombi in this level-based microvania bullet-filled platformer. Find secrets passageways, unlock new weapons, dodge waves of enemies all in search of your beloved pet bot. Jump, barf, die, repeat.

Title: Dyskairos
ShortDescription: Dyskairos is an FPS with roguelike and metroidvania elements. Explore a mysterious tower while also fighting the tower itself.

Title: Kingdom Wars
ShortDescription: A medieval themed turn-based strategy/tactical game where you will build a kingdom, lead armies to the war, fight tactical battles and conquer enemy cities. Choose your main leader character from the 7 different available factions and start building your kingdom.

Title: Dead, too dead
ShortDescription: Dead, too dead is an open-world survival game where an ordinary person from the 21st century is summoned to a fantasy world on the brink of apocalypse. Just remember one thing: you are not a legend. You are just an ordinary person.

Title: Doghouse 3
ShortDescription: A short Casual Adventure game that takes place in your backyard. Pick up items, think through problems, and give your beloved pet the best home he deserves.. as soon as you can.

Title: ClusterCluck
ShortDescription: Compete or cooperate in chaotic mini-games with friends or online players! ClusterCluck is a fast-paced multiplayer arena packed with action, co-op fun, and unpredictable mayhem.

Title: Isekat: Crushed by a Computer, My Beloved Kitten is Transported to a Fantasy World where its Typing Skills Save the Kingdom!
ShortDescription: A typing game where you play as a cat, crushed by a computer and transported to a fantasy world of swords, magic, catgirls and furries! As the hero summoned from another world, venture forth with your trusty keyboard, defeat foes and save the cat kingdom!

Title: Cola Tycoon
ShortDescription: Cola Tycoon is an economic sandbox in which you invent iconic cola recipes, build industrial-era factories, and launch marketing campaigns to dominate the 19th-century drink market. Experiment with formulas, adapt to market shifts, and shape the industry one bottle at a time.

Title: Run Quad Run
ShortDescription: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.

Title: Super Cabbage Kabumi
ShortDescription: The roguelike all about bonking cabbages! Make incredible builds with a vast array of items, wield powerful weapons, change the game entirely with pets, fight fantastical bosses, and so much more!

Title: Defend the Castle
ShortDescription: Defend the Castle is a day-by-day tower defense roguelike where you face 5 enemy waves per day, upgrade between battles, and struggle to survive as enemies grow stronger. Make the right choices or fall. Some days bring... something else.

Title: Ascendant Dawn
ShortDescription: Ascendant Dawn is a grand strategy game where you lead a nomadic tribe in a brutal bronze age world. Work your way up from a small clan to a great empire by founding cities and conquering your enemies.

Title: Onychomp : Lush journey
ShortDescription: Run, dig, howl, and devour in this real-time dungeon crawler where hunger and night chase you. Each night, a new mountain awaits. Can you reach the summit before dawn?

Title: Moving On
ShortDescription: Follow Addison as they help their recently-deceased mother move on to the Spirit World. In this 2D visual narrative and platformer, Addison must explore and find special objects while being confronted with a journey of grief.

Title: Grand Donald Trump Simulator
ShortDescription: Grand Donald Trump Simulator is a silly little game full of dark humor and political satire, where every item on Trump’s to-do list turns into an international incident. Just another day in the life of the King.

Title: Mistway
ShortDescription: Mistway is an innovative physics-based puzzle game where shifting your perspective is the key. In this enigmatic cube-based labyrinth, rotate your view to alter the very physics of the world. Unlock the secrets of 3D space, turn the impossible into possible, and guide your ball to the destination.

Title: Wand Wonder
ShortDescription: A short, relaxing first-person adventure. Explore a beautiful stylized world, harness the powers of air, earth, water, and fire, and confront the final tower to restore balance.

Title: Casino Tycoon: Sin & Win
ShortDescription: Rise from a broke gambler to a casino kingpin in this high-stakes sim blending management, gambling, and adult content. Win big, indulge in luxury, go bankrupt, or start a gang war—every choice writes your destiny. In this city, you either rule the tables… or end up in a ditch.

Title: 近所 - if -
ShortDescription: A Girl's Kidnapping Case in Your Neighborhood...Your Choices and Actions Determine the Outcome

Title: INTERLOCKED
ShortDescription: INTERLOCKED is a tense co-op horror game with resource management elements. Delve into the dark depths of an abandoned subway, avoid dangerous anomalies, out-of-control trains, and manage your oxygen supply. Reach the heart of this oppressive place.

Title: FLING FRIENDS
ShortDescription: Fling Friends is a chaotic co-op physics platformer where one fling yeets everyone! Solve color-based puzzles, climb together (or fall together), and laugh your way through a vibrant Arabian-inspired world.

Title: ClusterCluck
ShortDescription: Compete or cooperate in chaotic mini-games with friends or online players! ClusterCluck is a fast-paced multiplayer arena packed with action, co-op fun, and unpredictable mayhem.

Title: Isekat: Crushed by a Computer, My Beloved Kitten is Transported to a Fantasy World where its Typing Skills Save the Kingdom!
ShortDescription: A typing game where you play as a cat, crushed by a computer and transported to a fantasy world of swords, magic, catgirls and furries! As the hero summoned from another world, venture forth with your trusty keyboard, defeat foes and save the cat kingdom!

Title: Run Quad Run
ShortDescription: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.

Title: Super Cabbage Kabumi
ShortDescription: The roguelike all about bonking cabbages! Make incredible builds with a vast array of items, wield powerful weapons, change the game entirely with pets, fight fantastical bosses, and so much more!

Title: Jingle Strike VR
ShortDescription: VR bowling set across Christmas themed alleys. Snarky elves cheer your wins, and mock your fails. You can throw stuff at them. They fart. It’s Christmas magic. Play solo or pass the headset for couch VR with up to 5 players. Imagine how much fun Christmas day will be when granny plays!

Title: Defend the Castle
ShortDescription: Defend the Castle is a day-by-day tower defense roguelike where you face 5 enemy waves per day, upgrade between battles, and struggle to survive as enemies grow stronger. Make the right choices or fall. Some days bring... something else.

Title: Dreadstone Keep
ShortDescription: Dreadstone Keep is a roguelike, strategy turn-based game where you must defeat the two powerful entities that rule the ancient castle. Acquire upgrades, use your wits and battle powerful pixel art enemies!

Title: Yoram - Question Arc
ShortDescription: A mansion drenched in heavy rain. Heirs gathered, each eyeing the family fortune. And you—who committed a murder in their midst. As a chain of killings begins, YORAM follows Irene Lindbergh, a murderer hiding her crime, as she searches for the truth buried deep within the estate.

Title: Rasna
ShortDescription: "Rasna" is an historically accurate Etruscan tale: a legend as it might have been told in ancient times when people gathered around the fire. A Single-Player Open-World game to jump 2500 years in the past.

Title: Knights of Conquest: Feudal Shenanigans Galore
ShortDescription: Become a knight and conquer the lands for your king and yourself! Manage your towns and resources, command your armies and peasants, and maybe even bring your fellow knight friends to assist in your quest. Feudal shenanigans await!

Title: Tame-a-goat-chi
ShortDescription: Run your own adorable goat pasture in this half-screen idle game! Tame, feed and care for quirky goats while growing your farm – all while you work or browse the web!

Title: Desktown
ShortDescription: A minimalist city-builder that sits on the bottom of your screen! Gather resources, set timers, and decorate your town while you do other activities.

Title: Brotherhood
ShortDescription: An old-school shooter inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. You are one of the prisoners of an ancient prison. There is no one to help you. You only have yourself to rely on. Your shotgun. Against hordes of enemies. Animal rage and the desire to kill. Destroy Them All!

Title: NECROSYNTEX
ShortDescription: A 4-player co-op shooter set in a world overrun by mutant creatures. Use powerful yet risky doping effects to fight alongside your team and complete missions.

Title: By Strange Orders
ShortDescription: 100 mind-twisting puzzles! Test your wits while adventuring through a world with secrets and unlockable treasures.

Title: Tanks: 1985
ShortDescription: Classic tank battles reborn with online play, powerups, emojis & map editor!

Title: 立冬 LI Dong
ShortDescription: 此为游戏免费的适用版，本人基于热爱在2025大学毕业后放弃原物理学专业从事游戏制作，虽然有经验缺乏资金不足等问题。但是我们不会轻言放弃。 本游戏为文字游戏，galgame。 玩家们扮演游戏主角从童年时期开始，通过选择遇见不同的人，开启不同的人生。我们重视选项所带的变化，特别是前期的，所以希望玩家能谨慎对待选择。我们希望玩家能够在这款游戏里把主角当作自己，把自己当作主角。经历一段新的人生。

Title: Stock Market Simulator
ShortDescription: Start from nothing and climb your way to the top. Work everyday jobs, trade stocks and crypto, and explore a city full of side activities. Will you play it safe, or risk it all to become the ultimate investor?

Title: Tales In Text: Multiplayer Immersive Adventures
ShortDescription: A co-op, text- and audio-driven collection of stories. Lead expeditions into uncharted cold waters, hiding a presence older than the Earth. Coordinate via proximity voice chat. More stories come after the release.

Title: Crossite II Definitive Edition
ShortDescription: Futuristic Tower Defense Action! All out war between You and Crossite vs. Erossite. Use Strategy to place down towers and defend from Erossite enemies. Equip Flash Drives to give yourself an edge above enemies. Solve puzzles to help Crossite locate enemy bases.

Title: The Salesman
ShortDescription: In the Salesman, you play as a recently laid-off employee trying to survive the grind of job applications, debt, and dwindling hope. Trade your belongings for ad-supported replacements as you slowly sell away your life in this psychological horror game

Title: KILL THE KING
ShortDescription: You are the King. Trapped in your castle, you are being hunted by something wearing the faces of your former subjects. Run. Pray. Hide. And may God be with you...

Title: DarkVein
ShortDescription: DarkVein is a tactical RPG about survival in infected lands. Explore, build shelters, gather resources, and fight zombies. Every day tests your stamina, awareness, and will to live.

Title: Soul of Recollection
ShortDescription: Soul of Recollection is a pixel-style point-and-click puzzle game. Explore a quiet school at night, collect items, solve puzzles, and piece together lost memories to find your way out. With no horror elements, it blends light storytelling and immersive mystery.

Title: to the
ShortDescription: "to the" is a one-way philosophical walking adventure where no two players will have the same experience. Extend your path through your “choices” and make your way to 10,000 meters. Then, uncover the “truth” hidden within this game.

Title: Diarrhea Disaster
ShortDescription: Experience true horror of getting loose bowels at the wrong time. Battle against time to get to the porcelain throne or face a brown punishment.

Title: Animal Coloring Books for Kids & Toddlers - Dinosaurs
ShortDescription: A family-friendly kids coloring book game where kids & toddlers paint and create cute dinosaur artworks. Draw with fingers on the Steam Deck’s touchscreen, hide outlines for freeform creativity, and share masterpieces with friends!

Title: Seconda: A Post-Apocalyptic Tale
ShortDescription: Survive in the ruins of a post-apocalyptic Italy. Manage resources, defend your home, and try to reactivate a radio to contact the outside world.

Title: Country Drive Simulator
ShortDescription: Country Drive Simulator invites you to explore a vast, fictional open world inspired by both American and European countryside landscapes. Navigate through diverse terrains, from bustling cities to serene rural areas, engaging in realistic driving experiences and logistics operations.​

Title: Lost in Loss
ShortDescription: Welcome to the strangest case of your career, detective: characters have forgotten who they are! In this cozy hidden object adventure, find items tied to memories and restore lost identities — uncover the truth behind the loss.

Title: FISH³: FIRST CATCH
ShortDescription: FISH³: FIRST CATCH is a high-octane, surreal speed-fishing adventure where your boat is powered by fish! Engage in time-attack stages, dual-rod fishing, and underwater spear-fishing in a dreamlike world teeming with bizarre aquatic creatures.

Title: Night Shift at the Gym
ShortDescription: Your first night shift at an empty gym becomes a descent into madness. Clean the equipment, mop the floors, and discover what lurks in the weight room after midnight.

Title: HIDDEN CATS 6: After us
ShortDescription: Explore the continuation of this mysterious robotic world of another civilization, finding cute cats and paint black - white locations with colored paints.

Title: IRON GUARD: Salvation
ShortDescription: Step into the world of IRON GUARD: Salvation, a sci-fi Tower Defense game with real-time strategy elements. Build your defenses, upgrade turrets, and fend off waves of relentless robots with unique heroes your handheld drone - your tactical brilliance is humanity’s last hope!

Title: MATRESHKA
ShortDescription: MATRESHKA is a first-person psychological horror experience, you need find a way to escape from a maze of old soviet building. If you die...

Title: The Binding Hour
ShortDescription: The Binding Hour is a first-person psychological horror game set in a forgotten house lost deep in the woods. Explore shifting spaces, confront haunting echoes, and uncover a truth that refuses to stay buried. Every hour binds you tighter—will you break the loop, or become part of it?

Title: City Car Driving 2.0
ShortDescription: City Car Driving 2.0 is a driving simulator designed to help novice drivers master driving in a setting as close to reality as possible.

Title: Express Car Wash Simulator
ShortDescription: Run your own Car Wash company! Foam & Wash cars, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles! Don't forget to entertain your customers, otherwise you'll be in trouble

Title: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
ShortDescription: A dark tale of survival and conscience, blending platforming, puzzles, and haunting beauty. Journey through surreal lands where every choice shapes the fate of a world on the edge of ruin will you restore the light or embrace the darkness?

Title: Psycasso®
ShortDescription: Take on the role of a serial killer who creates paintings with their victims blood! Sell your creations to earn money while trying to avoid capture by the police and other civilians.

Title: Five Mysterious Murders - Part 2
ShortDescription: Five teenagers went to a small Louisiana town to make a movie about a famous serial killer. What could go wrong?

Title: Retrace The Light
ShortDescription: Dive into the immersive world of Retrace the Light, a captivating 2.5D action-adventure game centered around the "Spatial Retracing" feature. play the role of an Enforcer working for a super AI in a futuristic world, exploring the depths of human consciousness and healing their emotional wounds.

Title: Whispering Fog
ShortDescription: Whispering Fog is a first person psychological horror game set in an ever-changing forest shrouded in fog. A quiet getaway becomes a sinister nightmare as the illusion of safety and solitude slowly crumbles around you.

Title: The DvD idle game
ShortDescription: Remember the old bouncing DvD screensaver? Well now its an idle game, Bounce DvD's all over the screen and increase your profits, and a lot of 2000's technology will come up as shops

Title: Koloboke: Sickness Simulator
ShortDescription: This is a difficult game that takes the best from Dark Souls - the rolls 😁 Combined with a first-person camera, it turns into a truly butt-blasting mix 🔥

Title: Huntsman
ShortDescription: Trapped inside a spider-infested research facility, Huntsman immerses you in a survival horror experience fueled by arachnophobia. Combining realistic spider behavior with intense tension, Huntsman will test your nerve like never before.

Title: Blind Box
ShortDescription: Collect blind boxes and unbox cute figurines! Display them, earn fame, and decorate your home with furniture, pets, and cool knick-knacks. Show off your collection to your friends and unwind!

Title: Hangtime!
ShortDescription: Hangtime! is a high-stakes volleyball roguelite where every rally hits like a boss fight. Chain explosive abilities, shut down evolving teams, and spike your way to the top — or lose it all in one play.

Title: Everest: Real Climbing Simulator
ShortDescription: Climbing Mount Everest is a lifelong dream for many — but also the world’s most dangerous and costly challenge. Now, with this world's first life-size 1:1 replica of Everest game, you can live that dream without risking your life or breaking the bank!

Title: Idlewood Outpost
ShortDescription: An idle desktop pet game where pixel RPG heroes patrol the bottom of your screen, collect loot, and level up while you work.

Title: Study Time Anomaly
ShortDescription: You fell asleep studying for exams… when you woke up the school was empty. Survive the night, identify what’s wrong, and escape the loop or be stuck at school forever.

Title: The Single-Eye Nightmare
ShortDescription: Survive deadly traps, solve environmental puzzles, and navigate the twisting corridors and tunnels of a long-forgotten underground temple. But beware: there's a monstrous Cyclops creature lurking around. Stay out of it's sight long enough to find your way out in this first-person horror game.

Title: Holo ADV: SakuraSingularity.exe
ShortDescription: Sakura Miko and the Hololive members are suddenly warped into an alternate future timeline. In this 3D adventure game, Miko must reunite with her friends and uncover the truth of this strange world to find her way back home.

Title: Incredicer
ShortDescription: Incredicer is an incremental dice game where you roll dice, earn money, upgrade and buy helper hands to automate and increase your income.

Title: Digging Together
ShortDescription: Start digging with your grandpa’s map! In this stylized co-op digging game (up to 4 players), dig, upgrade, and reach the treasure together. Work as a team or compete! Fun, chaos, and rivalry await deep underground.

Title: Critters Breakout
ShortDescription: Critters’ Breakout is a chaotic 4v2 fun 3D chase game where you can play as the cute and cuddly Critters or hunt them as the ferocious Kollectors! The Critters must scavenge supplies, outwit the enemy, and escape to freedom. The Kollectors track, trap, and fight to STOP THE BREAKOUT! Wishlist Today!

Title: Apparatus: Exanimus
ShortDescription: DIRUS Software's lost 1999 cult-classic is back! Explore its confusing and stygian world for yourself in this newly remastered edition, being sure to keep a steely gaze on the mystery of its warped labyrinths and crossroads.

Title: Sanity Break
ShortDescription: A class based survival horror RPG. You have been activated by the Felsat Organization, forced to recover their sensitive data in marked facilities—building your character while maintaining your sanity. Your mind can be more dangerous than the entities that lurk in the shadows.

Title: 春泥 Soil of Rebirth
ShortDescription: 《春泥》是一款刑侦题材的悬疑解谜推理游戏。2018年中秋前夕，刑警程佑接到报案，动身前往泥塑匠林家处理一起家庭伤人案。随着调查深入，案件的疑点层层浮现，将她引向一连串尘封已久的谜团。往事的土壤正在松动，深埋的真相即将揭开......

Title: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad
ShortDescription: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengead is a visual novel about a country on the brink of civil war. You're not a hero or a villain—just a student caught in the storm. Will you join the ranks or vanish into the shadows? The revolution won’t wait. And it won’t forget your choice.

Title: Hillshade Farm
ShortDescription: You’ve got land, time, and a whole lot to figure out. Start small, work hard, earn what you need, and build the kind of farm you’d never want to leave.

Title: Hack And Climb
ShortDescription: Be the weapon! Swing like an axe, thrust like a spear, and soar like an arrow in this physics-based platformer. Flip, throw, and carve your path to the peak! Rage burns, revenge awaits... Are you up to the challenge?

Title: Cat Named Mojave
ShortDescription: Stranded in the desert, your only hope of escaping rests in a strange Catman. His one request: hunt down surreal creatures, skin them, and chop them up so he can keep them as trophies.

Title: Lucerna
ShortDescription: A horror dungeon crawler where darkness reshapes the maze. Find keys, manage light, and choose: escape or descend. Online co-op for 1–5 players.

Title: Ragnar
ShortDescription: In this epic Norse myth-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler, wield divine power to challenge Loki and uncover the secrets of the Nine Realms through the branches of Yggdrasil. Grow stronger and reshape Ragnarok’s fate with legendary weapons of the gods.

Title: Quarantine Zone: The Last Check
ShortDescription: Command the checkpoint in a collapsing city. Screen survivors, manage scarce resources, and hold back the undead. Every your choice matters and one mistake could unleash the plague beyond your walls.

Title: Little Aviary
ShortDescription: Little Aviary is a relaxing idle bird collector that sits at the bottom of your screen! Hatch unique birds, sell them, decorate, then watch them fly around your screen and perch on top of your other windows!

Title: The You Quiz
ShortDescription: The You Quiz is a multiplayer game where the questions are about you! Be the King and judge your friends' answers about yourself. Or be a Courtier, guess their quirks, tastes, and dreams. Win favor, climb the ranks, become the new King. 3-8 players, online or local.

Title: Mulerun
ShortDescription: Start solo or in online co-op, with each player taking on different roles: brew master, getaway driver, shady negotiator, or air support pilot. You’ll need to cooperate (or yell at each other) as you dodge cops, complete ridiculous tasks, and climb the ranks of two very dangerous worlds...

Title: Woolly
ShortDescription: Raise a flock of colourful sheep in this slow-paced idler. Look after your sheep, gather their fleeces and complete your collection.

Title: Five Hearts Under One Roof season2
ShortDescription: Boarding house owner Yuman is back! Alongside Mal-sook, Gran, and Min-jung, a wealthy heiress, a girl burdened by childhood scars, and a sweet nurse move in. In this house of old memories and new emotions, who will you fall in love with?

Title: Mushroom Clicker
ShortDescription: An Idle Incremental Clicker game with cosy magical vibes. You are the newest Mushroom Wizard Initiate 🧙‍♂️ Cast spells 🪄 harvest mushrooms 🍄 and level up to become more powerful! Hire little creatures 🐿️ to help you harvest and unlock different types of shrooms and skills!

Title: Maktala: Slime Lootfest
ShortDescription: An incremental adventure where every battle unlocks new ways to slay hordes of monsters, collect powerful loot, master skills, and uncover tons of content.

Title: Not My War
ShortDescription: Explore, survive, and escape a deadly island as a clever ferret. Not My War is a 3D isometric stealth and exploration game with a day-night cycle that turns time against you. Gather resources, help survivors, and repair your boat, but remember... the robots never rest.

Title: Iluminatus Bizarre Ascent
ShortDescription: Jump and survive! Help Iluminatus escape a bizarre world full of mutant viruses, creepy llamas, aliens, and powerful bosses! Unlock abilities, climb puzzling levels, or test your skills in endless mode.

Title: ONE GIANT HOLE
ShortDescription: Humanity teams up to dig BILLIONS of VOXELS to create the world’s biggest hole—together. Every swing makes this giant hole bigger! Chat with others while mining via a Twitter-like feed. Dig this giant hole with friends, strangers, or solo! What’s at the bottom?

Title: Trick or Truth
ShortDescription: Explore a mysterious Halloween night full of secrets, eerie encounters, and hidden truths. Trick or Truth? is a story-driven walking adventure where every choice leads you deeper into the unknown.

Title: AEON DIRECTIVE: THE INTERVIEW
ShortDescription: 50 binary questions. Infinite consequences. Observe every detail... the environment could change. Fail to notice an anomaly, and you fail the test. The further you progress, the more rooms you have to remember. Permadeath.

Title: !Dream
ShortDescription: “A ~10 minutes experimental interactive experience about guilt and war and dream”

Title: Turnbound
ShortDescription: Escape this haunted boardgame by engaging in PvP Auto Battles with other captive players! Competitively manage your weapons, relics, and trinkets in this inventory battler, unlocking devastating synergies and Hero upgrades. Will your designs defeat your opponents… or will your soul remain trapped?

Title: Grammar Grind
ShortDescription: A word-building incremental. Create words out of letter tiles to earn enough points to pay back the debt you owe. Purchase upgrades to improve those tiles, and the words you build with them. Unlock game-changing special tiles to earn huge bonuses to help you grind down your debt even faster.

Title: Omega Redux
ShortDescription: An episodic sci-fi adventure where you explore doomed open worlds one hour before their destruction. As a relic hunter and his playable robot companion, search for strangely meaningful artifacts while cinematic catastrophe approaches with every passing second. Get out in time—or meet the end!

Title: Machine TakeOver
ShortDescription: Survive alone in a sandbox world overrun by AI-driven Machines. Loot, craft, build, and evade. Every hit hurts. Every mistake matters. Machines value no memories, no culture, only biochemical efficiency. Will you survive, or become fuel?

Title: NEH
ShortDescription: noEndHOUSE is a cooperative horror game where players explore dark, monster-filled environments, solve deadly puzzles, and face moral choices. Trust your team — unless one of them is infected.

Title: The Fortress
ShortDescription: The Fortress is a dark fantasy dungeon crawler with turn-based combat, mixing strategy and risk. Choose a class, delve into cursed chambers, roll dice to fight brutal enemies, and grab loot. Face tough choices, survive epic bosses, and fight to escape... or fall to the shadows

Title: Detective Pig
ShortDescription: Detective Pig — this is a world of funny little pigs! You are a detective who, like an archangel descended from the heavens, has come to deliver justice. You will need wit and the ability to foresee the future! You will become strong. Cold. Relentless. Your name is — Sherlock Pig.
